GE07mbh_07_u:108: 07,001.041a tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre satyasaṃdhe mahaujasi
GE07mbh_07_u:109: 07,001.041c tvatsutāḥ karṇam asmārṣus tartukāmā iva plavam

GE07mbh_07_u:128: 07,001.048c yat tad vinihate bhīṣme kauravāṇām apāvṛtam

GE07mbh_07_u:131: 07,001.049b*0019_02 ārtānāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca krandatāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:133: 07,001.049c kṛtavān mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśāṃ saphalām api
GE07mbh_07_u:160: 07,002.006a neha dhruvaṃ kiṃ cana jātu vidyate;
GE07mbh_07_u:167: kurūṃś ca śocadhvam imāṃ ca vāhinīm

GE07mbh_07_u:238: 07,002.024c asīṃś ca śaktīś ca gadāś ca gurvīḥ;
GE07mbh_07_u:272: 07,002.033a na tv evāhaṃ na gamiṣyāmi teṣāṃ;

GE07mbh_07_u:301: 07,003.003a apārāṇām iva dvīpam agādhe gādham icchatām
GE07mbh_07_u:303: 07,003.004a mahāntam iva mainākam asahyaṃ bhuvi pātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:315: 07,003.009a karṇo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te adya mā vada bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:317: 07,003.010a na nūnaṃ sukṛtasyeha phalaṃ kaś cit samaśnute
GE07mbh_07_u:318: 07,003.010c yatra dharmaparo vṛddhaḥ śete bhuvi bhavān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:320: 07,003.011c nātham anyaṃ na paśyāmi kurūṇāṃ kurusattama
GE07mbh_07_u:321: 07,003.012a buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto yaḥ kurūṃs tārayed bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:322: 07,003.012c yodhāṃs tvam aplave hitvā pitṛlokaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:323: 07,003.013a adya prabhṛti saṃkruddhā vyāghrā iva mṛgakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:328: 07,003.015c trāsayiṣyati saṃgrāme kurūn anyāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_07_u:329: 07,003.016a samiddho 'gnir yathā vīra mahājvālo drumān dahet
GE07mbh_07_u:331: 07,003.017a yena yena prasarato vāyvagnī sahitau vane
GE07mbh_07_u:332: 07,003.017c tena tena pradahato bhagavantau yad icchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:333: 07,003.018a yādṛśo 'gniḥ samiddho hi tādṛk pārtho na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:334: 07,003.018b*0025_01 tādṛg eva hi kaunteyo davāgnir iva parvate
GE07mbh_07_u:335: 07,003.018c yathā vāyur naravyāghra tathā kṛṣṇo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:338: 07,003.019c śrutvā sarvāṇi sainyāni trāsaṃ yāsyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:340: 07,003.020c śabdaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakṣyanti tvām ṛte vīra pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:341: 07,003.021a ko hy arjunaṃ raṇe yoddhuṃ tvad anyaḥ pārthivo 'rhati

GE07mbh_07_u:345: 07,003.022d*0027_01 ko 'nyaḥ śakto raṇe jetuṃ pūrvaṃ yo na jitaḥ suraiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:357: 07,004.001d@001_0001 rahitaṃ dhiṣṇyam ālokya samutsārya ca rakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:359: 07,004.001d@001_0003 ehy ehi bho spardhase tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ hi sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:360: 07,004.001d@001_0004 yadi māṃ nādhigacchethā na te śreyo bhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:361: 07,004.001d@001_0005 kaunteyas tvaṃ na rādheyo na tavādhirathaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_07_u:362: 07,004.001d@001_0006 sūryatas tvaṃ mahābāho vidito nāradān mama
GE07mbh_07_u:363: 07,004.001d@001_0007 kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva keśavāc ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:364: 07,004.001d@001_0008 mānahā bhava śatrūṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ śokahā bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:365: 07,004.001d@001_0009 kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva tejasā ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:366: 07,004.001d@001_0010 na ca dveṣo 'sti me karṇa tvayi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:368: 07,004.001d@001_0012 akasmāt pāṇḍavān hi tvaṃ dviṣasīti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:371: 07,004.001d@001_0015 brahmaṇyatā ca śauryaṃ ca dāne vā paramo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:374: 07,004.001d@001_0018 sadṛśaḥ phalgunasyāpi kṛṣṇasya ca samo bale
GE07mbh_07_u:375: 07,004.002a samudra iva sindhūnāṃ jyotiṣām iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:376: 07,004.002c satyasya ca yathā santo bījānām iva corvarā
GE07mbh_07_u:377: 07,004.003a parjanya iva bhūtānāṃ pratiṣṭhā suhṛdāṃ bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:380: 07,004.003d*0030_02 kauravāṇāṃ bhava gatir yathā viṣṇur divaukasām
GE07mbh_07_u:382: 07,004.004c karṇa rājapuraṃ gatvā kāmbojā nihatās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:384: 07,004.005c ambaṣṭhāś ca videhāś ca gāndhārāś ca jitās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:388: 07,004.006c duryodhanasya vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ karṇa tvayā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:389: 07,004.006d*0032_01 utkalā mekalāḥ pauṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāndhrāś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:390: 07,004.006d*0032_02 niṣādāś ca trigartāś ca bāhlīkāś ca jitās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:392: 07,004.007c bahavaś ca jitā vīrās tvayā karṇa mahaujasā
GE07mbh_07_u:393: 07,004.007d@002_0001 brahmaṇyaḥ satyavādī ca tejasārko na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:395: 07,004.007d@002_0003 vyapanīto 'dya me manyur yas tvāṃ prati purā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:398: 07,004.007d@002_0006 gacchaikatvaṃ mahābāho mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_07_u:402: 07,004.007d@002_0009 jānāmy etan mahābāho kaunteyo 'smi na sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:403: 07,004.007d@002_0010 parityaktas tv ahaṃ kuntyā sūtena ca vivardhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:404: 07,004.007d@002_0011 bhuktvā duryodhanaiśvaryaṃ na mithyā kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_07_u:405: 07,004.007d@002_0012 vasu caiva śarīraṃ ca putradārāṃs tathā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:409: 07,004.007d@002_0016 aparāvartino ye 'rthās te na śakyā nivartitum
GE07mbh_07_u:412: 07,004.007d@002_0019 bhavadbhir hi purā dṛṣṭvā kathitāni ca saṃsadi
GE07mbh_07_u:413: 07,004.007d@002_0020 ajeyāḥ puruṣair anyair iti tāṃś cotsahāmahe
GE07mbh_07_u:415: 07,004.007d@002_0022 anujñātas tvayā vīra yudhyeyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:416: 07,004.007d@002_0023 duruktāni ca vākyāni saṃrambhāc cāpalād api
GE07mbh_07_u:417: 07,004.007d@002_0024 yan mayā te kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tyaja tad bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:419: 07,004.008b*0033_01 kṣemaṃ vindati sarvatra śatruhāniṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_07_u:420: 07,004.008c tathā tvam api sarveṣāṃ kauravāṇāṃ gatir bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:422: 07,004.009c anuśādhi kurūn saṃkhye dhatsva duryodhane jayam
GE07mbh_07_u:423: 07,004.009d*0034_01 tathā kuru manuṣyendra yathā duryodhane jayam
GE07mbh_07_u:425: 07,004.010c tavāpi dharmataḥ sarve yathā tasya vayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:426: 07,004.011a yaunāt saṃbandhakāl loke viśiṣṭaṃ saṃgataṃ satām
GE07mbh_07_u:428: 07,004.012a sa satyasaṃgaro bhūtvā mamedam iti niścitam
GE07mbh_07_u:429: 07,004.012c kurūṇāṃ pālaya balaṃ yathā duryodhanas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:430: 07,004.012d*0035_01 tathā hi kauravān yuddhe dhruvaṃ jeṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:433: 07,004.012d*0035_04 dharmo hi yuddhād adhikaḥ kṣatriyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:435: 07,004.012d*0035_05 evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:436: 07,004.012d*0036_01 yathā ca kuravo yuddhe yodhayanti sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:437: 07,004.013a iti śrutvā vacaḥ so 'tha caraṇāv abhivādya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:438: 07,004.013c yayau vaikartanaḥ karṇas tūrṇam āyodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:439: 07,004.013d*0037_01 atha tatra maheṣvāso vyādiśad rathino varān
GE07mbh_07_u:441: 07,004.013d*0037_03 sādinaś ca padātāṃś ca yathāśāstraṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:442: 07,004.013d*0037_04 sthāpayām āsa tathā putrāṇāṃ te jayapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:443: 07,004.013d*0037_05 tataḥ pakṣau prapakṣau ca vidhāya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:444: 07,004.013d*0037_06 pakṣakoṭyāṃ punar dvābhyāṃ pakṣau dvābhyāṃ suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:445: 07,004.013d*0037_07 evam etan mayā vyūhaṃ karṇena vihitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:447: 07,004.013d*0037_09 nṛtyantam iva taṃ vyūhaṃ didhakṣantam ivāhitān
GE07mbh_07_u:459: 07,005.001c hṛṣṭo duryodhano rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:460: 07,005.002a sanātham idam atyarthaṃ bhavatā pālitaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:461: 07,005.002c manye kiṃ tu samarthaṃ yad dhitaṃ tat saṃpradhāryatām
GE07mbh_07_u:463: 07,005.003a brūhi tat puruṣavyāghra tvaṃ hi prājñatamo nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:464: 07,005.003c yathā cārthapatiḥ kṛtyaṃ paśyate na tathetaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:465: 07,005.004a te sma sarve tava vacaḥ śrotukāmā nareśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:466: 07,005.004c nānyāyyaṃ hi bhavān vākyaṃ brūyād iti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:469: 07,005.005c śrutena ca susaṃpannaḥ sarvair yodhaguṇais tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:472: 07,005.007a tasminn asukaraṃ karma kṛtavaty āsthite divam
GE07mbh_07_u:474: 07,005.008a na ṛte nāyakaṃ senā muhūrtam api tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_07_u:477: 07,005.009a yathā hy akarṇadhārā nau rathaś cāsārathir yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:478: 07,005.009c draved yatheṣṭaṃ tadvat syād ṛte senāpatiṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:479: 07,005.009d*0040_01 adaiśiko yathā sārthaḥ sarvaṃ pāpaṃ samarchati
GE07mbh_07_u:480: 07,005.009d*0040_02 anāyakā tathā senā sarvān doṣān samarchati
GE07mbh_07_u:481: 07,005.010a sa bhavān vīkṣya sarveṣu māmakeṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:482: 07,005.010c paśya senāpatiṃ yuktam anu śāṃtanavād iha
GE07mbh_07_u:483: 07,005.011a yaṃ hi senāpraṇetāraṃ bhavān vakṣyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:484: 07,005.011c taṃ vayaṃ sahitāḥ sarve prakariṣyāma māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:490: 07,005.014a yugapan na tu te śakyāḥ kartuṃ sarve puraḥsarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:491: 07,005.014c eka evātra kartavyo yasmin vaiśeṣikā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:493: 07,005.015c śeṣā vimanaso vyaktaṃ na yotsyante hi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:494: 07,005.016a ayaṃ tu sarvayodhānām ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:495: 07,005.016c yuktaḥ senāpatiḥ kartuṃ droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:496: 07,005.017a ko hi tiṣṭhati durdharṣe droṇe brahmaviduttame
GE07mbh_07_u:498: 07,005.018a na ca sa hy asti te yodhaḥ sarvarājasu bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:499: 07,005.018c yo droṇaṃ samare yāntaṃ nānuyāsyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:501: 07,005.019c eṣa buddhimatāṃ caiva śreṣṭho rājan guruś ca te
GE07mbh_07_u:505: 07,005.021a karṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:508: 07,005.022c vīryād dākṣyād adhṛṣyatvād arthajñānān nayāj jayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:509: 07,005.023a tapasā ca kṛtajñatvād vṛddhaḥ sarvaguṇair api
GE07mbh_07_u:510: 07,005.023c yukto bhavatsamo goptā rājñām anyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:511: 07,005.024a sa bhavān pātu naḥ sarvān vibudhān iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:513: 07,005.025a rudrāṇām iva kāpālī vasūnām iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:514: 07,005.025c kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:515: 07,005.026a vasiṣṭha iva viprāṇāṃ tejasām iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:518: 07,005.027b*0041_01 sarveṣām eva lokānāṃ viśvasya ca yathā kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:520: 07,005.027c śreṣṭhaḥ senāpraṇetṝṇāṃ sa naḥ senāpatir bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:521: 07,005.028a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca vaśagāḥ santu te 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:522: 07,005.028c tābhiḥ śatrūn prativyūhya jahīndro dānavān iva
GE07mbh_07_u:523: 07,005.029a prayātu no bhavān agre devānām iva pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:526: 07,005.030c agre bhavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā no nārjunaḥ prasahiṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:529: 07,005.032a evam ukte tato droṇe jayety ūcur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:531: 07,005.033a sainikāś ca mudā yuktā vardhayanti dvijottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:533: 07,005.033d*0042_01 menire nihitān pārthān ātmanaś cottamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:534: 07,005.033d*0043_01 duryodhanaṃ tadā rājan droṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:536: 07,005.034a vedaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ vedāham arthavidyāṃ ca mānavīm
GE07mbh_07_u:538: 07,005.035a ye cāpy uktā mayi guṇā bhavadbhir jayakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:539: 07,005.035c cikīrṣus tān ahaṃ satyān yodhayiṣyāmi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:540: 07,005.035d*0044_01 pārṣataṃ tu raṇe rājan na haniṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:541: 07,005.035d*0044_02 sa hi sṛṣṭo vadhārthāya mamaiva puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:543: 07,005.035d*0044_04 na ca māṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe yodhayiṣyanti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:545: 07,005.036a sa evam abhyanujñātaś cakre senāpatiṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:546: 07,005.036c droṇaṃ tava suto rājan vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:549: 07,005.037c senāpatye yathā skandaṃ purā śakramukhāḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:551: 07,005.038c prādurāsīt kṛte droṇe harṣaḥ senāpatau tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:557: 07,005.040c satkṛtya vidhivad droṇaṃ jitān manyanta pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:560: 07,006.001c yuyutsur vyūhya sainyāni prāyāt tava sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:561: 07,006.002a saindhavaś ca kaliṅgaś ca vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:565: 07,006.004a kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca citraseno viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:568: 07,006.005c yayur aśvair mahāvegaiḥ śakāś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:570: 07,006.006c śibayaḥ śūrasenāś ca śūdrāś ca maladaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:571: 07,006.007a sauvīrāḥ kitavāḥ prācyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:575: 07,006.009a tasya dīpto mahākāyaḥ svāny anīkāni harṣayan
GE07mbh_07_u:577: 07,006.010a na bhīṣmavyasanaṃ kaś cid dṛṣṭvā karṇam amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:578: 07,006.010c viśokāś cābhavan sarve rājānaḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:579: 07,006.011a hṛṣṭāś ca bahavo yodhās tatrājalpanta saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:580: 07,006.011c na hi karṇaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā yudhi sthāsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:581: 07,006.012a karṇo hi samare śakto jetuṃ devān savāsavān
GE07mbh_07_u:583: 07,006.013a bhīṣmeṇa tu raṇe pārthāḥ pālitā bāhuśālinā
GE07mbh_07_u:584: 07,006.013c tāṃs tu karṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair nāśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_07_u:585: 07,006.014a evaṃ bruvantas te 'nyonyaṃ hṛṣṭarūpā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:586: 07,006.014c rādheyaṃ pūjayantaś ca praśaṃsantaś ca niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:588: 07,006.015c pareṣāṃ krauñca evāsīd vyūho rājan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:594: 07,006.018a dīpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:595: 07,006.018c yathā prajvalitaḥ sūryo yugānte vai vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_07_u:596: 07,006.018d*0047_01 arjunena tathā rājan tāpitā bhāratī camūḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:597: 07,006.018d*0048_01 dīpyan dṛśyeta hi tathā ketuḥ sarvatra dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:598: 07,006.019a asyatām arjunaḥ śreṣṭho gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanuṣāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:599: 07,006.019c vāsudevaś ca bhūtānāṃ cakrāṇāṃ ca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:600: 07,006.020a catvāry etāni tejāṃsi vahañ śvetahayo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:603: 07,006.021c tāvakānāṃ mukhaṃ karṇaḥ pareṣāṃ ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:615: 07,006.025c gṛdhrāḥ śyenā baḍāḥ kaṅkā vāyasāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:616: 07,006.025e upary upari senāṃ te tadā paryapatan nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:617: 07,006.026a gomāyavaś ca prākrośan bhayadān dāruṇān ravān
GE07mbh_07_u:618: 07,006.026c akārṣur apasavyaṃ ca bahuśaḥ pṛtanāṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:624: 07,006.029a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prādurāsan sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:628: 07,006.031a te tv anyonyaṃ susaṃrabdhāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:632: 07,006.033a droṇam abhyudyataṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:633: 07,006.033c pratyagṛhṇaṃs tadā rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:643: 07,006.038c saṃnivārya tataḥ senāṃ kurūn apy avadhīd balī
GE07mbh_07_u:644: 07,006.039a saṃhṛtya tu tato droṇaḥ samavasthāpya cāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:646: 07,006.040a sa bāṇavarṣaṃ sumahad asṛjat pārṣataṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:650: 07,006.042a atha paryapatad droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:658: 07,007.001c vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavā dṛṣṭvā na cainaṃ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:661: 07,007.003a tatrainam arjunaś caiva pārṣataś ca sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:666: 07,007.005c cekitānaś ca saṃkruddho yuyutsuś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:669: 07,007.007a saṃgṛhyamāṇāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavair vāhinīṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:671: 07,007.008a sa tīvraṃ kopam āsthāya rathe samaradurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:673: 07,007.009a rathān aśvān narān nāgān abhidhāvaṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:676: 07,007.010c ājāneyā hayā rājann avibhrāntāḥ śriyaṃ dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:677: 07,007.011a tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ yatavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:678: 07,007.011c dṛṣṭvā saṃprādravan yodhāḥ pāṇḍavasya tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:679: 07,007.012a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ punar āvartatām api
GE07mbh_07_u:683: 07,007.014a tataḥ punar api droṇo nāma viśrāvayan yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:684: 07,007.014c akarod raudram ātmānaṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ parān
GE07mbh_07_u:685: 07,007.015a sa tathā tāny anīkāni pāṇḍaveyasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:686: 07,007.015c kālavan nyavadhīd droṇo yuveva sthaviro balī
GE07mbh_07_u:687: 07,007.016a utkṛtya ca śirāṃsy ugro bāhūn api sabhūṣaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:690: 07,007.017c prākampanta raṇe yodhā gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:696: 07,007.020c droṇam āsādayāṃ cakruḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:702: 07,007.023c tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu caran ketur adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:717: 07,007.027a sā yodhasaṃghaiś ca rathaiś ca bhūmiḥ;
GE07mbh_07_u:728: droṇo gataḥ svargam ito hi rājan
GE07mbh_07_u:729: 07,007.029d*0051_01 sa tu kṛtvā mahatkarma droṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:733: 07,007.031c nihatya paścād dhṛtimān agacchat paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:735: 07,007.032c hato rukmaratho rājan kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:737: 07,007.033c sainyānāṃ ca tato rājann ācārye nihate yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:738: 07,007.034a dyāṃ dharāṃ khaṃ diśo vāri pradiśaś cānunādayan
GE07mbh_07_u:739: 07,007.034c aho dhig iti bhūtānāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:740: 07,007.035a devatāḥ pitaraś caiva pūrve ye cāsya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:742: 07,007.036a pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā siṃhanādān pracakrire
GE07mbh_07_u:746: 07,007.036d*0052_03 niśamya kaś cid dhi na harṣam eyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:749: 07,008.001a kiṃ kurvāṇaṃ raṇe droṇaṃ jaghnuḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:752: 07,008.002c pramatto vābhavad droṇas tato mṛtyum upeyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:753: 07,008.003a kathaṃ nu pārṣatas tāta śatrubhir duṣpradharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:757: 07,008.005a pāñcālaputro nyavadhīd diṣṭyā sa varam acyutam
GE07mbh_07_u:758: 07,008.005c kurvāṇaṃ dāruṇaṃ karma raṇe yattaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:759: 07,008.006a vyaktaṃ diṣṭaṃ hi balavat pauruṣād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:760: 07,008.006c yad droṇo nihataḥ śūraḥ pārṣatena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:761: 07,008.007a astraṃ caturvidhaṃ vīre yasminn āsīt pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:762: 07,008.007c tam iṣvastravarācāryaṃ droṇaṃ śaṃsasi me hatam
GE07mbh_07_u:765: 07,008.009a na nūnaṃ paraduḥkhena kaś cin mriyati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:766: 07,008.009c yatra droṇam ahaṃ śrutvā hataṃ jīvāmi na mriye
GE07mbh_07_u:767: 07,008.009d*0053_01 daivam eva paraṃ manye na sunītaṃ na pauruṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:768: 07,008.009d*0053_02 madīyo nāyako yatra guṇaśreṣṭho hataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:770: 07,008.010c yac chrutvā nihataṃ droṇaṃ śatadhā na vidīryate
GE07mbh_07_u:771: 07,008.011a brāhme vede tatheṣv astre yam upāsan guṇārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:772: 07,008.011c brāhmaṇā rājaputrāś ca sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:777: 07,008.014a mandānāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśā yasya vikrame
GE07mbh_07_u:780: 07,008.014d*0054_02 yaṃ mṛtyur vaśagas tiṣṭhet sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:781: 07,008.015a te ca śoṇā bṛhanto 'śvāḥ saindhavā hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:784: 07,008.016c dṛḍhāḥ saṃgrāmamadhyeṣu kaccid āsan na vihvalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:791: 07,008.019d*0055_01 taṃ tu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidravanti sma śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:792: 07,008.019d*0055_02 divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ saṃgatāḥ sarvataḥ pare
GE07mbh_07_u:794: 07,008.020c bhāradvājaḥ kim akaroc chūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:796: 07,008.021c sa satyasaṃdho balavān droṇaḥ kim akarod yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:797: 07,008.022a divi śakram iva śreṣṭhaṃ mahāmātraṃ dhanurbhṛtām
GE07mbh_07_u:798: 07,008.022c ke nu taṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ yuddhe pratyudyayū rathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:799: 07,008.023a nanu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā pradravanti sma pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:800: 07,008.023c divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ senāṃ kṣiṇvantam avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:805: 07,008.026a na hy anyaṃ paripaśyāmi vadhe kaṃ cana śuṣmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:808: 07,008.027a tair vṛtaḥ sarvataḥ śūraiḥ pāñcālyāpasadas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:809: 07,008.027c kekayaiś cedikārūṣair matsyair anyaiś ca bhūmipaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:811: 07,008.028c karmaṇy asukare saktaṃ jaghāneti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:814: 07,008.029d*0057_01 kṣatraṃ ca brahma caiveha yo 'nvatiṣṭhat paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:815: 07,008.029d*0058_01 dṛptānāṃ pratiṣeddhā ca cakṣur āsīd acakṣuṣām
GE07mbh_07_u:817: 07,008.029e sa kathaṃ brāhmaṇo vṛddhaḥ śastreṇa vadham āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:819: 07,008.030c anarhamāṇaḥ kaunteyaḥ karmaṇas tasya tat phalam
GE07mbh_07_u:821: 07,008.031c sa satyasaṃdhaḥ sukṛtī śrīkāmair nihataḥ katham
GE07mbh_07_u:822: 07,008.032a divi śakra iva śreṣṭho mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:823: 07,008.032c sa kathaṃ nihataḥ pārthaiḥ kṣudramatsyair yathā timiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:825: 07,008.033b*0059_01 vā kathaṃ nihataḥ pāpai raṇe brāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:826: 07,008.033c na yasya jīvitākāṅkṣī viṣayaṃ prāpya jīvati
GE07mbh_07_u:827: 07,008.034a yaṃ dvau na jahataḥ śabdau jīvamānaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_07_u:828: 07,008.034c brāhmaś ca vedakāmānāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca dhanurbhṛtām
GE07mbh_07_u:832: 07,008.035b*0061_02 ke purastād ayudhyanta rakṣanto droṇam antikāt
GE07mbh_07_u:833: 07,008.035b*0061_03 ke nu paścād avartanta gacchato durgamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:836: 07,008.035d*0062_02 brahmakṣatre ca yasyāstāṃ vaśe sthāṇor ivākhile
GE07mbh_07_u:839: 07,008.036a ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ savyaṃ ke ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:840: 07,008.036c purastāt ke ca vīrasya yudhyamānasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:841: 07,008.037a ke ca tatra tanuṃ tyaktvā pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajan
GE07mbh_07_u:842: 07,008.037c droṇasya samare vīrāḥ ke 'kurvanta parāṃ dhṛtim
GE07mbh_07_u:843: 07,008.037d*0063_01 kaccin nainaṃ bhayān mandāḥ kṣatriyā vyajahan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:844: 07,008.037d*0063_02 rakṣitāras tataḥ śūnye kaccin naiko hataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:845: 07,008.037d*0063_03 na sa pṛṣṭham ares trāsād raṇe śauryāt pradarśayet
GE07mbh_07_u:846: 07,008.037d*0063_04 parām apy āpadaṃ prāpya sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:848: 07,008.037d*0064_02 jetum utsahate droṇaḥ sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:849: 07,008.038a etad āryeṇa kartavyaṃ kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:850: 07,008.038c parākramed yathāśaktyā tac ca tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:851: 07,008.038d*0065_01 kaccin nainaṃ bhayāt kṣudrāḥ pārthebhyaḥ pradadū raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:852: 07,008.038d*0065_02 goptṛbhis taiḥ samutsṛṣṭaḥ kaccin naiṣa parair hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:853: 07,008.038d*0065_03 dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ hi paśyāmi nighnantam iva brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:855: 07,008.039a muhyate me manas tāta kathā tāvan nivartyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:856: 07,008.039b*0066_01 kṣaṇam ekam ahaṃ sūta na śakṣyāmīti jalpitum
GE07mbh_07_u:857: 07,008.039c bhūyas tu labdhasaṃjñas tvā pariprakṣyāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:869: 07,009.006a sa labdhvā śanakaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vepamāno mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:871: 07,009.007a yat tad udyann ivādityo jyotiṣā praṇudaṃs tamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:872: 07,009.007c āyād ajātaśatrur vai kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:873: 07,009.008a prabhinnam iva mātaṅgaṃ tathā kruddhaṃ tarasvinam
GE07mbh_07_u:876: 07,009.009a ati cānyān raṇe yodhān vīraḥ puruṣasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:877: 07,009.009c yo hy eko hi mahābāhur nirdahed ghoracakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:880: 07,009.010c dāntaṃ bahumataṃ loke ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan

GE07mbh_07_u:1202: 07,011.016b*0090_04 viṣṇur dāsyati kṛṣṇāyai kuntyai vā puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1203: 07,011.016c ya eva caiṣāṃ śeṣaḥ syāt sa evāsmān na śeṣayet

GE07mbh_07_u:1216: 07,011.021c pratyudyātum atas tāta naitad āmarṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:1217: 07,011.022a asaṃśayaṃ sa śiṣyo me matpūrvaś cāstrakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:1218: 07,011.022c taruṇaḥ kīrtiyuktaś ca ekāyanagataś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1219: 07,011.023a astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca bhūyāṃsi samavāptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:1220: 07,011.023c amarṣitaś ca te rājaṃs tena nāmarṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:1222: 07,011.024c apanīte tataḥ pārthe dharmarājo jitas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:1223: 07,011.025a grahaṇaṃ cej jayaṃ tasya manyase puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:1226: 07,011.026c ānayiṣyāmi te rājan vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1227: 07,011.027a yadi sthāsyati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api me 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1229: 07,011.028a phalgunasya samakṣaṃ tu na hi pārtho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1230: 07,011.028c grahītuṃ samare śakyaḥ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1232: 07,011.029*0093_01 evam ukte tadā tasmin yuddhe devāsuropame
GE07mbh_07_u:1233: 07,011.029a sāntaraṃ tu pratijñāte rājño droṇena nigrahe
GE07mbh_07_u:1234: 07,011.029c gṛhītaṃ tam amanyanta tava putrāḥ subāliśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1235: 07,011.030a pāṇḍaveṣu hi sāpekṣaṃ droṇaṃ jānāti te sutaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:1245: 07,012.003a tataḥ sarvān samānāyya bhrātṝn sainyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1246: 07,012.003c abravīd dharmarājas tu dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1248: 07,012.004c yathā tan na bhavet satyaṃ tathā nītir vidhīyatām

GE07mbh_07_u:1254: 07,012.007a yathā me na vadhaḥ kārya ācāryasya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:1255: 07,012.007c tathā tava parityāgo na me rājaṃś cikīrṣitaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:1264: 07,012.012a mayi jīvati rājendra na bhayaṃ kartum arhasi

GE07mbh_07_u:1267: 07,012.013a na smarāmy anṛtāṃ vācaṃ na smarāmi parājayam
GE07mbh_07_u:1268: 07,012.013c na smarāmi pratiśrutya kiṃ cid apy anapākṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:1270: 07,012.014a tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ saha

GE07mbh_07_u:1281: 07,012.019c na śekuḥ sṛñjayā rājaṃs tad dhi droṇena pālitam
GE07mbh_07_u:1283: 07,012.020c na śekuḥ pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ pālyamānāṃ kirīṭinā

GE07mbh_07_u:1290: 07,012.024a tena muktāḥ śarā ghorā viceruḥ sarvatodiśam

GE07mbh_07_u:1301: 07,013.001a tataḥ sa pāṇḍavānīke janayaṃs tumulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:1302: 07,013.001c vyacarat pāṇḍavān droṇo dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1307: 07,013.004a rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva nāgān aśvān padātinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1308: 07,013.004c raudrā hastavatā muktāḥ pramathnanti sma sāyakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1311: 07,013.006a vyacarat sa tadā rājan senāṃ vikṣobhayan prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1314: 07,013.007c bhramad rathāmbude tasmin dṛśyate sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1315: 07,013.008a sa vīraḥ satyavān prājño dharmanityaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1337: 07,013.017a nihatān prāṇinaḥ saṃkhye droṇena balinā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1342: 07,013.019a taṃ jayantam anīkāni tāni tāny eva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:1348: 07,013.022a tasya mādrīsutaḥ ketuṃ dhanuḥ sūtaṃ hayān api

GE07mbh_07_u:1352: 07,013.023c sa tasya gadayā rājan rathāt sūtam apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:1353: 07,013.024a tatas tau virathau rājan gadāhastau mahābalau
GE07mbh_07_u:1354: 07,013.024c cikrīḍatū raṇe śūrau saśṛṅgāv iva parvatau
GE07mbh_07_u:1358: 07,013.025c bahubhis tena cābhyastas taṃ vivyādha śatādhikaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1360: 07,013.026c viddhvā nākampayad vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavat

GE07mbh_07_u:1364: 07,013.028a sa tan na mamṛṣe vīraḥ śatror vijayam āhave

GE07mbh_07_u:1372: 07,013.030d*0104_01 ciccheda samare yattaḥ sa ca yuddhād upāramat
GE07mbh_07_u:1374: 07,013.031c kṛpaṃ vivyādha saptatyā lakṣma cāsyāharat tribhiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:1385: 07,013.037a tat pauruṣam abhūt tatra sūtaputrasya dāruṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:1386: 07,013.037c yat sainyaṃ vārayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:1398: 07,013.040a śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ saumadattiṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:1399: 07,013.040c navatyā sāyakānāṃ tu kampayām āsa bhārata

GE07mbh_07_u:1406: 07,013.040f*0108_06 kālameghāv iva gajau lokānāṃ bhartsya garjanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:1416: 07,013.043b*0109_03 tau putrau tava durdharṣau yuyudhāte parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:1419: 07,013.044c yathā viṣṇuḥ purā rājan hiraṇyākṣeṇa saṃyuge

GE07mbh_07_u:1424: 07,013.047a pauravas tv atha saubhadraṃ śaravrātair avākirat

GE07mbh_07_u:1497: 07,013.080a teṣāṃ ca priyam anvicchan sūtasya ca parābhavāt

GE07mbh_07_u:2573: 07,023.001a vyathayeyur ime senāṃ devānām api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:2576: 07,023.002c tasminn eva tu sarvārthā dṛśyante vai pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2579: 07,023.004a sa eva mahatīṃ senāṃ samāvartayad āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:2580: 07,023.004c kim anyad daivasaṃyogān mama putrasya cābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:2581: 07,023.005a yukta eva hi bhāgyena dhruvam utpadyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2582: 07,023.005c sa tathākṛṣyate tena na yathā svayam icchati
GE07mbh_07_u:2585: 07,023.007a ardhaṃ me kekayā labdhāḥ kāśikāḥ kosalāś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:2586: 07,023.007c cedayaś cāpare vaṅgā mām eva samupāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2587: 07,023.008a pṛthivī bhūyasī tāta mama pārthasya no tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:2588: 07,023.008c iti mām abravīt sūta mando duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:2594: 07,023.011c bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_07_u:2595: 07,023.012a yan mā kṣattābravīt tāta prapaśyan putragṛddhinam
GE07mbh_07_u:2596: 07,023.012c duryodhanena tat sarvaṃ prāptaṃ sūta mayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:2597: 07,023.013a nṛśaṃsaṃ tu paraṃ tat syāt tyaktvā duryodhanaṃ yadi
GE07mbh_07_u:2598: 07,023.013c putraśeṣaṃ cikīrṣeyaṃ kṛcchraṃ na maraṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:2599: 07,023.014a yo hi dharmaṃ parityajya bhavaty arthaparo naraḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:2601: 07,023.015a adya cāpy asya rāṣṭrasya hatotsāhasya saṃjaya

GE07mbh_07_u:2606: 07,023.017a vyaktam eva ca me śaṃsa yathā yuddham avartata

GE07mbh_07_u:2608: 07,023.018a dhanaṃjayaṃ ca me śaṃsa yad yac cakre ratharṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2609: 07,023.018c tasmād bhayaṃ no bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhrātṛvyāc ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2610: 07,023.019a yathāsīc ca nivṛtteṣu pāṇḍaveṣu ca saṃjaya

GE07mbh_07_u:2613: 07,023.019e māmakānāṃ ca ye śūrāḥ kāṃs tatra samavārayan

GE07mbh_07_u:2616: 07,024.001c dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ chādyamānaṃ tair bhāskaram ivāmbudaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2617: 07,024.002a taiś coddhūtaṃ rajas tīvram avacakre camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:2618: 07,024.002c tato hatam amanyāma droṇaṃ dṛṣṭipathe hate
GE07mbh_07_u:2619: 07,024.003a tāṃs tu śūrān maheṣvāsān krūraṃ karma cikīrṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2623: 07,024.004d*0173_01 evam uktvā svayaṃ bhīmam abhyayāt tanayas tava

GE07mbh_07_u:2625: 07,024.005a tato durmarṣaṇo bhīmam abhyagacchat sutas tava

GE07mbh_07_u:2630: 07,024.007c bāhyaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ kṛtvā pratyatiṣṭhan parān yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:2631: 07,024.008a kṛtavarmā śineḥ putraṃ droṇaprepsuṃ viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:2683: 07,024.029a tiṣṭhantam agrato dṛṣṭvā prativindhyaṃ tam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:2684: 07,024.029c drauṇir mānaṃ pituḥ kurvan mārgaṇaiḥ samavārayat

GE07mbh_07_u:2807: 07,025.008c bhuvaneṣv iva sarveṣu gabhastīn udito raviḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:2813: 07,025.011c kṣayaṃ ninīṣur niśitair bhīmo vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2816: 07,025.013a tasya nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ ratnacitraṃ dhvaje sthitam

GE07mbh_07_u:2861: 07,025.027c tathā vṛddhasya caritaṃ kuñjareṇa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:2875: 07,025.033a sa kuñjarastho rathibhiḥ śuśubhe sarvato vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2885: 07,025.036a śineḥ pautrasya tu rathaṃ parigṛhya mahādvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2887: 07,025.037a bṛhataḥ saindhavān aśvān samutthāpya tu sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2888: 07,025.037c tasthau sātyakim āsādya saṃplutas taṃ rathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2889: 07,025.038a sa tu labdhvāntaraṃ nāgas tvarito rathamaṇḍalāt
GE07mbh_07_u:2891: 07,025.039a te tv āśugatinā tena trāsyamānā nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2892: 07,025.039c tam ekaṃ dviradaṃ saṃkhye menire śataśo nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2895: 07,025.041a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ pāñcālānām itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2900: 07,025.043c siktvā vyatrāsayan nāgas te pārtham aharaṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2907: 07,025.047a ta enaṃ śaradhārābhir dhārābhir iva toyadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2911: 07,025.049a so 'dhiṣṭhāya padā vāhān yuyutsoḥ sūtam ārujat
GE07mbh_07_u:2912: 07,025.049b*0195_01 rathaṃ babhañja saṃkruddhaś caṇḍavāto yathā drumam
GE07mbh_07_u:2913: 07,025.049b*0196_01 yuyutsus tu rathād rājann apākrāmat tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2914: 07,025.049b*0196_02 tataḥ pāṇḍavayodhās te nāgarājaṃ śarair drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:2915: 07,025.049c putras tu tava saṃbhrāntaḥ saubhadrasyāpluto ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:2916: 07,025.050a sa kuñjarastho visṛjann iṣūn ariṣu pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2920: 07,025.051a tam ārjunir dvādaśabhir yuyutsur daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2921: 07,025.051c tribhis tribhir draupadeyā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vivyadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2923: 07,025.051d*0198_02 pratyavidhyac charaiḥ sarvān bhagadattas tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2925: 07,025.052c saṃsyūta iva sūryasya raśmibhir jalado mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:2927: 07,025.053c paricikṣepa tān nāgaḥ sa ripūn savyadakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:2928: 07,025.054a gopāla iva daṇḍena yathā paśugaṇān vane
GE07mbh_07_u:2929: 07,025.054c āveṣṭayata tāṃ senāṃ bhagadattas tathā muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2931: 07,025.055b*0199_01 rajaś ca sumahad rājann antarikṣaṃ samācinot
GE07mbh_07_u:2932: 07,025.055b*0200_01 sa reṇumārgo viyati bhāti daṇḍa ivotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2942: 07,025.057c kṣitiṃ viyad dyāṃ vidiśo diśas tathā;
GE07mbh_07_u:2954: 07,026.001a yan māṃ pārthasya saṃgrāme karmāṇi paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:2955: 07,026.001c tac chṛṇuṣva mahārāja pārtho yad akaron mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:2956: 07,026.002a rajo dṛṣṭvā samudbhūtaṃ śrutvā ca gajanisvanam
GE07mbh_07_u:2961: 07,026.004c prathamo vā dvitīyo vā pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2968: 07,026.006d*0203_03 dṛṣṭvā vinadya sahasā mama senāṃ pramṛdnati
GE07mbh_07_u:2969: 07,026.007a na cāvābhyām ṛte 'nyo 'sti śaktas taṃ pratibādhitum
GE07mbh_07_u:2973: 07,026.009a vacanād atha kṛṣṇas tu prayayau savyasācinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2975: 07,026.010a taṃ prayāntaṃ tataḥ paścād āhvayanto mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2980: 07,026.012c āhūyamānasya ca tair abhavad dhṛdayaṃ dvidhā
GE07mbh_07_u:2981: 07,026.013a kiṃ nu śreyaskaraṃ karma bhaved iti vicintayan
GE07mbh_07_u:2982: 07,026.013c ito vā vinivarteyaṃ gaccheyaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:2987: 07,026.016a sā hi duryodhanasyāsīn matiḥ karṇasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2989: 07,026.017a sa tu saṃvartayām āsa dvaidhībhāvena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2990: 07,026.017c rathena tu rathāgryāṇām akarot tāṃ mṛṣā tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:2993: 07,026.019a naiva kuntīsutaḥ pārtho naiva kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2994: 07,026.019c na hayā na ratho rājan dṛśyante sma śaraiś citāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:2999: 07,026.020a yadā moham anuprāptaḥ sasvedaś ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3000: 07,026.020b*0206_01 tato janārdanaḥ pārthaṃ pratyuvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:3001: 07,026.020b*0206_02 vajram astraṃ tu saṃdhāya jahi saṃśaptakān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:3002: 07,026.020c tatas tān prāyaśaḥ pārtho vajrāstreṇa nijaghnivān
GE07mbh_07_u:3004: 07,026.021c ketavo vājinaḥ sūtā rathinaś cāpatan kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:3010: 07,026.024c saṃchinnā bāhavaḥ petur nṛṇāṃ bhallaiḥ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:3015: 07,026.027a kṣobhayantaṃ tadā senāṃ dviradaṃ nalinīm iva
GE07mbh_07_u:3016: 07,026.027c dhanaṃjayaṃ bhūtagaṇāḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:3017: 07,026.028a dṛṣṭvā tat karma pārthasya vāsavasyeva mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3018: 07,026.028c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā talam āhatya pūjayat
GE07mbh_07_u:3019: 07,026.028d*0207_01 karmaitat pārtha śakreṇa yamena dhanadena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:3020: 07,026.028d*0207_02 duṣkaraṃ samare yat te kṛtam adyeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3023: 07,026.029a tataḥ saṃśaptakān hatvā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3028: 07,027.002a taṃ prayāntaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ svāṃs trātuṃ droṇatāpitān
GE07mbh_07_u:3030: 07,027.003a tataḥ śvetahayaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīd ajitaṃ jayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3033: 07,027.004c dvaidhībhūtaṃ mano me 'dya kṛtaṃ saṃśaptakair idam
GE07mbh_07_u:3034: 07,027.005a kiṃ nu saṃśaptakān hanmi svān rakṣāmy ahitārditān
GE07mbh_07_u:3035: 07,027.005c iti me tvaṃ mataṃ vettha tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:3036: 07,027.006a evam uktas tu dāśārhaḥ syandanaṃ pratyavartayat
GE07mbh_07_u:3039: 07,027.007c dhvajaṃ dhanuś cāsya tathā kṣurābhyāṃ samakṛntata
GE07mbh_07_u:3041: 07,027.008c sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ tvaritaḥ pārthaḥ praiṣīd yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:3044: 07,027.010a śaktiṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś chittvā tomaraṃ tribhir arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3047: 07,027.011c rājaṃs tāvakasainyānāṃ nograṃ kaś cid avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:3048: 07,027.012a tato dhanaṃjayo bāṇais tata eva mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:3049: 07,027.012c āyād vinighnan kauravyān dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3050: 07,027.013a tasya vegam asahyaṃ tu kuntīputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3051: 07,027.013c nāśaknuvaṃs te saṃsoḍhuṃ sparśam agner iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3056: 07,027.016a tad eva tava putrasya rājan durdyūtadevinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3058: 07,027.017a tathā vikṣobhyamāṇā sā pārthena tava vāhinī
GE07mbh_07_u:3061: 07,027.018c matiṃ kṛtvā raṇe kruddhā vīrā jayaparājaye
GE07mbh_07_u:3063: 07,027.019c ārchat pārtho guruṃ bhāraṃ sarvabhārasaho yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:3065: 07,027.020c mṛdnīyāt tadvad āyastaḥ pārtho 'mṛdnāc camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:3070: 07,027.023a kalpitābhyāṃ yathāśāstraṃ rathena ca gajena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:3074: 07,027.025a sa cāpi śaravarṣaṃ tac charavarṣeṇa vāsaviḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3077: 07,027.025d*0209_01 vavarṣa śaravarṣaṃ tu punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3078: 07,027.026a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā śaravarṣaṃ nivārya tat
GE07mbh_07_u:3079: 07,027.026c śarair jaghne mahābāhuṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:3082: 07,027.028a tam āpatantaṃ dviradaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham ivāntakam
GE07mbh_07_u:3085: 07,027.029c sārohaṃ mṛtyusāt kartuṃ smaran dharmaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3086: 07,027.030a sa tu nāgo dviparathān hayāṃś cārujya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:3089: 07,028.001a tathā kruddhaḥ kim akarod bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3090: 07,028.001c prāgjyotiṣo vā pārthasya tan me śaṃsa yathātatham
GE07mbh_07_u:3094: 07,028.003a tathā hi śaravarṣāṇi pātayaty aniśaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:3099: 07,028.005c nirbhidya devakīputraṃ kṣitiṃ jagmuḥ śarās tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3100: 07,028.006a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nihatya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:3104: 07,028.008a tato nāgasya tad varma vyadhamat pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3105: 07,028.008c śarajālena sa babhau vyabhraḥ parvatarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_07_u:3107: 07,028.008c*0210_02 viśīrṇavarmā sa gajaḥ śaraiḥ subhṛśam arditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3111: 07,028.010a tataś chatraṃ dhvajaṃ caiva chittvā rājño 'rjunaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3117: 07,028.013a parivṛttaṃ kirīṭaṃ taṃ yamayann eva phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3118: 07,028.013c sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loka iti rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:3119: 07,028.014a evam uktas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:3122: 07,028.014d*0211_02 jagmatur naiva saṃmohaṃ cukṣubhāte na cācyutau
GE07mbh_07_u:3123: 07,028.015a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā tūṇīrān saṃnikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:3127: 07,028.016d*0212_01 tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:3131: 07,028.018a vaijayanty abhavan mālā tad astraṃ keśavorasi
GE07mbh_07_u:3140: 07,028.019c ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣa pratijñāṃ svāṃ na rakṣasi
GE07mbh_07_u:3141: 07,028.019d*0214_01 idam astram avasthāpya prāptaṃ māṃ devakīsuta
GE07mbh_07_u:3143: 07,028.020a yady ahaṃ vyasanī vā syām aśakto vā nivāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:3144: 07,028.020c tatas tvayaivaṃ kāryaṃ syān na tu kāryaṃ mayi sthite
GE07mbh_07_u:3146: 07,028.021c śakto lokān imāñ jetuṃ tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:3148: 07,028.022c śṛṇu guhyam idaṃ pārtha yathā vṛttaṃ purānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:3151: 07,028.022d*0215_03 sa saṃgamya tayā sārdhaṃ prītas tasyai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:3152: 07,028.022d*0215_04 sā vavre viṣṇusadṛśaṃ putram astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavam
GE07mbh_07_u:3153: 07,028.022d*0215_05 babhūva ca sutas tasyāṃ narako nāma viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3154: 07,028.022d*0215_06 astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tasmai dadau nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:3157: 07,028.022d*0216_03 nāsyāvadhyo 'sti loke 'smin mad anyaḥ kaś cid arjuna
GE07mbh_07_u:3159: 07,028.022d*0216_04 tasmān mayā kṛtaṃ hy etan mā te 'bhūd buddhir anyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:3161: 07,028.022d*0216_06 jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ kṣipraṃ vākyaśeṣaṃ ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:3164: 07,028.024a ekā mūrtis tapaścaryāṃ kurute me bhuvi sthitā
GE07mbh_07_u:3166: 07,028.025a aparā kurute karma mānuṣaṃ lokam āśritā
GE07mbh_07_u:3167: 07,028.025c śete caturthī tv aparā nidrāṃ varṣasahasrikām
GE07mbh_07_u:3169: 07,028.026c varārhebhyo varāñ śreṣṭhāṃs tasmin kāle dadāti sā
GE07mbh_07_u:3170: 07,028.027a taṃ tu kālam anuprāptaṃ viditvā pṛthivī tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:3171: 07,028.027c prāyācata varaṃ yaṃ māṃ narakārthāya taṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:3172: 07,028.028a devānām asurāṇāṃ ca avadhyas tanayo 'stu me
GE07mbh_07_u:3173: 07,028.028c upeto vaiṣṇavāstreṇa tan me tvaṃ dātum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:3174: 07,028.029a evaṃ varam ahaṃ śrutvā jagatyās tanaye tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:3175: 07,028.029c amogham astram adadaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tad ahaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:3176: 07,028.030a avocaṃ caitad astraṃ vai hy amoghaṃ bhavatu kṣame
GE07mbh_07_u:3180: 07,028.032a tathety uktvā gatā devī kṛtakāmā manasvinī
GE07mbh_07_u:3182: 07,028.032c sa cāpy āsīd durādharṣo narakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3183: 07,028.033a tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ tad astraṃ pārtha māmakam
GE07mbh_07_u:3185: 07,028.033b*0218_02 sarvān samāgatān hanyāt kiṃ punas tvāṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:3186: 07,028.033b*0218_03 bhogināṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mayā dattaṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3187: 07,028.033b*0218_04 jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ pārtha purā sarvān hinasti saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3192: 07,028.035c yathāhaṃ jaghnivān pūrvaṃ hitārthaṃ narakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:3195: 07,028.036a evam uktas tataḥ pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:3201: 07,028.036d*0220_05 dakṣiṇāpi hatā rājan ghaṇṭā bāṇaiḥ kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3202: 07,028.036d*0220_06 papāta dūram adhvānaṃ gatvā sūrya iva kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:3208: 07,028.037d*0221_02 avidhyad arjuno nāgaṃ kumbhayor antare bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:3209: 07,028.038a samāsādya tu taṃ nāgaṃ bāṇo vajra ivācalam
GE07mbh_07_u:3210: 07,028.038c abhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3211: 07,028.038d*0222_01 sa karī bhagadattena preryamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3212: 07,028.038d*0222_02 na karoti vacas tasya daridrasyeva kāminī
GE07mbh_07_u:3213: 07,028.038d*0223_01 madhye vidīrṇas tasthau sa prāsyandata punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3215: 07,028.039a sa tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi dantābhyām avaniṃ yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:3225: 07,028.040b*0227_01 bibheda sakalo deho dvidhābhūto babhūva ha
GE07mbh_07_u:3226: 07,028.040b*0227_02 rājñā balavatā tena jānubhyāṃ dhārito raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:3227: 07,028.040b*0227_03 arjunaṃ prati yuddhe na cirakālaṃ dadhāra saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3228: 07,028.040b*0227_04 evaṃ yuddhaṃ tadā tena rājñā tena durātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:3232: 07,028.041c śarāsanaṃ śarāṃś caiva gatāsuḥ pramumoca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:3233: 07,028.042a śirasas tasya vibhraṣṭaḥ papāta ca varāṅkuśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3251: 07,029.001d*0228_06 trīṇi tejāṃsi tatraiva tretāgnir iva cādhvare
GE07mbh_07_u:3252: 07,029.001d*0228_07 bhagadattaṃ raṇe śūraṃ nihanyāt ko 'rjunaṃ vinā
GE07mbh_07_u:3254: 07,029.001d*0228_09 kṣatradharmaṃ vicintyājau dhig dhig ity eva cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:3255: 07,029.001d*0228_10 tam ādityasamaṃ kāntyā bhūmau nipatitaṃ divaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3256: 07,029.001d*0228_11 prasamīkṣya tadā pārtho reṇunā tv avaguṇṭhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:3259: 07,029.003a tau sametyārjunaṃ vīrau puraḥ paścāc ca dhanvinau
GE07mbh_07_u:3261: 07,029.004a vṛṣakasya hayān sūtaṃ dhanuś chatraṃ rathaṃ dhvajam
GE07mbh_07_u:3262: 07,029.004c tilaśo vyadhamat pārthaḥ saubalasya śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3267: 07,029.007a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avatīrya mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3268: 07,029.007c āruroha rathaṃ bhrātur anyac ca dhanur ādade
GE07mbh_07_u:3272: 07,029.009c bhṛśaṃ nijaghnatuḥ pārtham indraṃ vṛtrabalāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:3273: 07,029.010a labdhalakṣyau tu gāndhārāv ahatāṃ pāṇḍavaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3279: 07,029.013a tayor dehau rathād bhūmiṃ gatau bandhujanapriyau
GE07mbh_07_u:3280: 07,029.013c yaśo daśa diśaḥ puṇyaṃ gamayitvā vyavasthitau
GE07mbh_07_u:3282: 07,029.014c bhṛśaṃ mumucur aśrūṇi putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:3284: 07,029.015c kṛṣṇau saṃmohayan māyāṃ vidadhe śakunis tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:3289: 07,029.018a cakrāṇi viśikhāḥ prāsā vividhāny āyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:3290: 07,029.018c prapetuḥ sarvato digbhyaḥ pradigbhyaś cārjunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:3293: 07,029.020a vividhāni ca rakṣāṃsi kṣudhitāny arjunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:3297: 07,029.022a te hanyamānāḥ śūreṇa pravaraiḥ sāyakair dṛḍhaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:4150: 07,039.005c tat tvām idam anuprāptaṃ tat kopād vai mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:4151: 07,039.006a sadyaś cogram adharmasya phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmate
GE07mbh_07_u:4152: 07,039.006c śāsitāsmy adya te bāṇaiḥ sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4153: 07,039.007a adyāham anṛṇas tasya kopasya bhavitā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:4154: 07,039.007c amarṣitāyāḥ kṛṣṇāyāḥ kāṅkṣitasya ca me pituḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4155: 07,039.008a adya kauravya bhīmasya bhavitāsmy anṛṇo yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:4156: 07,039.008c na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:4159: 07,039.010a tasyoras tūrṇam āsādya jatrudeśe vibhidya tam
GE07mbh_07_u:4160: 07,039.010b*0286_01 tena taṃ jatrudeśe vai viddhvā parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4161: 07,039.010b*0287_01 jagāma saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4168: 07,039.013a pāṇḍavā draupadeyāś ca virāṭaś ca samīkṣya tam
GE07mbh_07_u:4180: 07,039.019a tato 'bhavan mahad yuddhaṃ tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:4186: 07,039.021b*0290_01 atha caite susaṃrabdhāḥ siṃhā iva balotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4190: 07,039.021d*0291_03 enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi ripuṃ yathā vṛtraṃ śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4191: 07,039.021d*0291_04 evam uktvā tu rādheyo rathārūḍho mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4192: 07,039.021d*0291_05 yayau yoddhuṃ mahāvīraḥ kurūṇāṃ tatra paśyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:4197: 07,039.022a tataḥ karṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair abhimanyuṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:4202: 07,039.024c avidhyat tvarito rājan droṇaṃ prepsur mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4203: 07,039.025a taṃ tadā nāśakat kaś cid droṇād vārayituṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:4212: 07,039.029c chittvā dhanūṃṣi śūrāṇām ārjuniḥ karṇam ārdayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4216: 07,039.029d*0292_04 asaṃbhrāntaś ca tān sarvān agṛhṇāt phalgunātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4219: 07,039.029e sa dhvajaṃ kārmukaṃ cāsya chittvā bhūmau nyapātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4220: 07,039.030a tataḥ kṛcchragataṃ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇād anantaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4221: 07,039.030c saubhadram abhyayāt tūrṇaṃ dṛḍham udyamya kārmukam
GE07mbh_07_u:4222: 07,039.031a tata uccukruśuḥ pārthās teṣāṃ cānucarā janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4223: 07,039.031c vāditrāṇi ca saṃjaghnuḥ saubhadraṃ cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4225: 07,040.001a so 'bhigarjan dhanuṣpāṇir jyāṃ vikarṣan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4232: 07,040.004c śiraḥ pracyāvayām āsa sa rathāt prāpatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:4235: 07,040.005c bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājan karṇo vyathāṃ yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:4238: 07,040.005d@006_0003 aprāptān eva tān sarvāṃś ciccheda laghuhastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:4241: 07,040.005d@006_0005 hayāṃś ca jaghne tvarito dhvajaṃ sārathinā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:4242: 07,040.005d@006_0006 rādheyaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā saubhadro vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:4244: 07,040.005d@006_0008 anyaṃ rathaṃ samāruhya yudhyasva ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4246: 07,040.005d@006_0010 pāṇḍavaiḥ saha paiśunyaṃ nitya tvaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:4247: 07,040.005d@006_0011 sabhāṃ nītvā ca pāñcālī vivastrā kāritā tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:4249: 07,040.005d@006_0013 dṛṣṭāni tatra yuṣmābhiḥ kurubhiś ca durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4252: 07,040.005d@006_0016 kulīnā ye ca rājāno dharmiṣṭhāḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4253: 07,040.005d@006_0017 cakrākhyaṃ ca na kurvanti vyūhaṃ pāpiṣṭhakāritam
GE07mbh_07_u:4254: 07,040.005d@006_0018 krauñcāḥ suparṇā haṃsāhvā muśalā gāruḍās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:4255: 07,040.005d@006_0019 ete vyūhāś ca śūrāṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:4256: 07,040.005d@006_0020 yūyaṃ daityāṃśasaṃbhūtāḥ sarve tatra na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4257: 07,040.005d@006_0021 ity evam uktvā sa tadā mahātmā
GE07mbh_07_u:4267: 07,040.008d*0295_01 tiṣṭha karṇa maheṣvāsa kṛpa duryodhaneti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4268: 07,040.008d*0295_02 droṇasya krośato rājaṃs tad anīkam abhajyata
GE07mbh_07_u:4269: 07,040.009a śalabhair iva cākāśe dhārābhir iva cāvṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:4270: 07,040.009c abhimanyoḥ śarai rājan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:4271: 07,040.010a tāvakānāṃ tu yodhānāṃ vadhyatāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4272: 07,040.010c anyatra saindhavād rājan na sma kaś cid atiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_07_u:4273: 07,040.011a saubhadras tu tataḥ śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4275: 07,040.012a sa kakṣe 'gnir ivotsṛṣṭo nirdahaṃs tarasā ripūn
GE07mbh_07_u:4281: 07,040.015a te ghorā raudrakarmāṇo vipāṭhāḥ pṛthavaḥ śitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4285: 07,040.017a śarāś cāpāni khaḍgāś ca śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4288: 07,040.018c akṣair vimathitaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4291: 07,040.019a nihataiḥ kṣatriyair aśvair vāraṇaiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:4295: 07,040.020e sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha diśaḥ sarvā vyanādayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4297: 07,040.021c vyacarat sa diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś cāhitān rujan
GE07mbh_07_u:4309: 07,041.002c api yaudhiṣṭhirāt sainyāt kaś cid anvapatad rathī
GE07mbh_07_u:4312: 07,041.003c dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca sakekayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4313: 07,041.003e dhṛṣṭaketuś ca saṃrabdho matsyāś cānvapatan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:4314: 07,041.003f*0298_01 tenaiva tu pathā yātāḥ pitaro mātulaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:4316: 07,041.004c tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrāṃs tvadīyā vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:4317: 07,041.005a tatas tad vimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava sūnor mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:4325: 07,041.008c yad ekaḥ pāṇḍavān kruddhān putragṛddhīn avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4326: 07,041.009a atyadbhutam idaṃ manye balaṃ śauryaṃ ca saindhave
GE07mbh_07_u:4327: 07,041.009c tad asya brūhi me vīryaṃ karma cāgryaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4328: 07,041.010a kiṃ dattaṃ hutam iṣṭaṃ vā sutaptam atha vā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4329: 07,041.010b*0299_01 damo vā brahmacaryaṃ vā sūta yac cāsya sattama
GE07mbh_07_u:4330: 07,041.010b*0299_02 devaṃ katamam ārādhya viṣṇum īśānam agnijam
GE07mbh_07_u:4333: 07,041.010d*0300_02 sindhurāṭtanayas tv eko yathā pārthān avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4336: 07,041.011c mānāt sa taptavān rājā varārthī sumahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4339: 07,041.012e devam ārādhayac charvaṃ gṛṇan brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_07_u:4340: 07,041.013a bhaktānukampī bhagavāṃs tasya cakre tato dayām
GE07mbh_07_u:4341: 07,041.013c svapnānte 'py atha caivāha haraḥ sindhupateḥ sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:4342: 07,041.013e varaṃ vṛṇīṣva prīto 'smi jayadratha kim icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:4343: 07,041.014a evam uktas tu śarveṇa sindhurājo jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4346: 07,041.015c eko raṇe dhārayeyaṃ samastān iti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:4348: 07,041.015d*0301_02 prīto maheśvaras tasmai varaṃ caivaṃ dadau tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:4349: 07,041.015d*0301_03 sa tu vavre varaṃ tatra pāṇḍaveyān ahaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:4351: 07,041.016a evam uktas tu deveśo jayadratham athābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:4352: 07,041.016c dadāmi te varaṃ saumya vinā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:4356: 07,041.017c evam astv iti deveśam uktvābudhyata pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4357: 07,041.017d*0303_01 tenoktas tam ṛte pārthaṃ śarvas tasmai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:4362: 07,041.019c parāṃs tu tava sainyasya harṣaḥ paramako 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:4363: 07,041.020a dṛṣṭvā tu kṣatriyā bhāraṃ saindhave sarvam arpitam
GE07mbh_07_u:4366: 07,042.001a yan mā pṛcchasi rājendra sindhurājasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:4367: 07,042.001c śṛṇu tat sarvam ākhyāsye yathā pāṇḍūn ayodhayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4368: 07,042.002a tam ūhuḥ sārather vaśyāḥ saindhavāḥ sādhuvāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4373: 07,042.004c sa babhau rājaliṅgais tais tārāpatir ivāmbare
GE07mbh_07_u:4375: 07,042.005c varūthaṃ vibabhau tasya jyotirbhiḥ kham ivāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:4376: 07,042.006a sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirann iṣugaṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:4377: 07,042.006c tat khaṇḍaṃ pūrayām āsa yad vyadārayad ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4378: 07,042.007a sa sātyakiṃ tribhir bāṇair aṣṭabhiś ca vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_07_u:4379: 07,042.007c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tathā ṣaṣṭyā virāṭaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4380: 07,042.008a drupadaṃ pañcabhis tīkṣṇair daśabhiś ca śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_07_u:4382: 07,042.009a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca saptatyā tataḥ śeṣān apānudat
GE07mbh_07_u:4387: 07,042.011c vivyādha daśabhiḥ pārtha tāṃś caivānyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4388: 07,042.012a tasya tal lāghavaṃ jñātvā bhīmo bhallais tribhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4389: 07,042.012c dhanur dhvajaṃ ca chatraṃ ca kṣitau kṣipram apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4390: 07,042.013a so 'nyad ādāya balavān sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam
GE07mbh_07_u:4391: 07,042.013c bhīmasyāpothayat ketuṃ dhanur aśvāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:4393: 07,042.014c sātyaker āpluto yānaṃ giryagram iva kesarī
GE07mbh_07_u:4394: 07,042.015a tatas tvadīyāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4398: 07,042.015d*0304_03 na vivyathe mahārāja divyam astram upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4399: 07,042.015d*0304_04 chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4400: 07,042.015d*0304_05 chādayām āsa tān sarvāṃs tad abhūd romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:4402: 07,042.016c tat tasya karma bhūtāni sarvāṇy evābhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:4407: 07,042.019a yo yo hi yatate bhettuṃ droṇānīkaṃ tavāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4411: 07,043.001c sughoram abhavad yuddhaṃ tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:4412: 07,043.002a praviśya tv ārjuniḥ senāṃ satyasaṃdho durāsadām
GE07mbh_07_u:4416: 07,043.004a teṣāṃ tasya ca saṃmardo dāruṇaḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_07_u:4420: 07,043.006a tasya vivyādha balavāñ śarair aśvān ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4421: 07,043.006c vātāyamānair atha tair aśvair apahṛto raṇāt
GE07mbh_07_u:4423: 07,043.007c rathavrajās tato hṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4424: 07,043.008a taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ pramathnantaṃ śarair arīn
GE07mbh_07_u:4427: 07,043.009c abravīc ca na me jīvañ jīvato yudhi mokṣyase
GE07mbh_07_u:4429: 07,043.010c vivyādha hṛdi saubhadraḥ sa papāta vyasuḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:4431: 07,043.011c parivavrus tadā rājaṃs tava pautraṃ jighāṃsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4433: 07,043.012c tad yuddham abhavad raudraṃ saubhadrasyāribhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:4434: 07,043.013a teṣāṃ śarān seṣvasanāñ śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4438: 07,043.015a sragbhir ābharaṇair vastraiḥ patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4441: 07,043.016c akṣair vimathitaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā yugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4443: 07,043.017c rathaiś ca bhagnair nāgaiś ca hataiḥ kīrṇābhavan mahī
GE07mbh_07_u:4446: 07,043.019a diśo vicaratas tasya sarvāś ca pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:4448: 07,043.020a kāñcanaṃ yad yad asyāsīd varma cābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4449: 07,043.020c dhanuṣaś ca śarāṇāṃ ca tad apaśyāma kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:4450: 07,043.021a taṃ tadā nāśakat kaś cic cakṣurbhyām abhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:4451: 07,043.021c ādadānaṃ śarair yodhān madhye sūryam iva sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:4453: 07,044.001a ādadānas tu śūrāṇām āyūṃṣy abhavad ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4455: 07,044.002a sa śakra iva vikrāntaḥ śakrasūnoḥ suto balī
GE07mbh_07_u:4461: 07,044.005a ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4465: 07,044.007a ye ke cana gatās tasya samīpam apalāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4466: 07,044.007c na te pratinyavartanta samudrād iva sindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4468: 07,044.008c samakampata sā senā vibhraṣṭā naur ivārṇave
GE07mbh_07_u:4469: 07,044.008d*0305_01 saṃtrastā vāhinī tubhyaṃ naur ivāsīn mahārṇave
GE07mbh_07_u:4471: 07,044.009c trastām āśvāsayan senām atrasto vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:4472: 07,044.010a alaṃ trāsena vaḥ śūrā naiṣa kaś cin mayi sthite
GE07mbh_07_u:4473: 07,044.010c aham enaṃ grahīṣyāmi jīvagrāhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4474: 07,044.011a evam uktvā tu saubhadram abhidudrāva vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:4476: 07,044.012a so 'bhimanyuṃ tribhir bāṇair viddhvā vakṣasy athānadat
GE07mbh_07_u:4477: 07,044.012c tribhiś ca dakṣiṇe bāhau savye ca niśitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4478: 07,044.012d*0306_01 so 'bhimanyus tatas tasya chittvā praṇadato balī
GE07mbh_07_u:4480: 07,044.013c bhujau śiraś ca svakṣibhru kṣitau kṣipram apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4481: 07,044.014a dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ rugṇaṃ putraṃ śalyasya māninam
GE07mbh_07_u:4492: 07,044.019c adṛśyam ārjuniṃ cakrur nimeṣāt te nṛpātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4493: 07,044.020a sasūtāśvadhvajaṃ tasya syandanaṃ taṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:4495: 07,044.021a sa gāḍhaviddhaḥ kruddhaś ca tottrair gaja ivārditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4496: 07,044.021c gāndharvam astram āyacchad rathamāyāṃ ca yojayat
GE07mbh_07_u:4497: 07,044.022a arjunena tapas taptvā gandharvebhyo yad āhṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:4499: 07,044.023a ekaḥ sa śatadhā rājan dṛśyate sma sahasradhā
GE07mbh_07_u:4505: 07,044.025a prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ saṃkhye preṣitā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4506: 07,044.025c rājan prāpur amuṃ lokaṃ śarīrāṇy avaniṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4507: 07,044.026a dhanūṃṣy aśvān niyantṝṃś ca dhvajān bāhūṃś ca sāṅgadān
GE07mbh_07_u:4508: 07,044.026c śirāṃsi ca śitair bhallais teṣāṃ ciccheda phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4514: 07,044.029c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ kṣipram upāyāt tam amarṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4518: 07,045.001a yathā vadasi me sūta ekasya bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:4519: 07,045.001c saṃgrāmaṃ tumulaṃ ghoraṃ jayaṃ caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4521: 07,045.002c kiṃ tu nātyadbhutaṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4525: 07,045.003d*0308_02 sa kṛṣṇo daivataṃ yeṣāṃ kiṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4527: 07,045.003d*0308_04 kā cintā mahatī bhūpa cintayā bādhyate jaḍaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4529: 07,045.003d*0308_06 tyāgaṃ vinā mahārāja samādhānaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:4532: 07,045.004*0309_01 tāvakās tava putrāś ca vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:4538: 07,045.006a tān prabhagnāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā droṇo drauṇir bṛhadbalaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:4978: 07,049.011a na lubdho budhyate doṣān mohāl lobhaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_07_u:4979: 07,049.011c madhu lipsur hi nāpaśyaṃ prapātam idam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:4980: 07,049.012a yo hi bhojye puraskāryo yāneṣu śayaneṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:4981: 07,049.012c bhūṣaṇeṣu ca so 'smābhir bālo yudhi puraskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4982: 07,049.013a kathaṃ hi bālas taruṇo yuddhānām aviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4983: 07,049.013c sadaśva iva saṃbādhe viṣame kṣemam arhati
GE07mbh_07_u:4984: 07,049.014a no ced dhi vayam apy enaṃ mahīm anuśayīmahi
GE07mbh_07_u:4986: 07,049.015a alubdho matimān hrīmān kṣamāvān rūpavān balī
GE07mbh_07_u:4992: 07,049.018a parebhyo 'py abhayārthibhyo yo dadāty abhayaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:4993: 07,049.018c tasyāsmābhir na śakitas trātum adyātmajo bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:4994: 07,049.019a bhayaṃ tu sumahat prāptaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:4997: 07,049.020c vyaktaṃ duryodhano dṛṣṭvā śocan hāsyati jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:4998: 07,049.021a na me jayaḥ prītikaro na rājyaṃ;
GE07mbh_07_u:5011: 07,049.021d@008_0009 mayā proktaḥ sa saṃgrāme dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5012: 07,049.021d@008_0010 praviṣṭe ca parāṃs tasmin saindhavena sma vāritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5013: 07,049.021d@008_0011 nanu nāma samaṃ yuddham eṣṭavyaṃ yuddhajīvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5014: 07,049.021d@008_0012 idaṃ caivāsamaṃ yuddham īdṛśaṃ prakṛtaṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5018: 07,049.021d@008_0016 uvāca bhagavān vyāso yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5021: 07,049.021d@008_0019 svargam eṣa gataḥ śūraḥ śatrūn hatvā bahūn raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:5029: 07,049.021d@008_0026 naiṣāṃ paśyāmi hantāraṃ prāṇināṃ saṃyuge kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:5031: 07,049.021d@008_0028 atha ceme hatāḥ prājñāḥ śerate vigatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5032: 07,049.021d@008_0029 mṛtā iti ca śabdo 'yaṃ vartate ca gatārthavat
GE07mbh_07_u:5035: 07,049.021d@008_0032 atra me saṃśayaḥ prāptaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā iti
GE07mbh_07_u:5036: 07,049.021d@008_0033 kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5038: 07,049.021d@008_0034 haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_07_u:5040: 07,049.021d@008_0036 āśvāsanam idaṃ vākyam uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5043: 07,049.021d@008_0039 sa cāpi rājā rājendra putravyasanam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5044: 07,049.021d@008_0040 aprasahyatamaṃ loke prāptavān iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5045: 07,049.021d@008_0041 tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi mṛtyoḥ prabhavam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5047: 07,049.021d@008_0043 purā vṛttam idaṃ tāta śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
GE07mbh_07_u:5049: 07,049.021d@008_0045 purā kṛtayuge tāta āsīd rājā hy akampanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5052: 07,049.021d@008_0048 śrīmān kṛtāstro medhāvī yudhi śakrasamo balī
GE07mbh_07_u:5054: 07,049.021d@008_0050 vyasyan bāṇasahasrāṇi yodheṣu ca gajeṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5055: 07,049.021d@008_0051 sa karma duṣkaraṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāme śatrutāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5057: 07,049.021d@008_0053 sa rājā pretakṛtyāni tasya kṛtvā śucānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5058: 07,049.021d@008_0054 śocann ahani rātrau ca nālabhat sukham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5061: 07,049.021d@008_0057 sa tu rājā mahābhāgo dṛṣṭvā devarṣisattamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5063: 07,049.021d@008_0059 tasya sarvaṃ samācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:5064: 07,049.021d@008_0060 śatrubhir vijayaṃ saṃkhye putrasya ca vadhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5066: 07,049.021d@008_0062 śatrubhir bahubhiḥ saṃkhye parākramya hato balī
GE07mbh_07_u:5068: 07,049.021d@008_0064 etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:5069: 07,049.021d@008_0065 tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado varadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5073: 07,049.021d@008_0068 yathā vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ caiva mayāpi vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:5074: 07,049.021d@008_0069 prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tadā brahmā ādisarge pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5075: 07,049.021d@008_0070 asaṃhṛtaṃ mahātejā dṛṣṭvā jagad idaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5076: 07,049.021d@008_0071 tasya cintā samutpannā saṃhāraṃ prati pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:5077: 07,049.021d@008_0072 cintayan na hy asau veda saṃhāraṃ vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:5079: 07,049.021d@008_0074 tena sarvā diśo vyāptāḥ sāntardeśā didhakṣatā
GE07mbh_07_u:5080: 07,049.021d@008_0075 tato divaṃ bhuvaṃ khaṃ ca jvālāmālāsamāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:5081: 07,049.021d@008_0076 carācaraṃ jagat sarvaṃ dadāha bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5082: 07,049.021d@008_0077 tato hatāni bhūtāni carāṇi sthāvarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5084: 07,049.021d@008_0079 tato haro jaṭī sthāṇur niśācarapatiḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5087: 07,049.021d@008_0082 abravīt paramo devo jvalann iva mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5088: 07,049.021d@008_0083 kiṃ kurma kāmaṃ kāmārha kāmāj jāto 'si putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:5090: 07,049.021d@008_0084 kariṣyāmi priyaṃ sarvaṃ brūhi sthāṇo yad icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:5091: 07,049.021d@008_0085 prajāsarganimittaṃ hi kṛto yatnas tvayā vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:5092: 07,049.021d@008_0086 tvayā sṛṣṭāś ca vṛddhāś ca bhūtagrāmāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5093: 07,049.021d@008_0087 tās taveha punaḥ krodhāt prajā dahyanti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5095: 07,049.021d@008_0088 tā dṛṣṭvā mama kāruṇyaṃ prasīda bhagavan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:5096: 07,049.021d@008_0089 na krudhye na ca me kāma etad evaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_07_u:5097: 07,049.021d@008_0090 pṛthivyā hitakāmāt tu tato māṃ manyur āviśat
GE07mbh_07_u:5098: 07,049.021d@008_0091 iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacūcudat
GE07mbh_07_u:5102: 07,049.021d@008_0094 saṃhāram aprameyasya tato māṃ manyur āviśat
GE07mbh_07_u:5104: 07,049.021d@008_0096 mā prajāḥ sthāvarāś caiva jaṅgamāś ca vyanīnaśan
GE07mbh_07_u:5105: 07,049.021d@008_0097 tava prasādād bhagavann idaṃ vartet tridhā jagat
GE07mbh_07_u:5106: 07,049.021d@008_0098 anāgatam atītaṃ ca yac ca saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:5108: 07,049.021d@008_0100 sa dahaty aśmakūṭāni drumāṃś ca saritas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5109: 07,049.021d@008_0101 palvalāni ca sarvāṇi sarve caiva tṛṇolapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5110: 07,049.021d@008_0102 sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva niḥśeṣaṃ kurute jagat
GE07mbh_07_u:5111: 07,049.021d@008_0103 tad etad bhasmasād bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad anāvilam
GE07mbh_07_u:5112: 07,049.021d@008_0104 prasīda bhagavan sa tvaṃ roṣo na syād varo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:5113: 07,049.021d@008_0105 sarve hi naṣṭā neṣyanti tava deva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:5114: 07,049.021d@008_0106 tasmān nivartatāṃ tejas tvayy eveha pralīyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:5116: 07,049.021d@008_0108 yatheme prāṇinaḥ sarve nivarteraṃs tathā kuru
GE07mbh_07_u:5121: 07,049.021d@008_0112 prasādābhimukhaṃ devaṃ tasmād evaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:5122: 07,049.021d@008_0113 śrutvā hi vacanaṃ devaḥ sthāṇor nihatapāpmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5125: 07,049.021d@008_0116 pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kalpayām āsa vai prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5126: 07,049.021d@008_0117 upasaṃharatas tasya tam agniṃ roṣajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5130: 07,049.021d@008_0121 sā viniḥsṛtya vai khebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritā
GE07mbh_07_u:5133: 07,049.021d@008_0124 mṛtyo iti mahīpāla jahi cemāḥ prajā iti
GE07mbh_07_u:5134: 07,049.021d@008_0125 tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyātha prādurbhūtā ruṣo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:5135: 07,049.021d@008_0126 tasmāt saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajāḥ sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5136: 07,049.021d@008_0127 mama tvaṃ hi niyogena tataḥ śreyo hy avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:5137: 07,049.021d@008_0128 evam uktā tu sā tena mṛtyuḥ kamalalocanā
GE07mbh_07_u:5138: 07,049.021d@008_0129 dadhyau cātyartham abalā praruroda ca susvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:5142: 07,049.021d@008_0132 vinīya duḥkham abalā ātmany eva prajāpatim
GE07mbh_07_u:5144: 07,049.021d@008_0134 tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī īdṛśī vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:5145: 07,049.021d@008_0135 krūraṃ karmāhitaṃ kuryāṃ mūḍheva kim u jānatī
GE07mbh_07_u:5146: 07,049.021d@008_0136 bibhemy aham adharmād dhi prasīda bhagavan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:5147: 07,049.021d@008_0137 priyān putrān vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn mātṝḥ pitṝn patīn
GE07mbh_07_u:5148: 07,049.021d@008_0138 anudhyāsyanti ye deva mṛtāṃs teṣāṃ bibhemy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:5149: 07,049.021d@008_0139 kṛpaṇānāṃ hi rudatāṃ ye patanty aśrubindavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5150: 07,049.021d@008_0140 tebhyo hi balavad bhītā śaraṇaṃ tvāham āgatā
GE07mbh_07_u:5151: 07,049.021d@008_0141 yamasya bhavanaṃ deva na gaccheyaṃ surottama
GE07mbh_07_u:5153: 07,049.021d@008_0143 etad icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmaha
GE07mbh_07_u:5154: 07,049.021d@008_0144 iccheyaṃ tvatprasādād vai tapas taptuṃ prajeśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:5155: 07,049.021d@008_0145 pradiśemaṃ varaṃ deva tvaṃ mahyaṃ bhagavan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:5156: 07,049.021d@008_0146 tvayā hy uktā gamiṣyāmi dhenukāśramam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5157: 07,049.021d@008_0147 tatra tapsye tapas tīvraṃ tavaivārādhane ratā
GE07mbh_07_u:5158: 07,049.021d@008_0148 na hi śakṣyāmi deveśa prāṇān prāṇabhṛtāṃ priyān
GE07mbh_07_u:5162: 07,049.021d@008_0151 gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā te vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:5163: 07,049.021d@008_0152 bhavitā tv etad evaṃ hi naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:5165: 07,049.021d@008_0153 bhavatv aninditā loke kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:5168: 07,049.021d@008_0156 tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā devaḥ prajānām īśvareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5169: 07,049.021d@008_0157 prasādaṃ cāgamat kṣipram ātmany eva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5170: 07,049.021d@008_0158 smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:5173: 07,049.021d@008_0161 sā kanyāpi jagāmātha samīpāt tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5175: 07,049.021d@008_0163 tvaramāṇā ca rājendra mṛtyur dhenukam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:5176: 07,049.021d@008_0164 sā tatra paramaṃ tīvraṃ cacāra vratam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:5180: 07,049.021d@008_0168 tatas tv ekena pādena punar anyāni sapta vai
GE07mbh_07_u:5181: 07,049.021d@008_0169 tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva sapta caikaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:5182: 07,049.021d@008_0170 tataḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sā
GE07mbh_07_u:5183: 07,049.021d@008_0171 punar gatvā tato nandāṃ puṇyāṃ śītāmalodakām
GE07mbh_07_u:5184: 07,049.021d@008_0172 apsu varṣasahasrāṇi sapta caikaṃ ca sānayat
GE07mbh_07_u:5186: 07,049.021d@008_0174 sā pūrvaṃ kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ jagāma niyame dhṛtā
GE07mbh_07_u:5188: 07,049.021d@008_0176 pañcagaṅge ca sā puṇye kanyā vetasakeṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5190: 07,049.021d@008_0178 tato gatvā mahāgaṅgāṃ mahāmeruṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:5192: 07,049.021d@008_0180 punar himavato mūrdhni yatra devā purāyajan
GE07mbh_07_u:5193: 07,049.021d@008_0181 tatrāṅguṣṭena sā tasthau nikharvaṃ paramā śubhā
GE07mbh_07_u:5194: 07,049.021d@008_0182 puṣkareṣv atha gokarṇe naimiṣe malaye tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5195: 07,049.021d@008_0183 akarśayat svakaṃ dehaṃ niyamair manasaḥ priyaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5197: 07,049.021d@008_0185 tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5198: 07,049.021d@008_0186 tatas tām abravīt prīto lokānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5199: 07,049.021d@008_0187 mṛtyo kim idam atyarthaṃ tapāṃsi carasīti ha
GE07mbh_07_u:5201: 07,049.021d@008_0189 nāhaṃ hanyāṃ prajā deva svasthāś cākrośatīs tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5202: 07,049.021d@008_0190 etad icchāmi sarveśa tvatto varam ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:5205: 07,049.021d@008_0193 ārtā cānāgasī nārī yācāmi bhava me gatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5207: 07,049.021d@008_0195 adharmo nāsti te mṛtyo saṃharantyā imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5208: 07,049.021d@008_0196 mayā coktaṃ mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:5209: 07,049.021d@008_0197 tasmāt saṃhara kalyāṇi prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5211: 07,049.021d@008_0199 lokapālo yamaś caiva sahāyā vyādhayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:5212: 07,049.021d@008_0200 ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva punar dāsyāma te varam
GE07mbh_07_u:5213: 07,049.021d@008_0201 yathā tvam enasā muktā virajāḥ khyātim eṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:5214: 07,049.021d@008_0202 saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_07_u:5215: 07,049.021d@008_0203 punar evābravīd vākyaṃ prasādya śirasā tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:5216: 07,049.021d@008_0204 yady evam etat kartavyaṃ mayā na syād vinā prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:5217: 07,049.021d@008_0205 tavājñā mūrdhni me nyastā yat te vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:5218: 07,049.021d@008_0206 lobhaḥ krodho 'bhyasūyerṣyā droho mohaś ca dehinām
GE07mbh_07_u:5221: 07,049.021d@008_0208 tathā bhaviṣyate mṛtyo sādhu saṃhara vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5222: 07,049.021d@008_0209 adharmas te na bhavitā nāpadhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:5226: 07,049.021d@008_0213 nādharmas te bhavitā mā sma bhaiṣīḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5228: 07,049.021d@008_0215 tvaṃ vai dharmas tvaṃ hi dharmasya ceśā
GE07mbh_07_u:5237: 07,049.021d@008_0224 tasmāt kāmaṃ roṣam apy āgataṃ tvaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:5241: 07,049.021d@008_0227 chāpād bhītā bāḍham ity abravīt tam
GE07mbh_07_u:5271: 07,049.021d@008_0256 puṇyaṃ yaśasyaṃ svargyaṃ ca dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:5273: 07,049.021d@008_0258 etad arthapadaṃ śrutvā vijñāya tvaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:5274: 07,049.021d@008_0259 kṣatradharmaṃ ca vijñāya śūrāṇāṃ ca parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:5278: 07,049.021d@008_0263 asinā gadayā śaktyā dhanuṣā ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5279: 07,049.021d@008_0264 tasmāt parāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:5286: 07,049.021d@008_0270 bhūya eva tu māṃ tathyair vacobhir abhibṛṃhaya
GE07mbh_07_u:5288: 07,049.021d@008_0272 kiyatyo dakṣiṇā dattāḥ kaiś ca dattā mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5290: 07,049.021d@008_0273 rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyakṛdbhis tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_07_u:5291: 07,049.021d@008_0274 śvityasya nṛpateḥ putraḥ sṛñjayo nāma bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5293: 07,049.021d@008_0276 tau kadā cid gṛhaṃ tasya praviṣṭau taddidṛkṣayā
GE07mbh_07_u:5294: 07,049.021d@008_0277 vidhivac cārcitau tena prītau tatroṣatuḥ sukham
GE07mbh_07_u:5295: 07,049.021d@008_0278 taṃ kadā cit sukhāsīnaṃ tābhyāṃ saha śucismitā
GE07mbh_07_u:5299: 07,049.021d@008_0281 utāho bhāsvid arkasya jvalanasya śikhā tv iyam
GE07mbh_07_u:5301: 07,049.021d@008_0282 hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtir dhṛtiḥ puṣṭiḥ siddhiś candramasaḥ prabhā
GE07mbh_07_u:5303: 07,049.021d@008_0284 mameyaṃ bhagavan kanyā matto varam abhīpsati
GE07mbh_07_u:5304: 07,049.021d@008_0285 nāradas tv abravīd enaṃ dehi mahyam imāṃ nṛpa

GE07mbh_07_u:5326: 07,049.021d@008_0307 yasya mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca kledaḥ svedaś ca kāñcanam
GE07mbh_07_u:5327: 07,049.021d@008_0308 suvarṇaṣṭhīvir ity eva tasya nāmābhavat kṛtam

GE07mbh_07_u:5336: 07,049.021d@008_0317 ke cit tatrābruvan rājñaḥ putraṃ gṛhṇīma vai svayam

GE07mbh_07_u:5356: 07,049.021d@008_0337 yasmai rājarṣaye prādād varaṃ sa bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5357: 07,049.021d@008_0338 haimaṃ himavataḥ pādaṃ yiyakṣor vividhaiḥ savaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:5384: 07,049.021d@008_0364 prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo dānam ijyā dviṣajjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5386: 07,049.021d@008_0366 dharmeṇārādhayad devān bāṇaiḥ śatrūñ jayaṃs tathā

GE07mbh_07_u:5431: 07,049.021d@008_0409 śibim auśīnaraṃ cāpi mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:5432: 07,049.021d@008_0410 ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ carmavat paryaveṣṭayat
GE07mbh_07_u:5434: 07,049.021d@008_0412 sa śibir vai ripūn nityaṃ mukhyān nighnan sapatnajit
GE07mbh_07_u:5436: 07,049.021d@008_0414 sa rājā vīryavān dhīmān avāpya vasu puṣkalam
GE07mbh_07_u:5438: 07,049.021d@008_0416 ayajac cāśvamedhair yo vijitya pṛthivīm imām

GE07mbh_07_u:5461: 07,049.021d@008_0438 yaṃ prajā anvamodanta pitā putrān ivaurasān
GE07mbh_07_u:5467: 07,049.021d@008_0444 tatraiva vasatas tasya rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5471: 07,049.021d@008_0448 jaghāna sa mahābāhuḥ paulastyaṃ sagaṇaṃ raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:5479: 07,049.021d@008_0456 ati sarvāṇi bhūtāni rāmo dāśarathir babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:5480: 07,049.021d@008_0457 ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca mānuṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:5482: 07,049.021d@008_0459 nāhīyata tadā prāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ na tad anyathā

GE07mbh_07_u:5494: 07,049.021d@008_0471 na ca jyeṣṭāḥ kaniṣṭebhyas tadā śrāddhān akārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:5499: 07,049.021d@008_0476 rāmo rāmo rāma iti prajānām abhavat kathā

GE07mbh_07_u:5503: 07,049.021d@008_0480 sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā

GE07mbh_07_u:5508: 07,049.021d@008_0484 yena bhāgīrathī gaṅgā cayanaiḥ kāñcanaiś citā

GE07mbh_07_u:5593: 07,049.021d@008_0566 yayātiṃ nāhuṣaṃ caiva mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
