GE07mbh_07_u:6888: 07,057.041a sraṣṭāraṃ vāridhārāṇāṃ bhuvaś ca prakṛtiṃ parām
GE07mbh_07_u:6890: 07,057.042a yogināṃ paramaṃ brahma vyaktaṃ brahmavidāṃ nidhim
GE07mbh_07_u:6895: 07,057.044b*0414_01 yam ṛgvedavido gānti ṛco hy akṣaram eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:6897: 07,057.044b*0414_03 gāyanti yaṃ sāmavida ihaiva iti nihnutam
GE07mbh_07_u:6898: 07,057.044c tam ajaṃ kāraṇātmānaṃ jagmatuḥ śaraṇaṃ bhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:6899: 07,057.044d*0415_01 tam evāgniṃ tam ādityaṃ bhūyo bhūyas tatheśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:6900: 07,057.045a arjunaś cāpi taṃ devaṃ bhūyo bhūyo 'bhyavandata
GE07mbh_07_u:6904: 07,057.046a tatas tāv āgatau śarvaḥ provāca prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:6908: 07,057.046e kiṃ ca vām īpsitaṃ vīrau manasaḥ kṣipram ucyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:6909: 07,057.047a yena kāryeṇa saṃprāptau yuvāṃ tat sādhayāmi vām
GE07mbh_07_u:6910: 07,057.047c vriyatām ātmanaḥ śreyas tat sarvaṃ pradadāni vām
GE07mbh_07_u:6911: 07,057.048a tatas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pratyutthāya kṛtāñjalī
GE07mbh_07_u:6914: 07,057.049a namo bhavāya śarvāya rudrāya varadāya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:6915: 07,057.049c paśūnāṃ pataye nityam ugrāya ca kapardine
GE07mbh_07_u:6927: 07,057.055a namo namas te sevyāya bhūtānāṃ prabhave sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:6931: 07,057.056c namo viśvasya pataye mahatāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6938: 07,057.058b*0421_04 namaḥ parṇāya gehyāya druhyāya prabhṛśāya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:6943: 07,057.058b*0421_09 vaiśantāya ca kūpyāya nīpāya ca varūthine
GE07mbh_07_u:6946: 07,057.058c bhaktānukampine nityaṃ sidhyatāṃ nau varaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:6948: 07,057.059c prasādayām āsa bhavaṃ tadā hy astropalabdhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:6949: 07,057.059d*0423_01 arjunāya dadau buddhiṃ tasminn astre yad īpsitam
GE07mbh_07_u:6952: 07,057.061a taṃ copahāraṃ svakṛtaṃ naiśaṃ naityakam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6954: 07,057.062a tato 'bhipūjya manasā śarvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6955: 07,057.062c icchāmy ahaṃ divyam astram ity abhāṣata śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:6956: 07,057.063a tataḥ pārthasya vijñāya varārthe vacanaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6959: 07,057.063d*0424_02 yena kāmena saṃprāptau bhavadbhyāṃ taṃ dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:6961: 07,057.064c tatra me tad dhanur divyaṃ śaraś ca nihitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:6962: 07,057.065a yena devārayaḥ sarve mayā yudhi nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6963: 07,057.065c tata ānīyatāṃ kṛṣṇau saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:6964: 07,057.066a tathety uktvā tu tau vīrau taṃ śarvaṃ pārṣadaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:6965: 07,057.066c prasthitau tat saro divyaṃ divyāścaryaśatair vṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:6968: 07,057.068a tatas tu tat saro gatvā sūryamaṇḍalasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_07_u:6972: 07,057.070a tataḥ kṛṣṇaś ca pārthaś ca saṃspṛśyāpaḥ kṛtāñjalī
GE07mbh_07_u:6976: 07,057.072a tatas tau rudramāhātmyād dhitvā rūpaṃ mahoragau
GE07mbh_07_u:6977: 07,057.072c dhanur bāṇaś ca śatrughnaṃ tad dvaṃdvaṃ samapadyata
GE07mbh_07_u:6978: 07,057.073a tato jagṛhatuḥ prītau dhanur bāṇaṃ ca suprabham
GE07mbh_07_u:6982: 07,057.075a sa tad gṛhya dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ tasthau sthānaṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6983: 07,057.075c vyakarṣac cāpi vidhivat saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:6984: 07,057.076a tasya maurvīṃ ca muṣṭiṃ ca sthānaṃ cālakṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6986: 07,057.077a sarasy eva ca taṃ bāṇaṃ mumocātibalaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6987: 07,057.077c cakāra ca punar vīras tasmin sarasi tad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6988: 07,057.078a tataḥ prītaṃ bhavaṃ jñātvā smṛtimān arjunas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:6989: 07,057.078c varam āraṇyakaṃ dattaṃ darśanaṃ śaṃkarasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:6990: 07,057.078e manasā cintayām āsa tan me saṃpadyatām iti
GE07mbh_07_u:6991: 07,057.079a tasya tan matam ājñāya prītaḥ prādād varaṃ bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:6992: 07,057.079c tac ca pāśupataṃ ghoraṃ pratijñāyāś ca pāraṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:6993: 07,057.079d*0425_01 tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam avāpya punar īśvarāt
GE07mbh_07_u:6996: 07,057.080c vavandatuś ca saṃhṛṣṭau śirobhyāṃ tau maheśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:6998: 07,057.081c prāptau svaśibiraṃ vīrau mudā paramayā yutau
GE07mbh_07_u:7005: 07,058.002c vaitālikāś ca sūtāś ca tuṣṭuvuḥ puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_07_u:7006: 07,058.003a nartakāś cāpy anṛtyanta jagur gītāni gāyakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7009: 07,058.004c āḍambarāś ca śaṅkhāś ca dundubhyaś ca mahāsvanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7010: 07,058.005a evam etāni sarvāṇi tathānyāny api bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:7027: 07,058.012a jajāpa japyaṃ kaunteyaḥ satāṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7029: 07,058.013a samiddhaṃ sa pavitrābhir agnim āhutibhis tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:7036: 07,058.016c tān dvijān madhusarpirbhyāṃ phalaiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ sumaṅgalaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7037: 07,058.017a prādāt kāñcanam ekaikaṃ niṣkaṃ viprāya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7039: 07,058.018a tathā gāḥ kapilā dogdhrīḥ sarṣabhāḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7041: 07,058.019a svastikān vardhamānāṃś ca nandyāvartāṃś ca kāñcanān
GE07mbh_07_u:7042: 07,058.019c mālyaṃ ca jalakumbhāṃś ca jvalitaṃ ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:7045: 07,058.021a maṅgalyān pakṣiṇaś caiva yac cānyad api pūjitam
GE07mbh_07_u:7046: 07,058.021c dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca kaunteyo bāhyāṃ kakṣyām agāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7058: 07,058.027a saṃstūyamānaḥ sūtaiś ca vandyamānaś ca bandibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7060: 07,058.028a tato muhūrtād āsīt tu bandināṃ nisvano mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:7061: 07,058.028c nemighoṣaś ca rathināṃ khuraghoṣaś ca vājinām
GE07mbh_07_u:7063: 07,058.029c narāṇāṃ padaśabdaiś ca kampatīva sma medinī
GE07mbh_07_u:7064: 07,058.030a tataḥ śuddhāntam āsādya jānubhyāṃ bhūtale sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7080: 07,059.001a sukhena rajanī vyuṣṭā kaccit te madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:7084: 07,059.002b*0434_01 darśanād eva te saumya na kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:7086: 07,059.003a anujñātaś ca rājñā sa prāveśayata taṃ janam
GE07mbh_07_u:7087: 07,059.003c virāṭaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:7088: 07,059.003d*0435_01 cedipaṃ dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca drupadaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:7089: 07,059.004a śikhaṇḍinaṃ yamau caiva cekitānaṃ ca kekayān
GE07mbh_07_u:7090: 07,059.004b*0436_01 kekayān sṛñjayān matsyān pāñcālāṃś cāpi rājakān
GE07mbh_07_u:7092: 07,059.004d*0437_01 yudhāmanyuṃ subāhuṃ ca draupadeyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7093: 07,059.005a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabham
GE07mbh_07_u:7095: 07,059.005d*0438_01 etāṃś ca suhṛdaś cānyān darśayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:7096: 07,059.005d*0438_02 anujñātāś ca pārthena āsīnā āsaneṣu te
GE07mbh_07_u:7099: 07,059.006c kṛṣṇaś ca yuyudhānaś ca mahātmānau mahādyutī
GE07mbh_07_u:7102: 07,059.008a ekaṃ tvāṃ vayam āśritya sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7103: 07,059.008c prārthayāmo jayaṃ yuddhe śāśvatāni sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:7104: 07,059.009a tvaṃ hi rājyavināśaṃ ca dviṣadbhiś ca nirākriyām
GE07mbh_07_u:7105: 07,059.009c kleśāṃś ca vividhān kṛṣṇa sarvāṃs tān api vettha naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7107: 07,059.010c sukham āyattam atyarthaṃ yātrā ca madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:7108: 07,059.011a sa tathā kuru vārṣṇeya yathā tvayi mano mama
GE07mbh_07_u:7109: 07,059.011c arjunasya yathā satyā pratijñā syāc cikīrṣitā
GE07mbh_07_u:7111: 07,059.012c pāraṃ titīrṣatām adya plavo no bhava mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:7112: 07,059.013a na hi tat kurute saṃkhye kārtavīryasamas tv api
GE07mbh_07_u:7113: 07,059.013c rathī yat kurute kṛṣṇa sārathir yatnam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7114: 07,059.013d*0440_01 yathaiva sarvāsv āpatsu pāsi vṛṣṇīñ janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:7121: 07,059.013d*0440_08 varadaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ devaṃ tat satyaṃ kuru mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:7125: 07,059.014a sāmareṣv api lokeṣu sarveṣu na tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7126: 07,059.014c śarāsanadharaḥ kaś cid yathā pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7131: 07,059.017a ahaṃ ca tat kariṣyāmi yathā kuntīsuto 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7135: 07,059.019a tasyādya gṛdhrāḥ śyenāś ca vaḍagomāyavas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:7137: 07,059.020a yady asya devā goptāraḥ sendrāḥ sarve tathāpy asau
GE07mbh_07_u:7139: 07,059.021a nihatya saindhavaṃ jiṣṇur adya tvām upayāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:7144: 07,060.002a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ śubhāṃ kakṣyām abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:7146: 07,060.003a mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya pariṣvajya ca bāhunā
GE07mbh_07_u:7148: 07,060.004a vyaktam arjuna saṃgrāme dhruvas te vijayo mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:7149: 07,060.004c yādṛg rūpā hi te chāyā prasannaś ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7150: 07,060.005a tam abravīt tato jiṣṇur mahad āścaryam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:7151: 07,060.005c dṛṣṭavān asmi bhadraṃ te keśavasya prasādajam
GE07mbh_07_u:7152: 07,060.006a tatas tat kathayām āsa yathādṛṣṭaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7154: 07,060.007a tataḥ śirobhir avaniṃ spṛṣṭvā sarve ca vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7155: 07,060.007c namaskṛtya vṛṣāṅkāya sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan
GE07mbh_07_u:7162: 07,060.011a tatra gatvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ kalpayām āsa sūtavat
GE07mbh_07_u:7165: 07,060.012c babhau rathavaraḥ kḷptaḥ śiśur divasakṛd yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:7169: 07,060.014a taṃ tu loke varaḥ puṃsāṃ kirīṭī hemavarmabhṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:7173: 07,060.016a jaitraiḥ sāṃgrāmikair mantraiḥ pūrvam eva rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:7175: 07,060.017a sa rathe rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kāñcane kāñcanāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7178: 07,060.018c śaryāter yajñam āyāntaṃ yathendraṃ devam aśvinau
GE07mbh_07_u:7179: 07,060.019a atha jagrāha govindo raśmīn raśmivatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7181: 07,060.020a sa tābhyāṃ sahitaḥ pārtho rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7182: 07,060.020c sahito budhaśukrābhyāṃ tamo nighnan yathā śaśī
GE07mbh_07_u:7185: 07,060.021d*0442_01 dhanur jaitraṃ tathā bāṇān dadhāno nirgato 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7186: 07,060.021d*0442_02 hantuṃ laṃkāpatiṃ devo bhagavān iva rāghavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7187: 07,060.022a tato vāditranirghoṣair maṅgalyaiś ca stavaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7188: 07,060.022c prayāntam arjunaṃ sūtā māgadhāś caiva tuṣṭuvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7192: 07,060.024c vavau saṃharṣayan pārthaṃ dviṣataś cāpi śoṣayan
GE07mbh_07_u:7193: 07,060.024d*0443_01 tatas tasmin kṣaṇe rājan vividhāni śubhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:7198: 07,060.027a yuyudhānādya yuddhe me dṛśyate vijayo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7200: 07,060.028a so 'haṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra saindhavako nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7202: 07,060.028d*0444_01 gaccha tvaṃ rakṣa rājānaṃ tvaṃ hi tulyo mayā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:7203: 07,060.029a yathā paramakaṃ kṛtyaṃ saindhavasya vadhe mama
GE07mbh_07_u:7205: 07,060.030a sa tvam adya mahābāho rājānaṃ paripālaya
GE07mbh_07_u:7206: 07,060.030c yathaiva hi mayā guptas tvayā gupto bhavet tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:7207: 07,060.030d*0445_01 na hi paśyāmi taṃ loke yas tvāṃ yuddhe parājayet
GE07mbh_07_u:7209: 07,060.031a tvayi cāhaṃ parāśvasya pradyumne vā mahārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:7211: 07,060.032a mayy apekṣā na kartavyā kathaṃ cid api sātvata
GE07mbh_07_u:7212: 07,060.032c rājany eva parā guptiḥ kāryā sarvātmanā tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:7213: 07,060.033a na hi yatra mahābāhur vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7214: 07,060.033c kiṃ cid vyāpadyate tatra yatrāham api ca dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:7215: 07,060.034a evam uktas tu pārthena sātyakiḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:7216: 07,060.034c tathety uktvāgamat tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7219: 07,061.001c abhimanyau hate tatra ke vāyudhyanta māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7221: 07,061.002c kathaṃ tat kilbiṣaṃ kṛtvā nirbhayā brūhi māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7226: 07,061.005a kiṃ nu saṃjaya saṃgrāme vṛttaṃ duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:7227: 07,061.005c paridevo mahān atra śruto me nābhinandanam
GE07mbh_07_u:7229: 07,061.006c na śrūyante 'dya te sarve saindhavasya niveśane
GE07mbh_07_u:7232: 07,061.007a stuvatāṃ nādya śrūyante putrāṇāṃ śibire mama
GE07mbh_07_u:7234: 07,061.008a śabdena nāditābhīkṣṇam abhavad yatra me śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7235: 07,061.008c dīnānām adya taṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇomi samīritam
GE07mbh_07_u:7237: 07,061.009c āsīno 'haṃ purā tāta śabdam aśrauṣam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:7241: 07,061.011c anyeṣāṃ ca sutānāṃ me na tathā śrūyate dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7242: 07,061.012a brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yaṃ śiṣyāḥ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_07_u:7245: 07,061.013c gītaiś ca vividhair iṣṭai ramate yo divāniśam
GE07mbh_07_u:7247: 07,061.014c sūta tasya gṛhe śabdho nādya drauṇer yathā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:7248: 07,061.015a droṇaputraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ gāyanā nartakāś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:7249: 07,061.015c atyartham upatiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7251: 07,061.016c śrūyate so 'dya na tathā kekayānāṃ ca veśmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:7253: 07,061.017c nṛtyatāṃ śrūyate tāta gaṇānāṃ so 'dya na dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7255: 07,061.018c saumadattiṃ śrutanidhiṃ teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7257: 07,061.019c droṇasyāsīd avirato gṛhe tan na śṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:7259: 07,061.020c vāditranāditānāṃ ca so 'dya na śrūyate mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:7260: 07,061.021a yadā prabhṛty upaplavyāc chāntim icchañ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7262: 07,061.022a tato 'ham abruvaṃ sūta mandaṃ duryodhanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:7264: 07,061.023a kālaprāptam ahaṃ manye mā tvaṃ duryodhanātigāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7265: 07,061.023b*0447_01 saṃśāmya bhrātṛbhis tais tu kṣatriyān abhipālaya
GE07mbh_07_u:7266: 07,061.023c śame ced yācamānaṃ tvaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi keśavam
GE07mbh_07_u:7272: 07,061.025a tato duḥśāsanasyaiva karṇasya ca mataṃ dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7273: 07,061.025c anvavartata hitvā māṃ kṛṣṭaḥ kālena durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7274: 07,061.026a na hy ahaṃ dyūtam icchāmi viduro na praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_07_u:7275: 07,061.026c saindhavo necchate dyūtaṃ bhīṣmo na dyūtam icchati
GE07mbh_07_u:7277: 07,061.026c*0449_02 bāhlikaḥ somadatto vā bhīṣmo droṇāyanis tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:7278: 07,061.027a śalyo bhūriśravāś caiva purumitro jayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:7279: 07,061.027c aśvatthāmā kṛpo droṇo dyūtaṃ necchanti saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:7280: 07,061.027d*0450_01 jayaḥ kṛpo vā dharmātmā ye cānye mama bāndhavāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:7354: 07,062.008b*0455_01 aprāptaḥ sa mahad dharmaṃ kāmam arthaṃ yaśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:7355: 07,062.008c vartethā yadi dharmeṇa na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
GE07mbh_07_u:7356: 07,062.009a tvaṃ tu prājñatamo loke hitvā dharmaṃ sanātanam

GE07mbh_07_u:7360: 07,062.011a na tathā manyate kṛṣṇo rājānaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ purā

GE07mbh_07_u:7364: 07,062.013a paruṣāṇy ucyamānāṃś ca yathā pārthān upekṣase

GE07mbh_07_u:7384: 07,062.022a yāvat tu śakyate kartum anuraktair janādhipaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:7393: 07,063.003a visphārya ca dhanūṃṣy ājau jyāḥ karaiḥ parimṛjya ca

GE07mbh_07_u:7412: 07,063.012a tvaṃ caiva saumadattiś ca karṇaś caiva mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:7425: 07,063.017e te caiva saptasāhasrā dvisāhasrāś ca saindhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7430: 07,063.020a tato duḥśāsanaś caiva vikarṇaś ca tavātmajau
GE07mbh_07_u:7436: 07,063.023a paścārdhe tasya padmas tu garbhavyūhaḥ sudurbhidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7437: 07,063.023c sūcī padmasya madhyastho gūḍho vyūhaḥ punaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7438: 07,063.024a evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya droṇo vyavasthitaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:7446: 07,063.028a śakaṭasya tu rājendra bhāradvājo mukhe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7447: 07,063.028c anu tasyābhavad bhojo jugopainaṃ tataḥ svayam

GE07mbh_07_u:7450: 07,063.029d*0458_01 tasya sarvasya sainyasya netā goptā ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:7456: 07,063.032c grased vyūhaḥ kṣitiṃ sarvām iti bhūtāni menire

GE07mbh_07_u:7475: 07,064.006a sanirghātā jvalantyaś ca petur ulkāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:7476: 07,064.006c cacāla ca mahī kṛtsnā bhaye ghore samutthite

GE07mbh_07_u:7503: 07,064.018c vidhunvan gāṇḍivaṃ saṃkhye babhau sūrya ivoditaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:7506: 07,064.020a atha kṛṣṇo 'py asaṃbhrāntaḥ pārthena saha māriṣa

GE07mbh_07_u:7534: 07,064.033a te cāpi rathinaḥ sarve tvaritāḥ kṛtahastavat

GE07mbh_07_u:7558: 07,064.043a anyonyam api cājaghnur ātmānam api cāpare

GE07mbh_07_u:7575: 07,064.051c abhinat phalguno bāṇai rathinaṃ ca sasārathim

GE07mbh_07_u:7597: 07,065.001c ke nu tatra raṇe vīrāḥ pratyudīyur dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:7601: 07,065.003a tathārjunena saṃbhagne tasmiṃs tava bale tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:7604: 07,065.004c na tatra kaś cit saṃgrāme śaśākārjunam īkṣitum

GE07mbh_07_u:8118: 07,069.007c senākakṣaṃ dahati me vahniḥ kakṣam ivotthitaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:8129: 07,069.013a asmān na tvaṃ sadā bhaktān icchasy amitavikrama

GE07mbh_07_u:8152: 07,069.023a yudhiṣṭhiraś ca me grāhyo miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām

GE07mbh_07_u:8157: 07,069.025c gatvā yodhaya mā bhais tvaṃ tvaṃ hy asya jagataḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8158: 07,069.026a rājā śūraḥ kṛtī dakṣo vairam utpādya pāṇḍavaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:8161: 07,069.027a kathaṃ tvām apy atikrāntaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:8169: 07,069.031a taṃ kathaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe dahantam ahitān bahūn

GE07mbh_07_u:8172: 07,069.032c paravān asmi bhavati preṣyakṛd rakṣa me yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8175: 07,069.033c ahaṃ tu tat kariṣyāmi yathainaṃ prasahiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:8178: 07,069.035a eṣa te kavacaṃ rājaṃs tathā badhnāmi kāñcanam
GE07mbh_07_u:8179: 07,069.035c yathā na bāṇā nāstrāṇi viṣahiṣyanti te raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:8187: 07,069.039a evam uktvā tvaran droṇaḥ spṛṣṭvāmbho varma bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:8189: 07,069.040a raṇe tasmin sumahati vijayāya sutasya te
GE07mbh_07_u:8193: 07,069.041a karotu svasti te brahmā svasti cāpi dvijātayaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:8209: 07,069.047c diggajāś caiva catvāraḥ kṣitiḥ khaṃ gaganaṃ grahāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8210: 07,069.047d*0504_01 diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva svasti tubhyaṃ prakurvatām
GE07mbh_07_u:8211: 07,069.047d*0504_02 prajānāṃ patayaś caiva siddhā lokahite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8212: 07,069.047d*0504_03 svasti kurvantu te nityaṃ mantreṇānena saṃstutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8213: 07,069.048a adhastād dharaṇīṃ yo 'sau sadā dhārayate nṛpa

GE07mbh_07_u:8219: 07,069.050c brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur vṛtrād bhītā mahāsurāt
GE07mbh_07_u:8222: 07,069.051c gatir bhava suraśreṣṭha trāhi no mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:8224: 07,069.052a atha pārśve sthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:8225: 07,069.052c prāha tathyam idaṃ vākyaṃ viṣaṇṇān surasattamān
GE07mbh_07_u:8226: 07,069.053a rakṣyā me satataṃ devāḥ sahendrāḥ sadvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8227: 07,069.053c tvaṣṭuḥ sudurdharaṃ tejo yena vṛtro vinirmitaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:8230: 07,069.055a sa tasyaiva prasādād vai hanyād eva ripur balī
GE07mbh_07_u:8232: 07,069.056a dṛṣṭvā haniṣyatha ripuṃ kṣipraṃ gacchata mandaram
GE07mbh_07_u:8235: 07,069.057a te gatvā sahitā devā brahmaṇā saha mandaram
GE07mbh_07_u:8237: 07,069.058a so 'bravīt svāgataṃ devā brūta kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:8238: 07,069.058c amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mahyaṃ kāmaprāptir ato 'stu vaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8239: 07,069.059a evam uktās tu te sarve pratyūcus taṃ divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8240: 07,069.059c tejo hṛtaṃ no vṛtreṇa gatir bhava divaukasām
GE07mbh_07_u:8241: 07,069.060a mūrtīr īkṣaṣva no deva prahārair jarjarīkṛtāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:8244: 07,069.061a viditaṃ me yathā devāḥ kṛtyeyaṃ sumahābalā
GE07mbh_07_u:8246: 07,069.062a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ sāhyaṃ sarvadivaukasām
GE07mbh_07_u:8247: 07,069.062c mamedaṃ gātrajaṃ śakra kavacaṃ gṛhya bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:8251: 07,069.063a ity uktvā varadaḥ prādād varma tan mantram eva ca

GE07mbh_07_u:8254: 07,069.064c na saṃdhiḥ śakyate bhettuṃ varmabandhasya tasya tu
GE07mbh_07_u:8255: 07,069.064d*0507_01 sa tena varmaṇā gupto vṛtraṃ devaripuṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:8256: 07,069.065a tato jaghāna samare vṛtraṃ devapatiḥ svayam

GE07mbh_07_u:8261: 07,069.067a agniveśyo mama prādāt tena badhnāmi varma te
GE07mbh_07_u:8264: 07,069.068a evam uktvā tato droṇas tava putraṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8265: 07,069.068c punar eva vacaḥ prāha śanair ācāryapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8267: 07,069.068d*0509_02 uvāca cainam ācāryas tava putram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8269: 07,069.069b*0510_01 brahmaṇaś ca svasūktena badhnāmi kavacaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:8270: 07,069.069c hiraṇyagarbheṇa yathā baddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ purā raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:8272: 07,069.070c śakrasya kavacaṃ divyaṃ tathā badhnāmy ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:8273: 07,069.071a baddhvā tu kavacaṃ tasya mantreṇa vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:8274: 07,069.071c preṣayām āsa rājānaṃ yuddhāya mahate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8276: 07,069.072b*0511_01 prasthitaḥ sahasā rājan yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8280: 07,069.074a vṛtaḥ prāyān mahābāhur arjunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:8284: 07,069.075a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt sainyānāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:8285: 07,069.075c agādhaṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā samudram iva kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:8290: 07,070.002c pāṇḍavāḥ somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:8291: 07,070.003a tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:8293: 07,070.004a rājan kadā cin nāsmābhir dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛṅ na ca śrutam

GE07mbh_07_u:8295: 07,070.004c yādṛṅ madhyagate sūrye yuddham āsīd viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:8302: 07,070.008a sametya tu mahāsene cakratur vegam uttamam

GE07mbh_07_u:8312: 07,070.013a vārayām āsa tān droṇo jalaughān acalo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:8313: 07,070.013c pāṇḍavān samare kruddhān pāñcālāṃś ca sakekayān

GE07mbh_07_u:8326: 07,070.020a tathā tu yatamānasya droṇasya yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:8330: 07,070.022a sainyāny aghaṭayad yāni droṇas tu rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8331: 07,070.022c vyadhamac cāpi tāny asya dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8335: 07,070.024c saṃgrāme tumule tasminn iti saṃmenire janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8337: 07,070.025c drāvyate tadvad āpannā pāṇḍavais tava vāhinī

GE07mbh_07_u:8343: 07,070.028c babhūva rūpaṃ droṇasya kālāgner iva dīpyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8344: 07,070.029a rathaṃ nāgaṃ hayaṃ cāpi pattinaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:8346: 07,070.030a pāṇḍavānāṃ tu sainyeṣu nāsti kaś cit sa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:8347: 07,070.030c dadhāra yo raṇe bāṇān droṇacāpacyutāñ śitān
GE07mbh_07_u:8349: 07,070.031c babhrāma pārṣataṃ sainyaṃ tatra tatraiva bhārata

GE07mbh_07_u:8353: 07,070.032c abhavat sarvato dīptaṃ śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā

GE07mbh_07_u:8357: 07,070.034c nāsīt kaś cin mahārāja yo 'tyākṣīt saṃyugaṃ bhayāt

GE07mbh_07_u:8390: 07,070.050c kṛpaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca śalaḥ śalyaś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8394: 07,071.001a rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
GE07mbh_07_u:8395: 07,071.001c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:8398: 07,071.003a rakṣamāṇāḥ svakaṃ vyūhaṃ droṇasyāpi ca sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8399: 07,071.003c ayodhayan raṇe pārthān prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8402: 07,071.005a virāṭaś ca mahārāja tāv ubhau samare sthitau

GE07mbh_07_u:8415: 07,071.010c abhavat saṃvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana

GE07mbh_07_u:8422: 07,071.013c indriyārthā yathā dehaṃ śaśvad dehabhṛtāṃ vara

GE07mbh_07_u:8427: 07,071.016a samāśvastas tu vārṣṇeyas tava putraṃ mahāratham

GE07mbh_07_u:8907: 07,076.006c tathā kṛṣṇāv adṛśyetāṃ senājālaṃ vidārya tat

GE07mbh_07_u:8914: 07,076.010a tāvakās tava putrāś ca droṇānīkasthayos tayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8915: 07,076.010c naitau tariṣyato droṇam iti cakrus tadā matim

GE07mbh_07_u:8918: 07,076.012a āśā balavatī rājan putrāṇām abhavat tava

GE07mbh_07_u:8928: 07,076.017a yady asya samare goptā śakro devagaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:8929: 07,076.017c tathāpy enaṃ haniṣyāva iti kṛṣṇāv abhāṣatām

GE07mbh_07_u:8977: 07,076.040c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ tatra kṛṣṇayoḥ pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:8978: 07,076.041a ye ca te sindhurājasya goptāraḥ pāvakopamāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8979: 07,076.041c te prahṛṣyanta samare dṛṣṭvā putraṃ tavābhibho
GE07mbh_07_u:8980: 07,076.042a dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇas tv atikrāntaṃ sahānugam
GE07mbh_07_u:8981: 07,076.042c abravīd arjunaṃ rājan prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8984: 07,077.001c āpadgatam imaṃ manye nāsty asya sadṛśo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8988: 07,077.003c kṛtī ca satataṃ pārtha nityaṃ dveṣṭi ca pāṇḍavān

GE07mbh_07_u:8990: 07,077.004c atra vo dyūtam āyātaṃ vijayāyetarāya vā
GE07mbh_07_u:8993: 07,077.006a so 'yaṃ prāptas tavākṣepaṃ paśya sāphalyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:8994: 07,077.006c kathaṃ hi rājā rājyārthī tvayā gaccheta saṃyugam

GE07mbh_07_u:8999: 07,077.009a tvāṃ hi lokās trayaḥ pārtha sasurāsuramānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9000: 07,077.009c notsahante raṇe jetuṃ kim utaikaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9001: 07,077.010a sa diṣṭyā samanuprāptas tava pārtha rathāntikam
GE07mbh_07_u:9002: 07,077.010c jahy enaṃ vai mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9003: 07,077.011a eṣa hy anarthe satataṃ parākrāntas tavānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:9004: 07,077.011c nikṛtyā dharmarājaṃ ca dyūte vañcitavān ayam
GE07mbh_07_u:9007: 07,077.013a tam anāryaṃ sadā kṣudraṃ puruṣaṃ kāmacāriṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:9008: 07,077.013c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi pārthāvicārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:9010: 07,077.014c parikleśaṃ ca kṛṣṇāyā hṛdi kṛtvā parākrama
GE07mbh_07_u:9013: 07,077.016a diṣṭyā jānāti saṃgrāme yoddhavyaṃ hi tvayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:9014: 07,077.016c diṣṭyā ca saphalāḥ pārtha sarve kāmā hi kāmitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9015: 07,077.017a tasmāj jahi raṇe pārtha dhārtarāṣṭraṃ kulādhamam
GE07mbh_07_u:9016: 07,077.017c yathendreṇa hataḥ pūrvaṃ jambho devāsure mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:9017: 07,077.018a asmin hate tvayā sainyam anāthaṃ bhidyatām idam
GE07mbh_07_u:9018: 07,077.018c vairasyāsyās tv avabhṛtho mūlaṃ chindhi durātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:9020: 07,077.019a taṃ tathety abravīt pārthaḥ kṛtyarūpam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:9021: 07,077.019c sarvam anyad anādṛtya gaccha yatra suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9022: 07,077.020a yenaitad dīrghakālaṃ no bhuktaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_07_u:9023: 07,077.020c apy asya yudhi vikramya chindyāṃ mūrdhānam āhave

GE07mbh_07_u:9027: 07,077.021d*0548_02 duryodhanaṃ raṇe hatvā pratimokṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:9028: 07,077.022a ity evaṃ vādinau hṛṣṭau kṛṣṇau śvetān hayottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:9029: 07,077.022c preṣayām āsatuḥ saṃkhye prepsantau taṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_07_u:9030: 07,077.023a tayoḥ samīpaṃ saṃprāpya putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:9031: 07,077.023c na cakāra bhayaṃ prāpte bhaye mahati māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:9032: 07,077.024a tad asya kṣatriyās tatra sarva evābhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:9034: 07,077.025a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:9035: 07,077.025c mahān nādo hy abhūt tatra dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:9038: 07,077.027a āvāritas tu kaunteyas tava putreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_07_u:9039: 07,077.027c saṃrambham agamad bhūyaḥ sa ca tasmin paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9042: 07,077.029a dṛṣṭvā tu pārthaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:9043: 07,077.029c prahasann iva putras te yoddhukāmaḥ samāhvayat
GE07mbh_07_u:9044: 07,077.030a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9046: 07,077.031a tau hṛṣṭarūpau saṃprekṣya kauraveyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9048: 07,077.032a śokam īyuḥ paraṃ caiva kuravaḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_07_u:9049: 07,077.032c amanyanta ca putraṃ te vaiśvānaramukhe hutam
GE07mbh_07_u:9050: 07,077.033a tathā tu dṛṣṭvā yodhās te prahṛṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_07_u:9051: 07,077.033c hato rājā hato rājety ūcur evaṃ bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9053: 07,077.034c vyetu vo bhīr ahaṃ kṛṣṇau preṣayiṣyāmi mṛtyave

GE07mbh_07_u:9056: 07,077.036a pārtha yac chikṣitaṃ te 'straṃ divyaṃ mānuṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9057: 07,077.036c tad darśaya mayi kṣipraṃ yadi jāto 'si pāṇḍunā
GE07mbh_07_u:9058: 07,077.037a yad balaṃ tava vīryaṃ ca keśavasya tathaiva ca

GE07mbh_07_u:9063: 07,078.001a evam uktvārjunaṃ rājā tribhir marmātigaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9066: 07,078.002c pratodaṃ cāsya bhallena chittvā bhūmāv apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:9069: 07,078.004a teṣāṃ vaiphalyam ālokya punar nava ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9070: 07,078.004c prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇāṃs te cābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9071: 07,078.005a aṣṭāviṃśat tu tān bāṇān astān viprekṣya niṣphalān
GE07mbh_07_u:9075: 07,078.006c tvayā saṃpreṣitāḥ pārtha nārthaṃ kurvanti patriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9077: 07,078.007c muṣṭiś ca te yathāpūrvaṃ bhujayoś ca balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:9078: 07,078.008a na ced vidher ayaṃ kālaḥ prāptaḥ syād adya paścimaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9079: 07,078.008c tava caivāsya śatroś ca tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9080: 07,078.009a vismayo me mahān pārtha tava dṛṣṭvā śarān imān
GE07mbh_07_u:9083: 07,078.010c śarāḥ kurvanti te nārthaṃ pārtha kādya viḍambanā
GE07mbh_07_u:9087: 07,078.012a asminn antarhitaṃ kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:9088: 07,078.012c eko droṇo hi vedaitad ahaṃ tasmāc ca sattamāt
GE07mbh_07_u:9089: 07,078.013a na śakyam etat kavacaṃ bāṇair bhettuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:9090: 07,078.013c api vajreṇa govinda svayaṃ maghavatā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:9091: 07,078.014a jānaṃs tvam api vai kṛṣṇa māṃ vimohayase katham
GE07mbh_07_u:9092: 07,078.014c yadvṛttaṃ triṣu lokeṣu yac ca keśava vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:9093: 07,078.015a tathā bhaviṣyad yac caiva tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:9094: 07,078.015c na tv evaṃ veda vai kaś cid yathā tvaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:9095: 07,078.016a eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imām
GE07mbh_07_u:9097: 07,078.017a yat tv atra vihitaṃ kāryaṃ naiṣa tad vetti mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:9098: 07,078.017c strīvad eṣa bibharty etāṃ yuktāṃ kavacadhāraṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:9099: 07,078.018a paśya bāhvoś ca me vīryaṃ dhanuṣaś ca janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:9101: 07,078.019a idam aṅgirase prādād deveśo varma bhāsvaram

GE07mbh_07_u:9103: 07,078.019c punar dadau surapatir mahyaṃ varma sasaṃgraham
GE07mbh_07_u:9104: 07,078.020a daivaṃ yady asya varmaitad brahmaṇā vā svayaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:9105: 07,078.020c naitad gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇahataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:9111: 07,078.022a tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūrato brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_07_u:9113: 07,078.023a naitad astraṃ mayā śakyaṃ dviḥ prayoktuṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:9114: 07,078.023c astraṃ mām eva hanyād dhi paśya tv adya balaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:9120: 07,078.026a tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ sṛkkaṇī parisaṃlihan
GE07mbh_07_u:9121: 07,078.026c nāpaśyata tato 'syāṅgaṃ yan na syād varmarakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9123: 07,078.027c hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:9124: 07,078.028a dhanur asyācchinac citraṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:9130: 07,078.030a taṃ kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9132: 07,078.031a te rathair bahusāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjarair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9138: 07,078.034a te hatā hanyamānāś ca nyagṛhṇaṃs taṃ rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:9142: 07,078.036a tato visphārya balavad gāṇḍīvaṃ jaghnivān ripūn
GE07mbh_07_u:9144: 07,078.037a pāñcajanyaṃ ca balavad dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9150: 07,078.038a tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣo nisvanena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9151: 07,078.038c niḥsattvāś ca sasattvāś ca kṣitau petus tadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9152: 07,078.039a tair vimukto ratho reje vāyvīrita ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9154: 07,078.040a te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārthaṃ goptāraḥ saindhavasya tu
GE07mbh_07_u:9158: 07,078.042a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ samutthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9162: 07,078.044a sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:9166: 07,078.046a atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakā dṛśya daṃśitau
GE07mbh_07_u:9170: 07,079.001c prāg atvarañ jighāṃsantas tathaiva vijayaḥ parān
GE07mbh_07_u:9172: 07,079.002c dīpayanto diśaḥ sarvā jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9174: 07,079.003c kūjadbhir atulān nādān roṣitair uragair iva
GE07mbh_07_u:9176: 07,079.004c kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca drauṇiś ca rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9177: 07,079.005a te pibanta ivākāśam aśvair aṣṭau mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9180: 07,079.006c samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvāḥ pārthaṃ ca viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9181: 07,079.007a kaulūtakā hayāś citrā vahantas tān mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:9182: 07,079.007c vyaśobhanta tadā śīghrā dīpayanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:9184: 07,079.008c pārvatīyair nadījaiś ca saindhavaiś ca hayottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9188: 07,079.010c pūrayanto divaṃ rājan pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarām
GE07mbh_07_u:9191: 07,079.011e devadattaṃ ca kaunteyaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ ca keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9193: 07,079.012c pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś caiva samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_07_u:9208: 07,079.019c babhūva bhṛśam udvignaṃ nirghātair iva nāditam
GE07mbh_07_u:9209: 07,079.020a sa śabdaḥ sumahān rājan diśaḥ sarvā vyanādayat

GE07mbh_07_u:9620: 07,084.001@009_0027 cikṣepa ca gadāśaktīs tomarān atha paṭṭasān
GE07mbh_07_u:9622: 07,084.001@009_0029 anyonyam ārād ālokya rākṣasau tau mahābalau
GE07mbh_07_u:9623: 07,084.001@009_0030 bhairavaṃ nadatur nādān satoyāv iva toyadau
GE07mbh_07_u:9625: 07,084.001@009_0032 yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:9626: 07,084.001@009_0033 tau śaktīś ca pinākāṃś ca vajrān khaḍgān paraṣvadhān
GE07mbh_07_u:9629: 07,084.001@009_0036 yantreṇeva tadā rājan bhṛśaṃ nādān pracakratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9632: 07,084.001@009_0039 tad bhaimaseniḥ saṃprekṣya cakraṃ vegavad antare
GE07mbh_07_u:9633: 07,084.001@009_0040 gadayā tāḍayām āsa tad dīrṇaṃ śatadhābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:9635: 07,084.001@009_0042 daṃśakair iva sā senā patadbhir bhṛśasaṃkulā
GE07mbh_07_u:9636: 07,084.001@009_0043 tataḥ pratihate cakre sa vīro roṣasaṃkulaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9637: 07,084.001@009_0044 prāhiṇot tarasā śūlaṃ śaktīr daśaśatās tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:9645: 07,084.001c haiḍimbaḥ prayayau tūrṇaṃ vivyādha ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9650: 07,084.003b*0567_02 yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayoḥ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:9653: 07,084.003e alambusam atho viddhvā siṃhavad vyanadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9655: 07,084.004c viddhvā viddhvānadad dhṛṣṭaḥ pūrayan khaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9660: 07,084.007a yāṃ yāṃ ghaṭotkaco yuddhe māyāṃ darśayate nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:9661: 07,084.007c tāṃ tām alambuso rājan māyayaiva nijaghnivān
GE07mbh_07_u:9664: 07,084.009a ta enaṃ bhṛśasaṃkruddhāḥ sarvataḥ pravarā rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9667: 07,084.010c sarvato vyakiran bāṇair ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_07_u:9669: 07,084.011c tasmād rathavrajān mukto vanadāhād iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9672: 07,084.012e yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tribhir viddhvā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9673: 07,084.013a nakulaṃ ca trisaptatyā drupadeyāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:9674: 07,084.013c pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir viddhvā ghoraṃ nādaṃ nanāda ha
GE07mbh_07_u:9675: 07,084.014a taṃ bhīmaseno navabhiḥ sahadevaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9677: 07,084.014e nakulaś ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā draupadeyās tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9678: 07,084.015a haiḍimbo rākṣasaṃ viddhvā yuddhe pañcāśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9679: 07,084.015c punar vivyādha saptatyā nanāda ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9683: 07,084.016c prativivyādha tān sarvān pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9684: 07,084.017a taṃ kruddhaṃ rākṣasaṃ yuddhe pratikruddhas tu rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9688: 07,084.019a te śarā nataparvāṇo viviśū rākṣasaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:9689: 07,084.019c ruṣitāḥ pannagā yadvad girim ugrā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9690: 07,084.020a tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan samantān niśitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:9691: 07,084.020c preṣayām āsur udvignā haiḍimbaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9695: 07,084.021b*0570_03 samīkṣya tadavasthaṃ taṃ vadhāyāsya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_07_u:9696: 07,084.021b*0570_04 vegaṃ cakre mahāntaṃ ca rākṣasendrarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:9700: 07,084.021b@010_0004 śarāḥ prādurbhavanti sma dvirephā iva khād diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9702: 07,084.021b@010_0006 na sma vijñāyate kiṃ cid andhakāre kṛte śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9706: 07,084.021b@010_0010 akṣamīṣāṃ yugaṃ caiva ciccheda yudhi tāḍayan
GE07mbh_07_u:9708: 07,084.021b@010_0012 tasmin māyāmayaṃ ghoram astravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
GE07mbh_07_u:9709: 07,084.021b@010_0013 ghaṭotkaco 'pyāśu rathāt praskandya sa tam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9720: 07,084.021b@010_0024 abhidudrāva vegena siṃhaḥ siṃham iva sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9729: 07,084.021b@010_0033 tayor gātreṣu patitāv asī bhinnau nipetatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9731: 07,084.021b@010_0035 tataḥ sainyāni dadṛśus tad yuddham atidāruṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:9732: 07,084.021b@010_0036 yuddhaṃ tayo rākṣasayor āmiṣe śyenayor iva
GE07mbh_07_u:9736: 07,084.021b@010_0040 ubhau nistriṃśahastau tau sapakṣāv iva pakṣiṇau
GE07mbh_07_u:9737: 07,084.021b@010_0041 tato bhrāmya tu taṃ khaḍgaṃ pāṇḍoḥ kirmīranandanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9738: 07,084.021b@010_0042 cikṣepāsya śiro hartuṃ sa ca tasya ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9739: 07,084.021b@010_0043 tāv asī yugapad dīptau sametya vipulau bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:9740: 07,084.021b@010_0044 patitau tau tu bāhubhyāṃ rākṣasau samasajjatām
GE07mbh_07_u:9742: 07,084.021b@010_0046 punar vimiśritau vīrau vyāyudhyete muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9744: 07,084.021d*0571_01 rathād ratham abhidrutya kruddho haiḍimba ākṣipat
GE07mbh_07_u:9745: 07,084.021d*0571_02 udbabarha rathāc cāpi pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:9746: 07,084.022a samutkṣipya ca bāhubhyām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9752: 07,084.024d*0572_01 pāṇḍavānāṃ tataḥ senā taṃ dṛṣṭvā vinipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9754: 07,084.024d*0572_03 tatas tu nipapātāśu gatāsur bhuvi rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9756: 07,084.024d*0572_05 patatā tena mahatā rathināṃ dantināṃ daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:9758: 07,084.025a tataḥ sumanasaḥ pārthā hate tasmin niśācare
GE07mbh_07_u:9759: 07,084.025c cukruśuḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca vāsāṃsy ādudhuvuś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:9760: 07,084.026a tāvakāś ca hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:9763: 07,084.027a janāś ca tad dadṛśire rakṣaḥ kautūhalānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9765: 07,084.028a ghaṭotkacas tu tad dhatvā rakṣo balavatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:9766: 07,084.028c mumoca balavan nādaṃ balaṃ hatveva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9769: 07,084.029b*0573_01 tato ghaṭotkaco hatvā tad rakṣo vṛtrasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_07_u:9770: 07,084.029b*0573_02 punaḥ svaratham āsthāya vijigīṣur nanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9781: 07,084.030d*0574_03 mūrdhny upāghrāya taṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ pariṣvajya ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9784: 07,084.030d*0574_06 babhūvur muditāḥ sarve hate tasmin niśācare
GE07mbh_07_u:9787: 07,085.001c saṃjayācakṣva tattvena paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_07_u:9798: 07,085.006c abhyagur dharaṇīṃ rājañ śvasanta iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9803: 07,085.009a tataḥ kruddho maheṣvāso bhūya eva mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9806: 07,085.010c nābhyapadyata kartavyaṃ kiṃ cid eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:9808: 07,085.011c bhāradvājaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā visṛjantaṃ śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:9809: 07,085.012a taṃ tu saṃprekṣya te putrāḥ sainikāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:9811: 07,085.013a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pīḍyamānaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:9814: 07,085.014c grasyate yudhi vīreṇa bhānumān iva rāhuṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:9816: 07,085.015a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyam idam āha janādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:9817: 07,085.015b*0575_01 droṇaṃ vāraya sukṣipraṃ satyakaṃ mā vadhīd dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9818: 07,085.015c abhidrava drutaṃ droṇaṃ kiṃ nu tiṣṭhasi pārṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:9819: 07,085.015e na paśyasi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ droṇān naḥ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9826: 07,085.019a evam uktvā tato rājā sarvasainyena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9828: 07,085.020a tatrārāvo mahān āsīd droṇam ekaṃ yuyutsatām
GE07mbh_07_u:9829: 07,085.020c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhadraṃ te sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9832: 07,085.022a smayann eva tu tān vīrān droṇaḥ pratyagrahīt svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:9834: 07,085.023a tarpitās te śarais tasya bhāradvājasya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9836: 07,085.024a bhāradvājaṃ ca te sarve na śekuḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:9838: 07,085.025a tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9840: 07,085.026a vadhyamānā raṇe rājan pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:9847: 07,085.029b*0576_01 pāñcāleṣv atha śūreṣu kekayeṣu ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9848: 07,085.029c droṇaṃ sma dadṛśuḥ śūraṃ vinighnantaṃ varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:9849: 07,085.030a kekayānāṃ śataṃ hatvā vidrāvya ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9851: 07,085.031a pāñcālān sṛñjayān matsyān kekayān pāṇḍavān api
GE07mbh_07_u:9855: 07,085.033a tatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ pitaraś cābruvan nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:9856: 07,085.033c ete dravanti pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca sasainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9857: 07,085.034a taṃ tathā samare droṇaṃ nighnantaṃ somakān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:9858: 07,085.034c na cāpy abhiyayuḥ ke cid apare naiva vivyadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9866: 07,085.038a na nūnaṃ svasti pārthasya yathā nadati śaṅkharāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:9867: 07,085.038c kauravāś ca yathā hṛṣṭā vinadanti muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9870: 07,085.038d*0577_02 śrutvā tu ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pāñcajanyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:9875: 07,085.041a yaḥ sa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭaḥ sadbhiḥ śaineya śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9877: 07,085.042a sarveṣv api ca yodheṣu cintayañ śinipuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:9878: 07,085.042c tvattaḥ suhṛttamaṃ kaṃ cin nābhijānāmi sātyake
GE07mbh_07_u:9879: 07,085.043a yo hi prītamanā nityaṃ yaś ca nityam anuvrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9880: 07,085.043c sa kārye sāṃparāye tu niyojya iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9881: 07,085.044a yathā ca keśavo nityaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:9883: 07,085.045a so 'haṃ bhāraṃ samādhāsye tvayi taṃ voḍhum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:9884: 07,085.045c abhiprāyaṃ ca me nityaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:9885: 07,085.046a sa tvaṃ bhrātur vayasyasya guror api ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:9887: 07,085.047a tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9888: 07,085.047c loke vikhyāyase vīra karmabhiḥ satyavāg iti
GE07mbh_07_u:9889: 07,085.048a yo hi śaineya mitrārthe yudhyamānas tyajet tanum
GE07mbh_07_u:9890: 07,085.048c pṛthivīṃ vā dvijātibhyo yo dadyāt samam eva tat
GE07mbh_07_u:9891: 07,085.049a śrutāś ca bahavo 'smābhī rājāno ye divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9893: 07,085.049d*0578_01 dīyamānā hi bahubhir dāsyate ca muhur mahī
GE07mbh_07_u:9894: 07,085.049d*0578_02 nanu kaś cid raṇe prāṇān mitrārthe tyaktavān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:9895: 07,085.050a evaṃ tvām api dharmātman prayāce 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9896: 07,085.050c pṛthivīdānatulyaṃ syād adhikaṃ vā phalaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:9897: 07,085.051a eka eva sadā kṛṣṇo mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9898: 07,085.051c raṇe saṃtyajati prāṇān dvitīyas tvaṃ ca sātyake
GE07mbh_07_u:9899: 07,085.052a vikrāntasya ca vīrasya yuddhe prārthayato yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9900: 07,085.052c śūra eva sahāyaḥ syān netaraḥ prākṛto janaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9902: 07,085.053c tvad anyo hi raṇe goptā vijayasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:9903: 07,085.054a ślāghann eva hi karmāṇi śataśas tava pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9904: 07,085.054c mama saṃjanayan harṣaṃ punaḥ punar akīrtayat
GE07mbh_07_u:9906: 07,085.055c prājñaḥ sarvāstravic chūro muhyate na ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:9909: 07,085.057a śiṣyo mama sakhā caiva priyo 'syāhaṃ priyaś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:9911: 07,085.058a asmadarthaṃ ca rājendra saṃnahyed yadi keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9912: 07,085.058c rāmo vāpy aniruddho vā pradyumno vā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9913: 07,085.059a gado vā sāraṇo vāpi sāmbo vā saha vṛṣṇibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9916: 07,085.060c sāhāyye viniyokṣyāmi nāsti me 'nyo hi tatsamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9917: 07,085.061a iti dvaitavane tāta mām uvāca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9919: 07,085.062a tasya tvam evaṃ saṃkalpaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:9921: 07,085.063a yac cāpi tīrthāni carann agacchaṃ dvārakāṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:9922: 07,085.063c tatrāham api te bhaktim arjunaṃ prati dṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_07_u:9923: 07,085.064a na tat sauhṛdam anyeṣu mayā śaineya lakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9924: 07,085.064c yathā tvam asmān bhajase vartamānān upaplave
GE07mbh_07_u:9925: 07,085.065a so 'bhijātyā ca bhaktyā ca sakhyasyācāryakasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9927: 07,085.066a satyasya ca mahābāho anukampārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:9928: 07,085.066c anurūpaṃ maheṣvāsa karma tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:9929: 07,085.067a soyodhano hi sahasā gato droṇena daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9930: 07,085.067c pūrvam eva tu yātās te kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9931: 07,085.068a sumahān ninadaś caiva śrūyate vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:9932: 07,085.068c sa śaineya javenātra gantum arhasi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:9934: 07,085.069c droṇam āvārayiṣyāmo yadi tvāṃ prati yāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:9936: 07,085.070c mahāntaṃ ca raṇe śabdaṃ dīryamāṇāṃ ca bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:9939: 07,085.072a rathair viparidhāvadbhir manuṣyaiś ca hayaiś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:9943: 07,085.074a naitad balam asaṃvārya śakyo hantuṃ jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9949: 07,085.077a nāgānāṃ śṛṇu śabdaṃ ca pattīnāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9950: 07,085.077c sādināṃ dravatāṃ caiva śṛṇu kampayatāṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_07_u:9952: 07,085.078c bahutvād dhi naravyāghra devendram api pīḍayet
GE07mbh_07_u:9953: 07,085.079a aparyante bale magno jahyād api ca jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:9954: 07,085.079c tasmiṃś ca nihate yuddhe kathaṃ jīveta mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9956: 07,085.080a śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9957: 07,085.080c laghvastraś citrayodhī ca praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:9959: 07,085.081c tanna jānāmi vārṣṇeya yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE07mbh_07_u:9960: 07,085.081e kurūṇāṃ cāpi tat sainyaṃ sāgarapratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:9961: 07,085.082a eka eva ca bībhatsuḥ praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:9963: 07,085.083a na ca me vartate buddhir adya yuddhe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:9964: 07,085.083c droṇo 'pi rabhaso yuddhe mama pīḍayate balam
GE07mbh_07_u:9965: 07,085.083e pratyakṣaṃ te mahābāho yathāsau carati dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9966: 07,085.084a yugapac ca sametānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ tvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9968: 07,085.085a tasya me sarvakāryeṣu kāryam etan mataṃ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:9970: 07,085.086a nāhaṃ śocāmi dāśārhaṃ goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum
GE07mbh_07_u:9971: 07,085.086c sa hi śakto raṇe tāta trīṃl lokān api saṃgatān
GE07mbh_07_u:9972: 07,085.087a vijetuṃ puruṣavyāghra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:9973: 07,085.087c kiṃ punar dhārtarāṣṭrasya balam etat sudurbalam
GE07mbh_07_u:9974: 07,085.088a arjunas tv eva vārṣṇeya pīḍito bahubhir yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:9975: 07,085.088c prajahyāt samare prāṇāṃs tasmād vindāmi kaśmalam
GE07mbh_07_u:9976: 07,085.089a tasya tvaṃ padavīṃ gaccha gaccheyus tvādṛśā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:9978: 07,085.089d*0579_01 tvādṛśās tādṛśaṃ gacches tādṛśaṃ gaccha satyaka
GE07mbh_07_u:9979: 07,085.089d*0580_01 suhṛdo vai suhṛtkṛtye param āsthāya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:9980: 07,085.089d*0580_02 suhṛdaḥ padam anvicchan na vyatheta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:9982: 07,085.090c pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ ca sātvata viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9986: 07,085.092c tvām adya puruṣavyāghraṃ loke santaḥ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_07_u:9988: 07,085.092d*0581_02 yodhayet sa jagat sarvaṃ vijayeta ripūn bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:9989: 07,085.092d*0581_03 iti bruvanti lokeṣu janās tava guṇās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:9990: 07,085.092d*0581_04 samāgameṣu jalpanti pṛthag eva ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_07_u:9991: 07,085.093a nāsādhyaṃ vidyate loke sātyaker iti mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:9992: 07,085.093c tat tvāṃ yad abhivakṣyāmi tat kuruṣva mahābala
GE07mbh_07_u:9993: 07,085.094a saṃbhāvanā hi lokasya tava pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:9995: 07,085.095a parityajya priyān prāṇān raṇe vicara vīravat
GE07mbh_07_u:9996: 07,085.095c na hi śaineya dāśārhā raṇe rakṣanti jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:10000: 07,085.097c vāsudevo guruś cāpi tava pārthasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10001: 07,085.098a kāraṇadvayam etad dhi jānānas tvāham abruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:10002: 07,085.098c māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ gurus tava guror hy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:10004: 07,085.099c satyam etan mayoktaṃ te yāhi yatra dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10007: 07,085.101a praviśya ca yathānyāyaṃ saṃgamya ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10008: 07,085.101c yathārham ātmanaḥ karma raṇe sātvata darśaya
GE07mbh_07_u:10010: 07,086.001a prītiyuktaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca madhurākṣaram eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10011: 07,086.001c kālayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca svatayā cābhibhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:10014: 07,086.003a śrutaṃ te gadato vākyaṃ sarvam etan mayācyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:10015: 07,086.003c nyāyayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca phalgunārthe yaśaskaram
GE07mbh_07_u:10016: 07,086.004a evaṃvidhe tathā kāle madṛśaṃ prekṣya saṃmatam
GE07mbh_07_u:10017: 07,086.004c vaktum arhasi rājendra yathā pārthaṃ tathaiva mām
GE07mbh_07_u:10018: 07,086.005a na me dhanaṃjayasyārthe prāṇā rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:10019: 07,086.005c tvatprayuktaḥ punar ahaṃ kiṃ na kuryāṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:10023: 07,086.007c vijeṣye ca raṇe rājan satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:10025: 07,086.008c hate jayadrathe rājan punar eṣyāmi te 'ntikam
GE07mbh_07_u:10026: 07,086.009a avaśyaṃ tu mayā sarvaṃ vijñāpyas tvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:10027: 07,086.009c vāsudevasya yad vākyaṃ phalgunasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10028: 07,086.010a dṛḍhaṃ tv abhiparīto 'ham arjunena punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10031: 07,086.011c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yāvad dhanmi jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:10032: 07,086.012a tvayi vāhaṃ mahābāho pradyumne vā mahārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:10034: 07,086.012d*0582_01 sa evaṃ vai vinikṣipto nikṣepaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_07_u:10036: 07,086.013a jānīṣe hi raṇe droṇaṃ rabhasaṃ śreṣṭhasaṃmatam
GE07mbh_07_u:10037: 07,086.013c pratijñā cāpi te nityaṃ śrutā droṇasya mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:10039: 07,086.014c śaktaś cāpi raṇe droṇo nigṛhītuṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:10041: 07,086.015c aham adya gamiṣyāmi saindhavasya vadhāya hi
GE07mbh_07_u:10042: 07,086.015d*0583_01 sa tvam adya raṇe yatto rakṣa mādhava pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10043: 07,086.015d*0583_02 rakṣaṇe dharmarājasya dhruvo hi vijayo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:10044: 07,086.016a jayadratham ahaṃ hatvā dhruvam eṣyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:10045: 07,086.016c dharmarājaṃ yathā droṇo nigṛhṇīyād raṇe balāt
GE07mbh_07_u:10047: 07,086.017c saindhavasya vadho na syān mamāprītis tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:10049: 07,086.018c asmākaṃ gamanaṃ vyaktaṃ vanaṃ prati bhavet punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10050: 07,086.019a so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ vyartha eva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:10051: 07,086.019c yadi droṇo raṇe kruddho nigṛhṇīyād yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:10052: 07,086.020a sa tvam adya mahābāho priyārthaṃ mama mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:10053: 07,086.020c jayārthaṃ ca yaśorthaṃ ca rakṣa rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:10054: 07,086.021a sa bhavān mayi nikṣepo nikṣiptaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_07_u:10055: 07,086.021c bhāradvājād bhayaṃ nityaṃ paśyamānena te prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:10056: 07,086.022a tasyāpi ca mahābāho nityaṃ paśyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10057: 07,086.022c nānyaṃ hi pratiyoddhāraṃ raukmiṇeyād ṛte prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:10058: 07,086.022e māṃ vāpi manyate yuddhe bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10060: 07,086.023a so 'haṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ caitām ācāryavacanaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_07_u:10061: 07,086.023c pṛṣṭhato notsahe kartuṃ tvāṃ vā tyaktuṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_07_u:10063: 07,086.024c upalabhya raṇe krīḍed yathā śakuninā śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10064: 07,086.025a yadi kārṣṇir dhanuṣpāṇir iha syān makaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10065: 07,086.025c tasmai tvāṃ visṛjeyaṃ vai sa tvāṃ rakṣed yathārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10066: 07,086.026a kuru tvam ātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
GE07mbh_07_u:10067: 07,086.026c yaḥ pratīyād raṇe droṇaṃ yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10068: 07,086.027a mā ca te bhayam adyāstu rājann arjunasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10069: 07,086.027c na sa jātu mahābāhur bhāram udyamya sīdati
GE07mbh_07_u:10070: 07,086.028a ye ca sauvīrakā yodhās tathā saindhavapauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10071: 07,086.028c udīcyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca ye cānye 'pi mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10072: 07,086.029a ye ca karṇamukhā rājan rathodārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10076: 07,086.031a jaṅgamāḥ sthāvaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nālaṃ pārthasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10077: 07,086.031c evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja vyetu te bhīr dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_07_u:10079: 07,086.032c na tatra karmaṇo vyāpat kathaṃ cid api vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:10080: 07,086.033a daivaṃ kṛtāstratāṃ yogam amarṣam api cāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:10081: 07,086.033c kṛtajñatāṃ dayāṃ caiva bhrātus tvam anucintaya
GE07mbh_07_u:10082: 07,086.034a mayi cāpy apayāte vai gacchamāne 'rjunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10083: 07,086.034c droṇe citrāstratāṃ saṃkhye rājaṃs tvam anucintaya
GE07mbh_07_u:10084: 07,086.035a ācāryo hi bhṛśaṃ rājan nigrahe tava gṛdhyati
GE07mbh_07_u:10085: 07,086.035c pratijñām ātmano rakṣan satyāṃ kartuṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:10086: 07,086.036a kuruṣvādyātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
GE07mbh_07_u:10087: 07,086.036c yasyāhaṃ pratyayāt pārtha gaccheyaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10088: 07,086.036d*0585_01 pratyayo na hi me pārtha yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10089: 07,086.037a na hy ahaṃ tvā mahārāja anikṣipya mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:10090: 07,086.037c kva cid yāsyāmi kauravya satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:10091: 07,086.037d*0586_01 na paśyāmi rathaṃ kaṃ cid yas te goptā bhaved iha
GE07mbh_07_u:10092: 07,086.037d*0586_02 śaktaṃ yaṃ manyase rājan goptāraṃ prati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:10093: 07,086.038a etad vicārya bahuśo buddhyā buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:10094: 07,086.038c dṛṣṭvā śreyaḥ paraṃ buddhyā tato rājan praśādhi mām
GE07mbh_07_u:10096: 07,086.039a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:10097: 07,086.039c na tu me śudhyate bhāvaḥ śvetāśvaṃ prati māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:10098: 07,086.040a kariṣye paramaṃ yatnam ātmano rakṣaṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10099: 07,086.040c gaccha tvaṃ samanujñāto yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10101: 07,086.041c vicāryaitad dvayaṃ buddhyā gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
GE07mbh_07_u:10102: 07,086.042a sa tvam ātiṣṭha yānāya yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10105: 07,086.043a pārṣataś ca sasodaryaḥ pārthivāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10106: 07,086.043c draupadeyāś ca māṃ tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10107: 07,086.044a kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10108: 07,086.044c virāṭo drupadaś caiva śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10109: 07,086.045a dhṛṣṭaketuś ca balavān kuntibhojaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:10110: 07,086.045c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:10111: 07,086.045e ete samāhitās tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10112: 07,086.046a na droṇaḥ saha sainyena kṛtavarmā ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:10113: 07,086.046c samāsādayituṃ śakto na ca māṃ dharṣayiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:10114: 07,086.047a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca samare droṇaṃ kruddhaṃ paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10117: 07,086.048c na droṇasainyaṃ balavat krāmet tatra kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:10119: 07,086.049c kavacī sa śarī khaḍgī dhanvī ca varabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10120: 07,086.049d*0588_01 eṣa droṇaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayeta sa vai prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:10121: 07,086.049d*0588_02 pāñcālaḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dhanvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10122: 07,086.050a viśrabdho gaccha śaineya mā kārṣīr mayi saṃbhramam
GE07mbh_07_u:10126: 07,087.001c pārthāc ca bhayam āśaṅkan parityāgān mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10127: 07,087.002a apavādaṃ hy ātmanaś ca lokād rakṣan viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10128: 07,087.002c na māṃ bhīta iti brūyur āyāntaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:10134: 07,087.004a kṛtāṃ cen manyase rakṣāṃ svasti te 'stu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:10136: 07,087.005a na hi me pāṇḍavāt kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:10137: 07,087.005c yo vai priyataro rājan satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:10138: 07,087.006a tasyāhaṃ padavīṃ yāsye saṃdeśāt tava mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:10139: 07,087.006c tvatkṛte na ca me kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:10140: 07,087.007a yathā hi me guror vākyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:10141: 07,087.007c tathā tavāpi vacanaṃ viśiṣṭataram eva me
GE07mbh_07_u:10142: 07,087.008a priye hi tava vartete bhrātarau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_07_u:10143: 07,087.008c tayoḥ priye sthitaṃ caiva viddhi māṃ rājapuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:10144: 07,087.009a tavājñāṃ śirasā gṛhya pāṇḍavārtham ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:10146: 07,087.010a droṇānīkaṃ viśāmy eṣa kruddho jhaṣa ivārṇavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10147: 07,087.010c tatra yāsyāmi yatrāsau rājan rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10148: 07,087.011a yatra senāṃ samāśritya bhītas tiṣṭhati pāṇḍavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:10150: 07,087.012a itas triyojanaṃ manye tam adhvānaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:10154: 07,087.014a anādiṣṭas tu guruṇā ko nu yudhyeta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10155: 07,087.014c ādiṣṭas tu tvayā rājan ko na yudhyeta mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10156: 07,087.014e abhijānāmi taṃ deśaṃ yatra yāsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:10164: 07,087.017c nāgā meghanibhā rājan kṣaranta iva toyadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10166: 07,087.018c anyatra hi vadhād eṣāṃ nāsti rājan parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10167: 07,087.019a atha yān rathino rājan samantād anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:10169: 07,087.020a ratheṣv astreṣu nipuṇā nāgeṣu ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:10170: 07,087.020c dhanurvede gatāḥ pāraṃ muṣṭiyuddhe ca kovidāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10173: 07,087.022a śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca spardhante ca parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:10174: 07,087.022c nityaṃ ca samare rājan vijigīṣanti mānavān
GE07mbh_07_u:10177: 07,087.024a satataṃ priyakāmāś ca karṇasyaite vaśe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10179: 07,087.025a te na kṣatā na ca śrāntā dṛḍhāvaraṇakārmukāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10181: 07,087.026a etān pramathya saṃgrāme priyārthaṃ tava kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:10183: 07,087.027a yāṃs tv etān aparān rājan nāgān saptaśatāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10186: 07,087.028c svalaṃkṛtāṃs tathā preṣyān icchañ jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10187: 07,087.029a āsann ete purā rājaṃs tava karmakarā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:10188: 07,087.029c tvām evādya yuyutsante paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_07_u:10193: 07,087.032a etān bhittvā śarai rājan kirātān yuddhadurmadān
GE07mbh_07_u:10195: 07,087.033a ye tv ete sumahānāgā añjanasya kulodbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10199: 07,087.035a uttarāt parvatād ete tīkṣṇair dasyubhir āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10207: 07,087.038c kṛpaṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca droṇaṃ ca rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:10209: 07,087.039b*0593_01 bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇam āvantyāv atha saindhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:10210: 07,087.039b*0593_02 drauṇiṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca pāṇḍavān atimanyate
GE07mbh_07_u:10213: 07,087.040c na vimokṣyanti kaunteya yady api syur manojavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10216: 07,087.042a ye tv ete rathino rājan dṛśyante kāñcanadhvajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10217: 07,087.042c ete durvāraṇā nāma kāmbojā yadi te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10218: 07,087.043a śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10219: 07,087.043c saṃhatāś ca bhṛśaṃ hy ete anyonyasya hitaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10223: 07,087.045c tāṃs tv ahaṃ pramathiṣyāmi tṛṇānīva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10225: 07,087.046c rathe kurvantu me rājan yathāvad rathakalpakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10226: 07,087.047a asmiṃs tu khalu saṃgrāme grāhyaṃ vividham āyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:10237: 07,087.051d*0594_02 yāsyāmi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravaraṃ ca dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_07_u:10239: 07,087.051d*0594_04 apareṇa gate sūrye gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10240: 07,087.052a tasmād vai vājino mukhyā viśrāntāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10241: 07,087.052c upāvṛttāś ca pītāś ca punar yujyantu me rathe
GE07mbh_07_u:10243: 07,087.053c rathe prāsthāpayad rājā śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:10244: 07,087.054a tatas tān sarvato muktvā sadaśvāṃś caturo janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10255: 07,087.059a dārukasyānujo bhrātā sūtas tasya priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_07_u:10260: 07,087.061a tataḥ sa madhuparkārhaḥ pītvā kailāvataṃ madhu
GE07mbh_07_u:10264: 07,087.062e utsaṅge dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10266: 07,087.063c lājair gandhais tathā mālyaiḥ kanyābhiś cābhinanditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10270: 07,087.064d*0595_02 harṣeṇa mahatā yuktas tv āruroha rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:10271: 07,087.065a tatas te vājino hṛṣṭāḥ supuṣṭā vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10272: 07,087.065c ajayyā jaitram ūhus taṃ vikurvantaḥ sma saindhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10273: 07,087.065d*0596_01 yathā śakrarathaṃ rājann ūhus te harayaḥ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:10276: 07,087.065d*0596_04 tau dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantau tava senām ariṃdamau
GE07mbh_07_u:10278: 07,087.065d*0596_06 saṃnaddham anugacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:10281: 07,087.066c tvaṃ bhīma rakṣa rājānam etat kāryatamaṃ hi te

GE07mbh_07_u:11101: 07,095.001b*0661_06 kāmbojān yavanāṃś caiva vasātīṃś ca śibīn api
GE07mbh_07_u:11103: 07,095.001b*0661_08 etāṃś cānyān raṇe hatvāgacchad yuddhe sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11119: 07,095.007a hārdikyaṃ yodhavaryaṃ ca prāptaṃ manye dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:11120: 07,095.007c na hi me jāyate trāso dṛṣṭvā sainyāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11121: 07,095.007e vahner iva pradīptasya grīṣme śuṣkaṃ tṛṇolapam
GE07mbh_07_u:11124: 07,095.008d*0663_01 dravate tad yathā sainyaṃ tena bhagnaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:11125: 07,095.008d*0663_02 rathair viparidhāvadbhir gajair aśvaiś ca sārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:11129: 07,095.009d*0664_01 śrūyate hy eṣa nirghoṣo jaladasyeva garjataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11145: 07,095.015a na saṃbhramo me vārṣṇeya vidyate satyavikrama
GE07mbh_07_u:11146: 07,095.015c yady api syāt susaṃkruddho jāmadagnyo 'grataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11147: 07,095.016a droṇo vā rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛpo madreśvaro 'pi vā
GE07mbh_07_u:11148: 07,095.016c tathāpi saṃbhramo na syāt tvām āśritya mahābhuja
GE07mbh_07_u:11150: 07,095.017c na ca me saṃbhramaḥ kaś cid bhūtapūrvaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_07_u:11151: 07,095.017e kim u caitat samāsādya vīra saṃyugagoṣpadam
GE07mbh_07_u:11153: 07,095.018c keṣāṃ kruddho 'si vārṣṇeya keṣāṃ mṛtyur upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11154: 07,095.018e keṣāṃ saṃyamanīm adya gantum utsahate manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11159: 07,095.019f*0666_01 ity evaṃ karma kurvāṇam antakapratimaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:11162: 07,095.020a muṇḍān etān haniṣyāmi dānavān iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11163: 07,095.020c pratijñāṃ pārayiṣyāmi kāmbojān eva mā vaha
GE07mbh_07_u:11164: 07,095.020e adyaiṣāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā kṣipraṃ yāsyāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:11165: 07,095.021a adya drakṣyanti me vīryaṃ kauravāḥ sasuyodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11184: 07,095.027a adya me kruddharūpasya nighnataś ca varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:11185: 07,095.027c dvir arjunam imaṃ lokaṃ maṃsyate sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11188: 07,095.029a adya snehaṃ ca bhaktiṃ ca pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:11189: 07,095.029b*0670_01 balaṃ vīryaṃ kṛtajñatvaṃ mama jñāsyanti kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11192: 07,095.030a evam uktas tadā sūtaḥ śikṣitān sādhuvāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11196: 07,095.030d*0672_01 saindhavāṃś coditā yantrā ūhus te satyakaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:11204: 07,095.033c acchinat sātyakī rājan nainaṃ te prāpnuvañ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11206: 07,095.034c uccakarta śirāṃsy ugro yavanānāṃ bhujān api
GE07mbh_07_u:11208: 07,095.035c bhittvā dehāṃs tathā teṣāṃ śarā jagmur mahītalam
GE07mbh_07_u:11209: 07,095.036a te hanyamānā vīreṇa mlecchāḥ sātyakinā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:11212: 07,095.037c pañca ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca bibheda yavanāñ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11213: 07,095.038a kāmbojānāṃ sahasrais tu śakānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11216: 07,095.038d*0674_02 padātibhiś ca vīreṇa sātvatena hate raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:11218: 07,095.038d*0674_04 evaṃ tad yavanānīkaṃ hatvā chittvā ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11220: 07,095.039c kṛtavāṃs tatra śaineyaḥ kṣapayaṃs tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:11222: 07,095.040c tatra tatra mahī kīrṇā vibarhair aṇḍajair iva
GE07mbh_07_u:11224: 07,095.041c kabandhaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tāmrābhraiḥ kham ivāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:11227: 07,095.042d*0675_01 teṣām astrāṇi bāṇāṃś ca śaineyo nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11230: 07,095.042d*0675_04 bhittvā dehāṃs tathā teṣāṃ patanti sma mahītale
GE07mbh_07_u:11231: 07,095.042d*0675_05 te hanyamānā vīrās tu vṛṣṇivīreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:11233: 07,095.042d*0675_07 kāmbojānāṃ bhujaiś chinnaiḥ yavanānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11234: 07,095.042d*0675_08 tatra tatra mahī bhāti pañcāsyair iva pannagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11237: 07,095.044a pārṣṇibhiś ca kaśābhiś ca tāḍayantas turaṃgamān
GE07mbh_07_u:11238: 07,095.044c javam uttamam āsthāya sarvataḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:11240: 07,095.045c yavanānāṃ ca tat sainyaṃ śakānāṃ ca mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:11242: 07,095.046c prahṛṣṭas tāvakāñ jitvā sūtaṃ yāhīty acodayat
GE07mbh_07_u:11243: 07,095.046d*0676_01 tat tasya samare karma dṛṣṭvānyair akṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:11244: 07,095.046d*0676_02 cāraṇāḥ saha gandharvāḥ pūjayāṃ cakrire bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:11245: 07,095.047a taṃ yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhagoptāram arjunasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11246: 07,095.047c cāraṇāḥ prekṣya saṃhṛṣṭās tvadīyāś cāpy apūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:11247: 07,095.047d*0677_01 na ke cid abhyavartanta tāvakā vṛṣṇinandanam
GE07mbh_07_u:11250: 07,096.001c jagāma tava sainyasya madhyena rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11252: 07,096.002c mṛgān vyāghra ivājighraṃs tava sainyam abhīṣayat
GE07mbh_07_u:11253: 07,096.003a sa rathena caran mārgān dhanur abhrāmayad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:11260: 07,096.006c tāvakānāṃ babhau madhye gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11270: 07,096.010c śakunir duḥsahaś caiva yuvā durmarṣaṇaḥ krathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11271: 07,096.011a anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ śastravanto durāsadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11273: 07,096.012a atha śabdo mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11276: 07,096.013c śanair yāhīti yantāram abravīt prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:11277: 07,096.014a idam eti samuddhūtaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya yad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:11279: 07,096.015a nādayan vai diśaḥ sarvā rathaghoṣeṇa sārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:11280: 07,096.015c pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca kampayan sāgarān api
GE07mbh_07_u:11283: 07,096.017a paśya me sūta vikrāntam indrasyeva mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:11285: 07,096.017b*0679_02 udvṛttaḥ sāgaro yadvad velām āśrayate tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:11286: 07,096.017b*0679_03 mām āsādya hi tiṣṭhanti yaudhāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11287: 07,096.017c eṣa sainyāni śatrūṇāṃ vidhamāmi śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11290: 07,096.019a ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sātyaker amitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11291: 07,096.019c samīpaṃ sainikās te tu śīghram īyur yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11292: 07,096.019e jahy ādravasva tiṣṭheti paśya paśyeti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11293: 07,096.020a tān evaṃ bruvato vīrān sātyakir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11294: 07,096.020c jaghāna triśatān aśvān kuñjarāṃś ca catuḥśatān
GE07mbh_07_u:11296: 07,096.021a sa saṃprahāras tumulas tasya teṣāṃ ca dhanvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:11304: 07,096.024a āścaryaṃ tatra rājendra sumahad dṛṣṭavān aham
GE07mbh_07_u:11305: 07,096.024c na moghaḥ sāyakaḥ kaś cit sātyaker abhavat prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:11306: 07,096.024d*0683_01 nāsīn moghaḥ śaraḥ kaś cid āsan sarve tanucchidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11310: 07,096.026c tat sainyam iṣubhis tena vadhyamānaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11311: 07,096.026d*0684_01 rathinaḥ pattināgāś ca sādinaś ca śarā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11312: 07,096.026e babhrāma tatra tatraiva gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:11313: 07,096.027a padātinaṃ rathaṃ nāgaṃ sādinaṃ turagaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:11315: 07,096.028a na tādṛk kadanaṃ rājan kṛtavāṃs tatra phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11316: 07,096.028c yādṛk kṣayam anīkānām akarot sātyakir nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:11319: 07,096.029a tato duryodhano rājā sātvatasya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11320: 07,096.029c vivyādha sūtaṃ niśitaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:11321: 07,096.030a sātyakiṃ ca tribhir viddhvā punar vivyādha so 'ṣṭabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11326: 07,096.032c tān avidhyan mahārāja sarvān eva tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11329: 07,096.033d*0686_01 śyenavad vyacarat saṃkhye śaineyo laghu suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:11330: 07,096.034a saubalasya dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:11334: 07,096.036a athānyad dhanur ādāya syālas tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11335: 07,096.036c aṣṭabhiḥ sātyakiṃ viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11336: 07,096.037a duḥśāsanaś ca daśabhir duḥsahaś ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11337: 07,096.037c durmukhaś ca dvādaśabhī rājan vivyādha sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:11339: 07,096.038c tato 'sya niśitair bāṇais tribhir vivyādha sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:11340: 07,096.039a tān sarvān sahitāñ śūrān yatamānān mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:11341: 07,096.039c pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir bāṇaiḥ punar vivyādha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11342: 07,096.040a tataḥ sa rathināṃ śreṣṭhas tava putrasya sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:11343: 07,096.040c ājaghānāśu bhallena sa hato nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:11344: 07,096.041a pātite sārathau tasmiṃs tava putrarathaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:11346: 07,096.042a tatas tava sutā rājan sainikāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:11348: 07,096.043a vidrutaṃ tatra tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārata sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11351: 07,096.044c prayayau sātyakī rājañ śvetāśvasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:11352: 07,096.044d*0687_01 taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ tāvakāḥ prekṣya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11353: 07,096.044d*0687_02 dṛṣṭaṃ cādṛṣṭavat kṛtvā kriyām anyāṃ prayojayan
GE07mbh_07_u:11354: 07,096.045a taṃ śarān ādadānaṃ ca rakṣamāṇaṃ ca sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:11357: 07,097.001a saṃpramṛdya mahat sainyaṃ yāntaṃ śaineyam arjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:11358: 07,097.001c nirhrīkā mama te putrāḥ kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:11359: 07,097.002a kathaṃ caiṣāṃ tathā yuddhe dhṛtir āsīn mumūrṣatām
GE07mbh_07_u:11361: 07,097.003a kiṃ nu vakṣyanti te kṣātraṃ sainyamadhye parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11362: 07,097.003c kathaṃ ca sātyakir yuddhe vyatikrānto mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11363: 07,097.004a kathaṃ ca mama putrāṇāṃ jīvatāṃ tatra saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:11365: 07,097.005a atyadbhutam idaṃ tāta tvatsakāśāc chṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:11366: 07,097.005c ekasya bahubhir yuddhaṃ śatrubhir vai mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11367: 07,097.006a viparītam ahaṃ manye mandabhāgyān sutān prati
GE07mbh_07_u:11369: 07,097.007a ekasya hi na paryāptaṃ matsainyaṃ tasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:11372: 07,097.008c yathā paśugaṇān siṃhas tadvad dhantā sutān mama
GE07mbh_07_u:11374: 07,097.009c yuyudhāno na śakito hantuṃ yaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11375: 07,097.009d*0688_01 na śakyaḥ samare jetuṃ nihaniṣyati me sutān
GE07mbh_07_u:11376: 07,097.010a naitad īdṛśakaṃ yuddhaṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11377: 07,097.010c yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān yuddhaṃ śiner naptā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11380: 07,097.011c śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā yat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11383: 07,097.012a te punaḥ saṃnyavartanta kṛtvā saṃśaptakān mithaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11384: 07,097.012c parāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā putrasya tava śāsanāt
GE07mbh_07_u:11396: 07,097.018a tāṃś ca saṃcodayan sarvān ghnatainam iti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11399: 07,097.019c yad eko bahubhiḥ sārdham asaṃbhrāntam ayudhyata
GE07mbh_07_u:11400: 07,097.020a avadhīc ca rathānīkaṃ dviradānāṃ ca tad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:11401: 07,097.020c sādinaś caiva tān sarvān dasyūn api ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11402: 07,097.020d*0691_01 saṃprādravan mahat sainyaṃ bhagnaṃ ca bahudhā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11403: 07,097.021a tatra cakrair vimathitair bhagnaiś ca paramāyudhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11405: 07,097.022a kūbarair mathitaiś cāpi dhvajaiś cāpi nipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11407: 07,097.023a sragbhir ābharaṇair vastrair anukarṣaiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11408: 07,097.023c saṃchannā vasudhā tatra dyaur grahair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11411: 07,097.024b*0692_02 mṛgair mandaiś ca bhadraiś ca mṛgamandais tathāparaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11412: 07,097.024b*0692_03 bhadrair mandamanobhiś ca mṛgabhadrais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:11413: 07,097.024b*0692_04 mandair mandamadaiś caiva tathā mandamṛgair api
GE07mbh_07_u:11415: 07,097.024c añjanasya kule jātā vāmanasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:11418: 07,097.025c jātā dantivarā rājañ śerate bahavo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11422: 07,097.026c tathā hayavarān rājan nijaghne tatra sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11426: 07,097.028c nivartadhvam adharmajñā yudhyadhvaṃ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11427: 07,097.029a tāṃś cāpi sarvān saṃprekṣya putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:11432: 07,097.031c abhidravata mā bhaiṣṭa na vaḥ prāpsyati sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11440: 07,097.033d*0696_02 mlecchāḥ pipāsavaḥ prājñā rājānam iva mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11445: 07,097.036a tair aśmacūrṇair dīpyadbhiḥ khadyotānām iva vrajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11450: 07,097.037d*0697_02 sopalair bāhubhiś chinnaiḥ petur aprāpya sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:11451: 07,097.037d*0698_01 sātvatasya ca bhallena niṣpiṣṭais tais tathādribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11452: 07,097.037d*0698_02 nipatan nihatā mlecchās tatra tatra gatāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11459: 07,097.040a ambaṣṭhaiś ca kuṇindaiś ca kṣiptāṃ kṣiptāṃ sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11463: 07,097.042a aśmacūrṇaiḥ samākīrṇā manuṣyāś ca vayāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:11466: 07,097.043b*0699_01 vibhinnaśiraso rājan dantaiś chinnaiś ca dantinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11467: 07,097.043b*0699_02 nirdhūtaiś ca karair nāgā vyaṅgāś ca śataśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11468: 07,097.043b*0699_03 hatvā pañcaśatān yodhān sa kṣaṇenaiva māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11473: 07,097.044a tataḥ śabdaḥ samabhavat tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:11475: 07,097.045a taṃ śabdaṃ tumulaṃ śrutvā droṇo yantāram abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:11476: 07,097.045c eṣa sūta raṇe kruddhaḥ sātvatānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11477: 07,097.046a dārayan bahudhā sainyaṃ raṇe carati kālavat
GE07mbh_07_u:11478: 07,097.046c yatraiṣa śabdas tumulas tatra sūta rathaṃ naya
GE07mbh_07_u:11480: 07,097.047c tathā hi rathinaḥ sarve hriyante vidrutair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11481: 07,097.048a viśastrakavacā rugṇās tatra tatra patanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:11482: 07,097.048c na śaknuvanti yantāraḥ saṃyantuṃ tumule hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:11483: 07,097.049a ity evaṃ bruvato rājan bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11484: 07,097.049c pratyuvāca tato yantā droṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:11486: 07,097.050b*0701_01 āyuṣman vidravaty eva kurūṇāṃ sainyam āturam
GE07mbh_07_u:11487: 07,097.050c paśya yodhān raṇe bhinnān dhāvamānāṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11488: 07,097.051a ete ca sahitāḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:11489: 07,097.051c tvām eva hi jighāṃsantaḥ prādravanti samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:11491: 07,097.052c sthāne vā gamane vāpi dūraṃ yātaś ca sātyakiḥ
