GE07mbh_07_u:13667: 07,114.075d*0913_01 evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā karṇo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13668: 07,114.076a kaumāre yāni cāpy āsann apriyāṇi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:13669: 07,114.076c pūrvavṛttāni cāpy enaṃ rūkṣāṇy aśrāvayad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:13671: 07,114.076d*0914_01 rādheya śṛṇu me vākyaṃ sūryaputra balādhika
GE07mbh_07_u:13672: 07,114.076d*0914_02 loke tvatsadṛśo yodho na vidyeta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:13673: 07,114.076d*0914_03 yuṣmābhir yady ahaṃ mārgyas tadā kiṃ bahujalpitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13674: 07,114.076d*0914_04 atha tvayā na mārgyo 'haṃ tadā gacchāmi muñca mām
GE07mbh_07_u:13675: 07,114.076d*0915_01 evaṃ taṃ virathīkṛtya uccaiḥ saṃtarjya pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:13677: 07,114.077a athainaṃ tatra saṃlīnam aspṛśad dhanuṣā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13678: 07,114.077c prahasaṃś ca punar vākyaṃ bhīmam āha vṛṣas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:13679: 07,114.078a yoddhavyam āviśānyatra na yoddhavyaṃ tu mādṛśaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13680: 07,114.078c mādṛśair yudhyamānānām etac cānyac ca vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:13681: 07,114.079a gaccha vā yatra tau kṛṣṇau tau tvā rakṣiṣyato raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13682: 07,114.079c gṛhaṃ vā gaccha kaunteya kiṃ te yuddhena bālaka
GE07mbh_07_u:13683: 07,114.079d*0916_01 bhīma śabdārthasadbhāvī purāṇas tvaṃ hi me mataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13686: 07,114.079d*0916_04 nipuṇo 'si sadā bhīma na tvaṃ yuddhaviśārada
GE07mbh_07_u:13687: 07,114.079d*0916_05 tam utsmayan kaṇṭhadeśe pāṇinā saṃspṛśan vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13690: 07,114.079d*0917_02 uvāca karṇaṃ prahasan sarveṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13691: 07,114.079d*0917_03 jitas tvam asakṛd duṣṭa katthase tvaṃ vṛthātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:13696: 07,114.079d*0917_08 bhīmasya matam ājñāya karṇo buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13698: 07,114.079d*0918_01 bhīmo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭho dhanadāc chāpam āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:13702: 07,114.080a evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā karṇo rājan vyakatthata
GE07mbh_07_u:13704: 07,114.080d*0919_01 taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bhīmas tu kāṅkṣan bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13705: 07,114.080d*0919_02 na cākārṣīd drutaṃ smṛtvā hy arjunasya mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:13710: 07,114.080d*0919_06 evam uktas tadā pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:13722: 07,114.084c karṇo bhīmād apāyāsīd rathena mahatā drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:13730: 07,114.088a tam antarikṣe nārācaṃ drauṇiś ciccheda patriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:13733: 07,114.089b*0922_01 taṃ parīpsan mahārāja satyajit pārtham abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:13735: 07,114.089b*0922_03 karṇe pārthena vikṣiptaṃ nārācaṃ drauṇir acchinat
GE07mbh_07_u:13736: 07,114.089c śilīmukhair mahārāja mā gās tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:13741: 07,114.092a dhanaṃjayas tathā yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhato drauṇim abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:13748: 07,115.001*0923_01 dātavyam adya manye 'haṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ svakaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13749: 07,115.001*0923_02 na vigraho hi balinā śreyase syād yathātathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13750: 07,115.001*0923_03 pādayoḥ praṇatenāpi bhuktvāpy ucchiṣṭam apy areḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13751: 07,115.001*0923_04 ato 'nyad vāpi kṛtvaiva jīvyaṃ loke nareṇa vai
GE07mbh_07_u:13752: 07,115.001*0923_05 jīvataiva paro lokaḥ sādhyate caiva sarvathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13753: 07,115.001*0923_06 ajīvatas tathaivāsīn na sukhaṃ na parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13754: 07,115.001*0923_07 vināśe sarvathotpanne na bālo budhyate kriyām
GE07mbh_07_u:13756: 07,115.001a ahany ahani me dīptaṃ yaśaḥ patati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:13757: 07,115.001c hatā me bahavo yodhā manye kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_07_u:13758: 07,115.002a dhanaṃjayas tu saṃkruddhaḥ praviṣṭo māmakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:13762: 07,115.004a tadā prabhṛti mā śoko dahaty agnir ivāśayam
GE07mbh_07_u:13766: 07,115.006a anumānāc ca paśyāmi nāsti saṃjaya saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13768: 07,115.006c yuddhaṃ tu tad yathā vṛttaṃ tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13769: 07,115.007a yac ca vikṣobhya mahatīṃ senāṃ saṃloḍya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:13770: 07,115.007c ekaḥ praviṣṭaḥ saṃkruddho nalinīm iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13772: 07,115.008c dhanaṃjayārthe yat tasya kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:13793: yodhās tvadīyāś ca pare ca sarve
GE07mbh_07_u:13851: 07,116.005d*0926_01 athainam anuvṛttās tu trigartāḥ sahitāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13855: 07,116.006c pratīcyāṃ diśi taṃ dṛṣṭvā prācyāṃ paśyāma lāghavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:13856: 07,116.007a udīcīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ prācīṃ pratīcīṃ prasṛtas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13857: 07,116.007b*0927_01 nṛtyann iva jale śrānto yadā sthalam upeyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:13859: 07,116.007b*0928_02 ekaḥ paryacarad raṅge bahudhā sa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13860: 07,116.007c nṛtyann ivācarac chūro yathā rathaśataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13863: 07,116.008d*0929_01 tāṃ ca senām atikramya trigartānāṃ nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13867: 07,116.009a tam anye śūrasenānāṃ śūrāḥ saṃkhye nyavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:13869: 07,116.010a tān nyavārayad āyastān muhūrtam iva sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13871: 07,116.011a tāṃ ca senām atikramya kaliṅgānāṃ duratyayām
GE07mbh_07_u:13875: 07,116.011d*0930_03 te hatā nipatanti sma pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunā
GE07mbh_07_u:13876: 07,116.011d*0930_04 tataḥ prāyād asaṃbhrānto dadarśa ca dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:13877: 07,116.012a tarann iva jale śrānto yathā sthalam upeyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:13880: 07,116.013c asāv āyāti śaineyas tava pārtha padānugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13881: 07,116.014a eṣa śiṣyaḥ sakhā caiva tava satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13884: 07,116.015c tava prāṇaiḥ priyataraḥ kirīṭinn eti sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13885: 07,116.016a eṣa droṇaṃ tathā bhojaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:13888: 07,116.017c śūraś caiva kṛtāstraś ca phalgunābhyeti sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13892: 07,116.019c ācāryapramukhān pārtha āyāty eṣa hi sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13895: 07,116.020d*0931_01 priyaśiṣyaś ca te pārtha tvayā tulyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13896: 07,116.020d*0931_02 vidārya kauravīṃ senām eṣa āyāti satyakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13897: 07,116.021a yasya nāsti samo yodhaḥ kauraveṣu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:13899: 07,116.022a kurusainyād vimukto vai siṃho madhyād gavām iva
GE07mbh_07_u:13902: 07,116.023c āstīrya vasudhāṃ pārtha kṣipram āyāti sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13903: 07,116.024a eṣa duryodhanaṃ jitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13904: 07,116.024c nihatya jalasaṃdhaṃ ca kṣipram āyāti sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13907: 07,116.025c tṛṇavan nyasya kauravyān eṣa āyāti sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13908: 07,116.025d*0933_01 iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā keśavasyārjunas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:13910: 07,116.026c na me priyaṃ mahābāho yan mām abhyeti sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13911: 07,116.027a na hi jānāmi vṛttāntaṃ dharmarājasya keśava
GE07mbh_07_u:13912: 07,116.027c sātvatena vihīnaḥ sa yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE07mbh_07_u:13913: 07,116.028a etena hi mahābāho rakṣitavyaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13914: 07,116.028c tam eṣa katham utsṛjya mama kṛṣṇa padānugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13916: 07,116.029c pratyudyātaś ca śaineyam eṣa bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13917: 07,116.030a so 'yaṃ gurutaro bhāraḥ saindhavān me samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13918: 07,116.030c jñātavyaś ca hi me rājā rakṣitavyaś ca sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13919: 07,116.031a jayadrathaś ca hantavyo lambate ca divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13920: 07,116.031c śrāntaś caiṣa mahābāhur alpaprāṇaś ca sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_07_u:13921: 07,116.032a pariśrāntā hayāś cāsya hayayantā ca mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:13922: 07,116.032c na ca bhūriśravāḥ śrāntaḥ sasahāyaś ca keśava
GE07mbh_07_u:13923: 07,116.032d*0934_01 bhūriśravāḥ kṛtāstraś ca rakṣyo mādhava satyakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13924: 07,116.033a apīdānīṃ bhaved asya kṣemam asmin samāgame
GE07mbh_07_u:13925: 07,116.033c kaccin na sāgaraṃ tīrtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13930: 07,116.035c ācāryād bhayam utsṛjya yaḥ preṣayati sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:13932: 07,116.036c nityam āśaṃsate droṇaḥ kaccit syāt kuśalī nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13933: 07,116.036d*0935_01 āmiṣārthī yathā śyeno nityaṃ tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13934: 07,116.036d*0935_02 grahaṇe dharmaputrasya kaś cit kṣemī bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13939: 07,117.002c adya prāpto 'si diṣṭyā me cakṣurviṣayam ity uta
GE07mbh_07_u:13941: 07,117.003c na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:13942: 07,117.004a adya tvāṃ samare hatvā nityaṃ śūrābhimāninam
GE07mbh_07_u:13945: 07,117.005c drakṣyatas tvāṃ raṇe vīrau sahitau keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_07_u:13946: 07,117.006a adya dharmasuto rājā śrutvā tvāṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:13948: 07,117.007a adya me vikramaṃ pārtho vijñāsyati dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13950: 07,117.008a cirābhilaṣito hy adya tvayā saha samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13951: 07,117.008c purā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya balinā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13952: 07,117.009a adya yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ tava dāsyāmi sātvata
GE07mbh_07_u:13954: 07,117.010a adya saṃyamanīṃ yātā mayā tvaṃ nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13956: 07,117.011a adya kṛṣṇaś ca pārthaś ca dharmarājaś ca mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:13957: 07,117.011c hate tvayi nirutsāhā raṇaṃ tyakṣyanty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_07_u:13958: 07,117.012a adya te 'pacitiṃ kṛtvā śitair mādhava sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:13959: 07,117.012c tatstriyo nandayiṣyāmi ye tvayā nihatā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13961: 07,117.013c siṃhasya viṣayaṃ prāpto yathā kṣudramṛgas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:13962: 07,117.014a yuyudhānas tu taṃ rājan pratyuvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:13963: 07,117.014c kauraveya na saṃtrāso vidyate mama saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:13964: 07,117.014d*0936_01 nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyo vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:13965: 07,117.015a sa māṃ nihanyāt saṃgrāme yo māṃ kuryān nirāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:13966: 07,117.015c samās tu śāśvatīr hanyād yo māṃ hanyād dhi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:13967: 07,117.016a kiṃ mṛṣoktena bahunā karmaṇā tu samācara
GE07mbh_07_u:13968: 07,117.016c śāradasyeva meghasya garjitaṃ niṣphalaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_07_u:13969: 07,117.017a śrutvaitad garjitaṃ vīra hāsyaṃ hi mama jāyate
GE07mbh_07_u:13971: 07,117.018a tvarate me matis tāta tvayi yuddhābhikāṅkṣiṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:13973: 07,117.019a anyonyaṃ tau tadā vāgbhis takṣantau narapuṃgavau
GE07mbh_07_u:13975: 07,117.020a sametau tau naravyāghrau śuṣmiṇau spardhinau raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:13987: 07,117.024a tān asya viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān antarikṣe viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:13991: 07,117.026a tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau
GE07mbh_07_u:13993: 07,117.027a nirbhidantau hi gātrāṇi vikṣarantau ca śoṇitam
GE07mbh_07_u:14001: 07,117.030d*0939_01 vṛṣṭiṃ tām abhivarṣantau śarāṇāṃ mahatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:14002: 07,117.031a saṃpraikṣanta janās tatra yudhyamānau yudhāṃ patī
GE07mbh_07_u:14004: 07,117.031d*0940_01 bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarai rājaṃs takṣantau krodhamūrcchitau
GE07mbh_07_u:14012: 07,117.032a anyonyasya hayān hatvā dhanuṣī vinikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14014: 07,117.033a ārṣabhe carmaṇī citre pragṛhya vipule śubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:14015: 07,117.033c vikośau cāpy asī kṛtvā samare tau viceratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14016: 07,117.034a carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14019: 07,117.035b*0941_01 bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:14022: 07,117.035b*0941_04 ubhau chidraiṣiṇau vīrāv ubhau citraṃ vavalgatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14023: 07,117.035b*0941_05 darśayantāv ubhau śikṣāṃ lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:14027: 07,117.037a asibhyāṃ carmaṇī śubhre vipule ca śarāvare
GE07mbh_07_u:14035: 07,117.041a dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva maharṣabhau
GE07mbh_07_u:14041: 07,117.041d*0943_01 dvātriṃśat karaṇāni syur yāni yuddhāni bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:14049: 07,117.042d*0944_02 sīdantaṃ sātyakiṃ paśya pārthainaṃ parirakṣa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14050: 07,117.043a praviṣṭo bhāratīṃ senāṃ tava pāṇḍava pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14051: 07,117.043c yodhitaś ca mahāvīryaiḥ sarvair bhārata bhārataiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14052: 07,117.043d*0945_01 dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca ye mukhyā ye ca mukhyā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14057: 07,117.045c udyamya nyahanad rājan matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:14062: 07,117.047b*0947_01 bahubhir yas tu senābhir durjayaḥ samare 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:14064: 07,117.048a pariśrāntaṃ gataṃ bhūmau kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:14066: 07,117.049a na vaśaṃ yajñaśīlasya gacched eṣa varārihan
GE07mbh_07_u:14067: 07,117.049c tvatkṛte puruṣavyāghra tad āśu kriyatāṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:14072: 07,117.050f*0948_01 ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇe tu pāṇḍave vai dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_07_u:14074: 07,117.051c yad udyamya mahābāhuḥ sātyakiṃ nyahanad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:14075: 07,117.051d*0949_01 pātite tv atha śaineye kṛṣṇo 'rjunam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:14076: 07,117.052a sa siṃha iva mātaṅgaṃ vikarṣan bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14079: 07,117.052d*0950_01 mām eva ca mahābāho pariyānti mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14082: 07,117.052d*0950_04 rakṣāmi sātyakiṃ caiva saumadattiṃ vaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_07_u:14083: 07,117.052d*0950_05 aprāpto na mayā kṛṣṇa hantuṃ bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:14084: 07,117.052d*0950_06 anyena tu samāsaktaṃ mano notsahate mama
GE07mbh_07_u:14085: 07,117.052d*0950_07 avaśyaṃ ca mayā kṛṣṇa vṛṣṇivīrasya rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:14086: 07,117.052d*0950_08 madarthaṃ yudhyamānasya kāryaṃ prāṇair api prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:14087: 07,117.052d*0950_09 adharmo vāstu dharmo vā mama mādhava mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14089: 07,117.052d*0950_10 pareṇa nihato mā sma prāṇān hāsīn mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14090: 07,117.052d*0950_11 evam uktvārjunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ parān āśu śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14091: 07,117.052d*0950_12 chādayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pare cāpi dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:14092: 07,117.052d*0950_13 evaṃ sma yudhyate vīraḥ sātyakiṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14093: 07,117.052d*0950_14 prekṣate sma naravyāghro bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14094: 07,117.053a atha kośād viniṣkṛṣya khaḍgaṃ bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:14096: 07,117.053d*0951_01 ākramya cāpy athodyamya sa sāsiṃ subhujo bhujam
GE07mbh_07_u:14099: 07,117.053d*0952_01 tato 'sya chettum ārabdhaḥ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṃḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:14100: 07,117.053d*0952_02 tāvat kṣaṇāt sātvato 'pi śiraḥ saṃbhramayaṃs tvaran
GE07mbh_07_u:14101: 07,117.053d*0952_03 yathā rathāṃgaṃ kaulālo daṇḍaviddhaṃ tu bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:14104: 07,117.053d*0954_01 hāhākṛtam abhūt sarvaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:14105: 07,117.053d*0954_02 tāvakāś ca mudā yuktāḥ siṃhanādaṃ vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14108: 07,117.054a tathā tu parikṛṣyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:14111: 07,117.055c tava śiṣyaṃ mahābāho dhanuṣy anavaraṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:14112: 07,117.056a asatyo vikramaḥ pārtha yatra bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:14120: 07,117.059a pravaraṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ yan na hanyād dhi sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:14122: 07,117.060a evaṃ tu manasā rājan pārthaḥ saṃpūjya kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:14123: 07,117.060b*0956_01 ayudhyatāribhir vīras taṃ sma saṃprekṣate muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14126: 07,117.061c eṣa tv asukaraṃ karma yādavārthe karomy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:14127: 07,117.061d*0957_01 mama śiṣyo mamārthāya yudhyate mama śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14128: 07,117.061d*0957_02 taṃ kṛṣṇa mokṣayiṣyāmi dāvāt siṃhaśiśuṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:14129: 07,117.062a ity uktvā vacanaṃ kurvan vāsudevasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14134: 07,118.001a sa bāhur apatad bhūmau sakhaḍgaḥ saśubhāṅgadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14139: 07,118.003a sa moghaṃ kṛtam ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthena kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14140: 07,118.003c utsṛjya sātyakiṃ krodhād garhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:14142: 07,118.003d*0960_02 ekacakro ratho yadvad dharaṇīm āsthito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14144: 07,118.004a nṛśaṃsaṃ bata kaunteya karmedaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:14145: 07,118.004c apaśyato viṣaktasya yan me bāhum acicchidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14148: 07,118.005a kiṃ nu vakṣyasi rājānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:14149: 07,118.005c kiṃ kurvāṇo mayā saṃkhye hato bhūriśravā iti
GE07mbh_07_u:14150: 07,118.006a idam indreṇa te sākṣād upadiṣṭaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:14151: 07,118.006c astraṃ rudreṇa vā pārtha droṇenātha kṛpeṇa vā
GE07mbh_07_u:14152: 07,118.007a nanu nāma svadharmajñas tvaṃ loke 'bhyadhikaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14157: 07,118.009c katham ācaritaṃ pārtha tvayā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:14158: 07,118.010a āryeṇa sukaraṃ hy āhur āryakarma dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:14160: 07,118.011a yeṣu yeṣu naraḥ pārtha yatra yatra ca vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:14161: 07,118.011c āśu tacchīlatām eti tad idaṃ tvayi dṛśyate
GE07mbh_07_u:14162: 07,118.012a kathaṃ hi rājavaṃśyas tvaṃ kauraveyo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14164: 07,118.012d*0962_01 alpas tavāparādho 'tra na tvāṃ tāta vigarhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:14165: 07,118.012d*0963_01 vārṣṇeyāpasadaṃ prāpya kṣudraṃ kṛtam idaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:14166: 07,118.013a idaṃ tu yad atikṣudraṃ vārṣṇeyārthe kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:14168: 07,118.014a ko hi nāma pramattāya pareṇa saha yudhyate
GE07mbh_07_u:14169: 07,118.014c īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ dadyād yo na kṛṣṇasakho bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:14171: 07,118.015c vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kathaṃ pārtha pramāṇaṃ bhavatā kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14173: 07,118.015d@013_0001 evam ukto raṇe pārtho bhūriśravasam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:14174: 07,118.015d@013_0002 vyaktam eva hi jīrṇaḥ san buddhiṃ rañjayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:14175: 07,118.015d@013_0003 anarthakam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat tvayā vyāhṛtaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:14176: 07,118.015d@013_0004 hṛṣīkeśena saṃbandhaṃ garhase māṃ ca mūḍhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:14178: 07,118.015d@013_0006 na cādharmam ahaṃ kuryāṃ jānaṃś caiva hi muhyase
GE07mbh_07_u:14179: 07,118.015d@013_0007 yudhyante kṣatriyāḥ śatrūn svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtā nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:14181: 07,118.015d@013_0009 vayasyair atha mitraiś ca svabāhubalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14182: 07,118.015d@013_0010 ahaṃ hi sātyakiṃ śiṣyaṃ sukhasaṃbandhim eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14183: 07,118.015d@013_0011 madarthe yudhyamānaṃ ca tyaktvā prāṇān sudustyajān
GE07mbh_07_u:14184: 07,118.015d@013_0012 mama bāhuṃ raṇe rājan dakṣiṇaṃ yuddhadurmadam
GE07mbh_07_u:14185: 07,118.015d@013_0013 nikṛtyamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ śatruvaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_07_u:14186: 07,118.015d@013_0014 tvayā nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān asmi niṣkriyam
GE07mbh_07_u:14187: 07,118.015d@013_0015 na cātmā rakṣitavyo hi eko raṇagatena hi
GE07mbh_07_u:14188: 07,118.015d@013_0016 yo yasya yudhyate 'rthāya sa saṃrakṣyo narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:14189: 07,118.015d@013_0017 tai rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa nṛpo rakṣitavyo mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:14190: 07,118.015d@013_0018 yady ahaṃ sātyakiṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīm āsiṣya āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:14191: 07,118.015d@013_0019 tatas tena viyogaś ca prāpyaṃ narakam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14192: 07,118.015d@013_0020 rakṣitaś ca mayā yasmāt tasmāl labdho mayā sa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14193: 07,118.015d@013_0021 yaśaś caiva svapakṣebhyaḥ phalaṃ mitrasya rakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_07_u:14194: 07,118.015d@013_0022 yac ca māṃ garhase rājann anyena saha saṃgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:14195: 07,118.015d@013_0023 kas tena saṃgamaṃ necchet tatra te buddhivibhramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14196: 07,118.015d@013_0024 kavacaṃ dhunvatas tubhyaṃ rathaṃ cārohataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:14197: 07,118.015d@013_0025 dhanurjyāṃ karṣataś caiva yudhyataḥ saha śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14200: 07,118.015d@013_0028 svaiś cāpi samupetasya vikrāntasya tathā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:14201: 07,118.015d@013_0029 satyakena kathaṃ yogyaḥ saṃgrāmas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:14202: 07,118.015d@013_0030 bahubhiḥ saha saṃgamya nirjitya ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:14203: 07,118.015d@013_0031 śrāntaś ca śrāntavāhaś ca kṣīṇasarvāyudhas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:14204: 07,118.015d@013_0032 īdṛśaṃ sātyakiṃ saṃkhye nirjitya ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:14205: 07,118.015d@013_0033 adhikaṃ tvaṃ vijānīṣe tathāpy anyamanā bhavān
GE07mbh_07_u:14206: 07,118.015d@013_0034 yad icchasi śiraś cāsya asinā hartum āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:14207: 07,118.015d@013_0035 tathā kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā sātyakiṃ kaḥ kṣamiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:14208: 07,118.015d@013_0036 tvaṃ tu garhaya cātmānam ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣasi
GE07mbh_07_u:14209: 07,118.015d@013_0037 kathaṃ kariṣyase vīra yo vā tvāṃ saṃśrayej janaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14211: 07,118.015d@013_0039 chinnavān yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ naital lokavigarhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:14213: 07,118.015d@013_0041 abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko nu pūjayet
GE07mbh_07_u:14219: 07,118.018a sūrye cakṣuḥ samādhāya prasannaṃ salile manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14222: 07,118.019c garhayām āsa taṃ cāpi śaśaṃsa puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_07_u:14223: 07,118.019d*0965_01 garhayām āsur apy etau śaśaṃsur bhūridakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:14224: 07,118.020a nindyamānau tathā kṛṣṇau nocatuḥ kiṃ cid apriyam
GE07mbh_07_u:14226: 07,118.021a tāṃs tathā vādino rājan putrāṃs tava dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14227: 07,118.021c amṛṣyamāṇo manasā teṣāṃ tasya ca bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:14230: 07,118.023a mama sarve 'pi rājāno jānanty etan mahāvratam
GE07mbh_07_u:14231: 07,118.023c na śakyo māmako hantuṃ yo me syād bāṇagocare
GE07mbh_07_u:14232: 07,118.024a yūpaketo samīkṣya tvaṃ na māṃ garhitum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:14233: 07,118.024c na hi dharmam avijñāya yuktaṃ garhayituṃ param
GE07mbh_07_u:14235: 07,118.025c yad ahaṃ bāhum acchaitsaṃ na sa dharmo vigarhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14236: 07,118.025d*0966_01 acchinaṃ yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ tatra garhyaṃ kim asti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14238: 07,118.026c abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko na pūjayet
GE07mbh_07_u:14239: 07,118.026d*0967_01 nābhimanyor vadhaṃ yūyaṃ garhayadhvaṃ kutas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:14240: 07,118.026d@014_0001 duryodhanasya kṣudrasya na pramāṇe ca tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14243: 07,118.026d@014_0004 ye me pratyakṣato vīrā hanyerann iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14244: 07,118.026d@014_0005 satyakaś ca vaśaṃ nītaḥ kauraveṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:14247: 07,118.026d@014_0007 punaś ca kṛpayāviṣṭo bahu tat tad vicintayan
GE07mbh_07_u:14249: 07,118.026d@014_0009 dhig astu kṣatradharmaṃ tu yatra tvaṃ puruṣeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14252: 07,118.026d@014_0012 yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
GE07mbh_07_u:14254: 07,118.026d@014_0014 yatra tvaṃ kuruśārdūla prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
GE07mbh_07_u:14256: 07,118.026d@014_0016 yatkṛte naraśārdūlaḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
GE07mbh_07_u:14257: 07,118.026d@014_0017 ko hi nāma pumāṃl loke mādṛśaḥ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_07_u:14258: 07,118.026d@014_0018 praharet tvadvidhe tv adya pratijñā yadi no bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:14259: 07,118.027a evam uktas tu pārthena śirasā bhūmim aspṛśat
GE07mbh_07_u:14260: 07,118.027c pāṇinā caiva savyena prāhiṇod asya dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:14261: 07,118.028a etat pārthasya tu vacas tataḥ śrutvā mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14264: 07,118.029a yā prītir dharmarāje me bhīme ca vadatāṃ vare
GE07mbh_07_u:14265: 07,118.029c nakule sahadeve ca sā me tvayi śalāgraja
GE07mbh_07_u:14266: 07,118.030a mayā tu samanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:14267: 07,118.030c gaccha puṇyakṛtāṃl lokāñ śibir auśīnaro yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:14274: 07,118.030d*0969_01 dhanaṃjaye bruvaty evaṃ ghṛṇayā ca pariplute
GE07mbh_07_u:14275: 07,118.030d*0969_02 avāṅmukhā babhūvuś ca sainikāḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_07_u:14280: 07,118.031c khaḍgam ādāya cicchitsuḥ śiras tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14288: 07,118.034a vāryamāṇaḥ sa kṛṣṇena pārthena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:14291: 07,118.035c vikrośatāṃ ca sainyānām avadhīt taṃ yatavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:14296: 07,118.037c arjunena hataṃ pūrvaṃ yaj jaghāna kurūdvaham
GE07mbh_07_u:14299: 07,118.039a apūjayanta taṃ devā vismitās tasya karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14300: 07,118.039c pakṣavādāṃś ca bahuśaḥ prāvadaṃs tasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14301: 07,118.040a na vārṣṇeyasyāparādho bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:14302: 07,118.040c tasmān manyur na vaḥ kāryaḥ krodho duḥkhakaro nṛṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:14303: 07,118.041a hantavyaś caiṣa vīreṇa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:14304: 07,118.041c vihito hy asya dhātraiva mṛtyuḥ sātyakir āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:14305: 07,118.041d*0972_01 martavyam eva sarveṇa caramaṃ pūrvam eva vā
GE07mbh_07_u:14306: 07,118.041d*0972_02 manyadhvaṃ mṛta ity eva mā bhūd vo buddhilāghavam
GE07mbh_07_u:14308: 07,118.041d*0972_04 dhig enam iti cākrandan kṣatriyāḥ krodhamūrcchitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14309: 07,118.041d*0972_05 anyena yuktam ity eva bhavitavyaṃ tatheti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14310: 07,118.041d*0972_06 ke cid āsan vimanasaḥ ke cid duḥkhasamanvitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14312: 07,118.042a na hantavyo na hantavya iti yan māṃ prabhāṣatha
GE07mbh_07_u:14315: 07,118.043c yuṣmābhir nihato yuddhe tadā dharmaḥ kva vo gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14316: 07,118.044a mayā tv etat pratijñātaṃ kṣepe kasmiṃś cid eva hi
GE07mbh_07_u:14317: 07,118.044b*0973_01 śrutvā tat sarvabhāvena garhayadhvaṃ na cārjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:14318: 07,118.044b*0974_01 śṛṇudhvaṃ sarvam eveha śrutvā garhatha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14319: 07,118.044c yo māṃ niṣpiṣya saṃgrāme jīvan hanyāt padā ruṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:14320: 07,118.044e sa me vadhyo bhavec chatrur yady api syān munivrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14322: 07,118.045c manyadhvaṃ mṛtam ity evam etad vo buddhilāghavam
GE07mbh_07_u:14323: 07,118.045e yukto hy asya pratīghātaḥ kṛto me kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14324: 07,118.046a yat tu pārthena matsnehāt svāṃ pratijñāṃ ca rakṣatā
GE07mbh_07_u:14326: 07,118.047a bhavitavyaṃ ca yad bhāvi daivaṃ ceṣṭayatīva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14328: 07,118.048a api cāyaṃ purā gītaḥ śloko vālmīkinā bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:14329: 07,118.048b*0975_01 na hantavyāḥ striya iti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
GE07mbh_07_u:14331: 07,118.048c pīḍākaram amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eva tat
GE07mbh_07_u:14332: 07,118.048d*0977_01 anuṣṭhitaṃ mayā tac ca tasmād garhatha mūḍhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:14335: 07,118.049c na sma kiṃ cid abhāṣanta manasā samapūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:14339: na tatra kaś cid vadham abhyanandat
GE07mbh_07_u:14353: 07,119.001*0980_01 śaineyasya ca votpattir bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14354: 07,119.001*0980_02 vistareṇa mamācakṣva sarvam eva tu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:14356: 07,119.001b*0981_01 ajito droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ karṇena ca kṛpeṇa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:14357: 07,119.001b*0982_01 yaś caivotsahate jetuṃ samastaṃ māmakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:14362: 07,119.003a śṛṇu rājann ihotpattiṃ śaineyasya yathā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:14363: 07,119.003c yathā ca bhūriśravaso yatra te saṃśayo nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:14364: 07,119.003d*0983_01 brahyaṇas tv abhavat putro mānaso 'trir mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14365: 07,119.004a atreḥ putro 'bhavat somaḥ somasya tu budhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14368: 07,119.005a purūravasa āyus tu āyuṣo nahuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14370: 07,119.006a yayāter devayānyāṃ tu yadur jyeṣṭho 'bhavat sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14371: 07,119.006c yador abhūd anvavāye devamīḍha iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14372: 07,119.007a yādavas tasya ca sutaḥ śūras trailokyasaṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14375: 07,119.008c tadvīryaś cāpi tatraiva kule śinir abhūn nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14376: 07,119.009a etasminn eva kāle tu devakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14378: 07,119.010a tatra vai devakīṃ devīṃ vasudevārtham āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:14379: 07,119.010c nirjitya pārthivān sarvān ratham āropayac chiniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14380: 07,119.011a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā devakīṃ śaure rathasthāṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14381: 07,119.011b*0985_01 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nīyamānāṃ tu vasudevāya devakīm
GE07mbh_07_u:14383: 07,119.012a tayor yuddham abhūd rājan dinārdhaṃ citram adbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:14385: 07,119.013a śininā somadattas tu prasahya bhuvi pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14386: 07,119.013c asim udyamya keśeṣu pragṛhya ca padā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14388: 07,119.014c kṛpayā ca punas tena jīveti sa visarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14391: 07,119.016a tasya tuṣṭo mahādevo varāṇāṃ varadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14392: 07,119.016c vareṇa chandayām āsa sa tu vavre varaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14393: 07,119.017a putram icchāmi bhagavan yo nihanyāc chineḥ sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:14394: 07,119.017c madhye rājasahasrāṇāṃ padā hanyāc ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:14395: 07,119.018a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā somadattasya pārthiva

GE07mbh_07_u:14830: 07,121.015d@016_0008 na gopsyati durācāraḥ sa ātmānaṃ kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_07_u:14891: 07,121.015d@016_0069 na gṛhṇann akṣipan rājann amuñcan nāpi saṃdadhan
GE07mbh_07_u:14895: 07,121.015d@016_0073 karṇasya tu dhanuś chittvā vṛṣasenasya caiva ha

GE07mbh_07_u:14910: 07,121.016e śṛṇuṣvaiva ca me vākyaṃ jayadrathavadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:14911: 07,121.016f*1011_01 pārtha pārtha śiro hy etat tvatkṛtena pated bhuvi

GE07mbh_07_u:14915: 07,121.017c sa kāleneha mahatā saindhavaṃ prāptavān sutam

GE07mbh_07_u:14926: 07,121.022c dharaṇyāṃ mama putrasya pātayiṣyati yaḥ śiraḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:14928: 07,121.022f*1012_01 yadi ced asti me lābhas tapaso vā damasya vā
GE07mbh_07_u:14929: 07,121.023a evam uktvā tato rājye sthāpayitvā jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:14931: 07,121.024a so 'yaṃ tapyati tejasvī tapo ghoraṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:14933: 07,121.025a tasmāj jayadrathasya tvaṃ śiraś chittvā mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:14937: 07,121.027a atha tvam asya mūrdhānaṃ pātayiṣyasi bhūtale
GE07mbh_07_u:14938: 07,121.027c tavāpi śatadhā mūrdhā phaliṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14939: 07,121.028a yathā caitan na jānīyāt sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14940: 07,121.028c tathā kuru kuruśreṣṭha divyam astram upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14941: 07,121.029a na hy asādhyam akāryaṃ vā vidyate tava kiṃ cana

GE07mbh_07_u:14946: 07,121.030a etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ sṛkkiṇī parisaṃlihan
GE07mbh_07_u:14947: 07,121.030b*1014_01 arjunas tvarayā yuktas tad astraṃ samupāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14956: 07,121.031d*1017_01 tato dhanaṃjayaḥ śīghraṃ śaraṃ taṃ bhāskaratviṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:14958: 07,121.032a sa tu gāṇḍīvanirmuktaḥ śaraḥ śyena ivāśugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:14962: 07,121.032d*1019_02 pārtha pārtha śiro hy etad yathā neyān mahītalam

GE07mbh_07_u:14990: 07,121.035a etasminn eva kāle tu vṛddhakṣatro mahīpatiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:15001: 07,121.040a tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam

GE07mbh_07_u:15029: 07,121.041c putrāṇāṃ tava netrebhyo duḥkhād bahv apataj jalam

GE07mbh_07_u:15061: 07,122.001c māmakā yad akurvanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:15064: 07,122.001d*1033_03 kathaṃ drauṇikṛpair guptaḥ karṇena ca mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:15066: 07,122.001d*1033_05 tasmin hate maheṣvāse mandātmā sa suyodhanaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:15120: 07,122.026c dhig astu mama vārṣṇeya yo hy asmai praharāmy aham

GE07mbh_07_u:15122: 07,122.027b*1036_01 tataḥ kirīṭinā rājan vihvale gautame kṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:15125: 07,122.027d*1038_01 saindhavasya mukhaṃ tyaktvā karṇaḥ sātvatam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:15126: 07,122.027d*1039_01 tam āpatantaṃ rādheyam arjunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:15128: 07,122.028a upāyāntaṃ tu rādheyaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārtho mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:15131: 07,122.029c na mṛṣyati hataṃ nūnaṃ bhūriśravasam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:15132: 07,122.030a yatra yāty eṣa tatra tvaṃ codayāśvāñ janārdana

GE07mbh_07_u:15136: 07,122.032a alam eṣa mahābāhuḥ karṇāyaiko hi pāṇḍava

GE07mbh_07_u:15139: 07,122.033c prajvalantī maholkeva tiṣṭhaty asya hi vāsavī
GE07mbh_07_u:15141: 07,122.033f*1040_01 na karṇaṃ prākṛtaṃ manye tena yuddhaṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_07_u:15142: 07,122.033f*1040_02 karṇo hi balavān ekaḥ śakto 'smāñ jetum ojasā
GE07mbh_07_u:15143: 07,122.033f*1040_03 na karṇaṃ hi vayaṃ śaktā jetuṃ sabalavāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15144: 07,122.033f*1040_04 karṇasyaiṣa mahādoṣo yaj jīyeta pade pade
GE07mbh_07_u:15145: 07,122.033f*1040_05 pramādāc ca ghṛṇitvāc ca tena śakyatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15146: 07,122.034a ataḥ karṇaḥ prayātv atra sātvatasya yathā tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:15147: 07,122.034c ahaṃ jñāsyāmi kauravya kālam asya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15149: 07,122.034d*1042_01 tadā gantāsi pārtha tvaṃ tena yoddhuṃ durātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:15152: 07,122.035b*1043_01 akāṅkṣitaś ca karṇena sa bhavatv atitejasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15153: 07,122.035c hate tu bhūriśravasi saindhave ca nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:15154: 07,122.035d*1044_01 saumadattiṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tad yuddham abhavat katham
GE07mbh_07_u:15155: 07,122.036a sātyakiś cāpi virathaḥ kaṃ samārūḍhavān ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:15156: 07,122.036c cakrarakṣau ca pāñcālyau tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:15161: 07,122.038a pūrvam eva hi kṛṣṇasya manogatam idaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:15163: 07,122.039a atītānāgataṃ rājan sa hi vetti janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15164: 07,122.039c ataḥ sūtaṃ samāhūya dārukaṃ saṃdideśa ha
GE07mbh_07_u:15165: 07,122.039e ratho me yujyatāṃ kālyam iti rājan mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15166: 07,122.039f*1046_01 dārukaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃdiṣṭaṃ rātrāv uktaṃ hṛdā vahan
GE07mbh_07_u:15167: 07,122.040a na hi devā na gandharvā na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:15168: 07,122.040c mānavā vā vijetāraḥ kṛṣṇayoḥ santi ke cana

GE07mbh_07_u:17028: 07,134.076a pāñcālān somakāṃś caiva jahi drauṇe sahānugān
GE07mbh_07_u:17030: 07,134.077a ete hi somakā vipra pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17032: 07,134.078a tān vāraya mahābāho kekayāṃś ca narottama
GE07mbh_07_u:17035: 07,134.079a ādau vā yadi vā paścāt tavedaṃ karma māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:17036: 07,134.079c tvam utpanno mahābāho pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:17038: 07,134.080c evaṃ siddhābruvan vāco bhaviṣyati ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:17039: 07,134.080d*1153_01 tasmāt tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra pāñcālāñ jahi sānugān
GE07mbh_07_u:17040: 07,134.081a na te 'stragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17041: 07,134.081c kim u pārthāḥ sapāñcālāḥ satyam etad vaco mama
GE07mbh_07_u:17042: 07,134.081d*1154_01 na tvāṃ samarthāḥ saṃgrāme pāṇḍavāḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17043: 07,134.081d*1154_02 balād yodhayituṃ vīra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:17044: 07,134.081d*1154_03 gaccha gaccha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:17046: 07,134.081d*1154_05 śakto hy asi mahābāho divyena svena tejasā
GE07mbh_07_u:17054: 07,135.002a priyā hi pāṇḍavā nityaṃ mama cāpi pituś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:17055: 07,135.002c tathaivāvāṃ priyau teṣāṃ na tu yuddhe kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:17056: 07,135.002e śaktitas tāta yudhyāmas tyaktvā prāṇān abhītavat
GE07mbh_07_u:17057: 07,135.003a ahaṃ karṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo hārdikya eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:17059: 07,135.004a te cāpi kauravīṃ senāṃ nimeṣārdhāt kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:17060: 07,135.004c kṣapayeyur mahābāho na syāma yadi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17061: 07,135.005a yudhyatāṃ pāṇḍavāñ śaktyā teṣāṃ cāsmān yuyutsatām
GE07mbh_07_u:17062: 07,135.005c tejas tu teja āsādya praśamaṃ yāti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:17064: 07,135.006c jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu tad dhi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:17066: 07,135.007c kimarthaṃ tava sainyāni na haniṣyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:17067: 07,135.008a tvaṃ hi lubdhatamo rājan nikṛtijñaś ca kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:17069: 07,135.008d*1157_01 manye tvaṃ kutsito rājan pāpātmā pāpapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17070: 07,135.008d*1157_02 anyān api sa naḥ kṣudra śaṅkase pāpabhāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17071: 07,135.009a ahaṃ tu yatnam āsthāya tvadarthe tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17073: 07,135.010a yotsye 'haṃ śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ jeṣyāmi ca varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:17074: 07,135.010c pāñcālaiḥ saha yotsyāmi somakaiḥ kekayais tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:17078: 07,135.012a adya dharmasuto rājā dṛṣṭvā mama parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:17081: 07,135.013c dṛṣṭvā vinihatān saṃkhye pāñcālān somakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:17082: 07,135.014a ye māṃ yuddhe 'bhiyotsyanti tān haniṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:17083: 07,135.014c na hi te vīra mucyeran madbāhvantaram āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17084: 07,135.015a evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:17086: 07,135.015e cikīrṣus tava putrāṇāṃ priyaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17088: 07,135.016c praharadhvam itaḥ sarve mama gātre mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17090: 07,135.017a evam uktās tu te sarve śastravṛṣṭim apātayan
GE07mbh_07_u:17091: 07,135.017c drauṇiṃ prati mahārāja jalaṃ jaladharā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:17092: 07,135.018a tān nihatya śarān drauṇir daśa vīrān apothayat
GE07mbh_07_u:17094: 07,135.019a te hanyamānāḥ samare pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:17095: 07,135.019c parityajya raṇe drauṇiṃ vyadravanta diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:17096: 07,135.020a tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrān pāñcālān sahasomakān
GE07mbh_07_u:17101: 07,135.022c drauṇim ity abravīd vākyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhān nipātitān
GE07mbh_07_u:17102: 07,135.023a ācāryaputra durbuddhe kim anyair nihatais tava
GE07mbh_07_u:17103: 07,135.023c samāgaccha mayā sārdhaṃ yadi śūro 'si saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17107: 07,135.025a te tu paṅktīkṛtā drauṇiṃ śarā viviśur āśugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17113: 07,135.027c yāvat tvāṃ niśitair bāṇaiḥ preṣayāmi yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:17118: 07,135.030a na jānīṣe pratijñāṃ me viprotpattiṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:17119: 07,135.030c droṇaṃ hatvā kila mayā hantavyas tvaṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:17120: 07,135.030e tatas tvāhaṃ na hanmy adya droṇe jīvati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17121: 07,135.031a imāṃ tu rajanīṃ prāptām aprabhātāṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:17122: 07,135.031c nihatya pitaraṃ te 'dya tatas tvām api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17123: 07,135.031e neṣyāmi mṛtyulokāyety evaṃ me manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:17124: 07,135.032a yas te pārtheṣu vidveṣo yā bhaktiḥ kauraveṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:17125: 07,135.032c tāṃ darśaya sthiro bhūtvā na me jīvan vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_07_u:17126: 07,135.033a yo hi brāhmaṇyam utsṛjya kṣatradharmarato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17127: 07,135.033c sa vadhyaḥ sarvalokasya yathā tvaṃ puruṣādhama
GE07mbh_07_u:17128: 07,135.034a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ pārṣatena dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17129: 07,135.034c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:17131: 07,135.035c chādayām āsa ca śarair niḥśvasan pannago yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:17135: 07,135.037c sāyakāṃś caiva vividhān aśvatthāmni mumoca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:17141: 07,135.040a śaraughaiḥ pūrayantau tāv ākāśaṃ pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:17142: 07,135.040c alakṣyau samayudhyetāṃ mahat kṛtvā śarais tamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17145: 07,135.042a ayudhyetāṃ mahābāhū citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:17147: 07,135.043a tau prayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā vane vanyau gajāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:17149: 07,135.044a siṃhanādaravāś cāsan dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:17151: 07,135.045a tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
GE07mbh_07_u:17152: 07,135.045c muhūrtam iva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpaṃ tadābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:17154: 07,135.046c dhvajaṃ dhanus tathā chatram ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:17155: 07,135.046e sūtam aśvāṃś ca caturo nihatyābhyadravad raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:17156: 07,135.047a pāñcālāṃś caiva tān sarvān bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17159: 07,135.048c dṛṣṭvā drauṇer mahat karma vāsavasyeva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17160: 07,135.049a śatena ca śataṃ hatvā pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17161: 07,135.049c tribhiś ca niśitair bāṇair hatvā trīn vai mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:17163: 07,135.050c nāśayām āsa pāñcālān bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17164: 07,135.051a te vadhyamānāḥ pāñcālāḥ samare saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17166: 07,135.052a sa jitvā samare śatrūn droṇaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17168: 07,135.053a sa nihatya bahūñ śūrān aśvatthāmā vyarocata
GE07mbh_07_u:17175: 07,136.001a tato yudhiṣṭhiraś caiva bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17178: 07,136.002c abhyayāt pāṇḍavān saṃkhye tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:17180: 07,136.003a ambaṣṭhān mālavān vaṅgāñ śibīṃs traigartakān api
GE07mbh_07_u:17187: 07,136.006c nipetur dviradā bhūmau dviśṛṅgā iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17188: 07,136.007a nikṛttair hastihastaiś ca luṭhamānais tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17190: 07,136.008a kṣiptaiḥ kanakacitraiś ca nṛpacchatraiḥ kṣitir babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:17193: 07,136.009c ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śoṇāśvasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:17195: 07,136.010c vyadhamat tān yathā vāyur meghān iva duratyayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17196: 07,136.011a te hanyamānā droṇena pāñcālāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:17198: 07,136.012a tataḥ kirīṭī bhīmaś ca sahasā saṃnyavartatām
GE07mbh_07_u:17200: 07,136.013a bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ tu vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17202: 07,136.014a tau tadā sṛñjayāś caiva pāñcālāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17203: 07,136.014c anvagacchan mahārāja matsyāś ca saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17205: 07,136.015c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ jagmur droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:17206: 07,136.016a tataḥ sā bharatī senā vadhyamānā kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:17207: 07,136.016c tamasā nidrayā caiva punar eva vyadīryata
GE07mbh_07_u:17208: 07,136.017a droṇena vāryamāṇās te svayaṃ tava sutena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:17209: 07,136.017c na śakyante mahārāja yodhā vārayituṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:17212: 07,136.019a utsṛjya śataśo vāhāṃs tatra ke cin narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17215: 07,137.001a somadattaṃ tu saṃprekṣya vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17216: 07,137.001c sātyakiḥ prāha yantāraṃ somadattāya māṃ vaha
GE07mbh_07_u:17217: 07,137.002a na hy ahatvā raṇe śatruṃ bāhlīkaṃ kauravādhamam
GE07mbh_07_u:17218: 07,137.002c nivartiṣye raṇāt sūta satyam etad vaco mama
GE07mbh_07_u:17219: 07,137.003a tataḥ saṃpreṣayad yantā saindhavāṃs tān mahājavān
GE07mbh_07_u:17223: 07,137.005a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:17226: 07,137.006c chādayām āsa śaineyaṃ jalado bhāskaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:17229: 07,137.008a somadattas tu taṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādhorasi mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:17230: 07,137.008c sātyakiś cāpi taṃ rājann avidhyat sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17232: 07,137.009a tāv anyonyaṃ śaraiḥ kṛttau vyarājetāṃ nararṣabhau
GE07mbh_07_u:17237: 07,137.011c ghorarūpau hi tāv āstāṃ vṛṣṭimantāv ivāmbudau
GE07mbh_07_u:17243: 07,137.014c adṛśyetāṃ raṇe kruddhāv ulkābhir iva kuñjarau
GE07mbh_07_u:17247: 07,137.016c tvaramāṇas tvarākāle punaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17251: 07,137.018c bāhlīkasya raṇe rājan sātyakiḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:17252: 07,137.019a somadattas tv asaṃbhrānto dṛṣṭvā ketuṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:17255: 07,137.020c dhanuś ciccheda samare kṣurapreṇa śitena ha
GE07mbh_07_u:17257: 07,137.021c ācinod bahudhā rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭram iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:17260: 07,137.023a somadattaṃ tu saṃkruddho raṇe vivyādha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17264: 07,137.025a tatas tu sātvatasyārthe bhaimasenir navaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:17267: 07,137.026c dvidhā ciccheda samare prahasann iva kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17268: 07,137.027a sa papāta dvidhā chinna āyasaḥ parigho mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:17270: 07,137.028a tatas tu sātyakī rājan somadattasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17271: 07,137.028c dhanuś ciccheda bhallena hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17272: 07,137.029a caturbhis tu śarais tūrṇaṃ caturas turagottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:17274: 07,137.030a sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād bhallena nataparvaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:17276: 07,137.031a tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:17282: 07,137.034a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ tatra somadattaṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17283: 07,137.034b*1159_01 pāṇḍavāś ca mahārāja saha madraiḥ prabhadrakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17289: 07,137.037a sainyāni drāvayantaṃ tu droṇo dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:17291: 07,137.038a tataḥ suniśitair bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17294: 07,137.038e yudhiṣṭhirasya ciccheda dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:17296: 07,137.039c anyad ādatta vegena kārmukaṃ samare dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:17303: 07,137.043a asaṃbhrāntas tataḥ pārtho dhanur ākṛṣya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:17304: 07,137.043c tad astram astreṇa raṇe stambhayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:17305: 07,137.043d*1161_01 ciccheda ca dhanur dīrghaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17307: 07,137.043d*1161_03 tad apy asya śitair bhallaiś ciccheda kurupuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17309: 07,137.044c yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho yat tvā vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:17311: 07,137.045c gṛdhyate hi sadā droṇo grahaṇe tava saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:17312: 07,137.046a nānurūpam ahaṃ manye yuddham asya tvayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:17313: 07,137.046c yo 'sya sṛṣṭo vināśāya sa enaṃ śvo haniṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:17314: 07,137.047a parivarjya guruṃ yāhi yatra rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17315: 07,137.047b*1162_01 rājā rājñā hi yoddhavyo nārājñā yuddham iṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:17317: 07,137.047b*1162_03 yāvan mātreṇa ca mayā sahāyena dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17318: 07,137.047c bhīmaś ca rathaśārdūlo yudhyate kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:17320: 07,137.048c muhūrtaṃ cintayitvā tu tato dāruṇam āhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:17321: 07,137.049a prāyād drutam amitraghno yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17324: 07,137.050c parjanya iva gharmānte nādayan vai diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:17325: 07,137.051a bhīmasya nighnataḥ śatrūn pārṣṇiṃ jagrāha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17333: 07,138.001c tamasā saṃvṛte loke rajasā ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_07_u:17335: 07,138.002a anumānena saṃjñābhir yuddhaṃ tad vavṛte mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:17344: 07,138.006c andhe tamasi mūḍhāni putrasya tava mantrite
GE07mbh_07_u:17345: 07,138.007a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāgopāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:17346: 07,138.007c vyamuhyanta raṇe tatra tamasā saṃvṛte sati
GE07mbh_07_u:17349: 07,138.008c andhe tamasi magnānām āsīt kā vo matis tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:17350: 07,138.009a kathaṃ prakāśas teṣāṃ vā mama sainyeṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17351: 07,138.009c babhūva loke tamasā tathā saṃjaya saṃvṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:17353: 07,138.010a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni hataśiṣṭāni yāni vai
GE07mbh_07_u:17395: 07,138.018a gadāś ca śaikyāḥ parighāś ca śubhrā;
GE07mbh_07_u:17466: 07,139.001a prakāśite tathā loke rajasā ca tamovṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:17473: 07,139.003c virarāja tadā bhūmir dyaur grahair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:17476: 07,139.005a prādīpyanta diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradīpais taiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17478: 07,139.006a asajjanta tato vīrā vīreṣv eva pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:17479: 07,139.006c nāgā nāgaiḥ samājagmus turagāḥ saha vājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17481: 07,139.007c tasmin rātrimukhe ghore putrasya tava śāsanāt
GE07mbh_07_u:17482: 07,139.007d*1169_01 caturaṅgasya sainyasya saṃpātaś ca mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_07_u:17486: 07,139.009a tasmin praviṣṭe saṃrabdhe mama putrasya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:17487: 07,139.009c amṛṣyamāṇe durdharṣe kiṃ va āsīn manas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:17489: 07,139.010c duryodhanaś ca kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:17490: 07,139.011a ke cainaṃ samare vīraṃ pratyudyayur ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_07_u:17491: 07,139.011b*1170_01 droṇaṃ ca ke vyarakṣanta praviṣṭe śvetavāhane
GE07mbh_07_u:17492: 07,139.011c ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ ke ca droṇasya savyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17493: 07,139.012a ke pṛṣṭhato 'sya hy abhavan vīrā vīrasya yudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:17494: 07,139.012c ke purastād agacchanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:17497: 07,139.014a dadāha ca śarair droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajān
GE07mbh_07_u:17498: 07,139.014c dhūmaketur iva kruddhaḥ sa kathaṃ mṛtyum īyivān

GE07mbh_07_u:19509: 07,156.007a ekaiko hi pṛthak teṣāṃ samastāṃ suravāhinīm

GE07mbh_07_u:20591: 07,164.078c tathā carantaṃ saṃgrāme sarvato vyakirañ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:20687: 07,164.119c tasya cāhnas tribhāgena kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ patatriṇaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:20696: 07,164.123d*1312_01 tataś ca pārṣato rājan samākṛṣya dhanur mahat

GE07mbh_07_u:20699: 07,164.124c dhvajaṃ dhanuś ca niśitaiḥ sārathiṃ cāpy apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:20704: 07,164.127a yac cāsya bāṇaṃ vikṛtaṃ dhanūṃṣi ca viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:20763: 07,164.153b*1316_01 paśyatas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:20764: 07,164.153c paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:20769: 07,164.155a apūjayetāṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ bruvāṇau sādhu sādhv iti

GE07mbh_07_u:20905: 07,165.039d*1333_01 mūrdhānaṃ yasya nirbhidya jyotī rājan mahātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:21225: 07,166.035a adya paśyantu me vīryaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sajanārdanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21227: 07,166.036a na hi devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21228: 07,166.036c adya śaktā raṇe jetuṃ rathasthaṃ māṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:21229: 07,166.037a mad anyo nāsti loke 'sminn arjunād vāstravittamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21230: 07,166.037c ahaṃ hi jvalatāṃ madhye mayūkhānām ivāṃśumān
GE07mbh_07_u:21234: 07,166.039a adya sarvā diśo rājan dhārābhir iva saṃkulāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21235: 07,166.039c āvṛtāḥ patribhis tīkṣṇair draṣṭāro māmakair iha
GE07mbh_07_u:21239: 07,166.041a na ca jānāti bībhatsus tad astraṃ na janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21240: 07,166.041c na bhīmaseno na yamau na ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21241: 07,166.042a na pārṣato durātmāsau na śikhaṇḍī na sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21242: 07,166.042c yad idaṃ mayi kauravya sakalyaṃ sanivartanam
GE07mbh_07_u:21245: 07,166.044a taṃ svayaṃ pratigṛhyātha bhagavān sa varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:21246: 07,166.044c vavre pitā me paramam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21248: 07,166.045c bhavitā tvatsamo nānyaḥ kaś cid yudhi naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:21250: 07,166.046a na tv idaṃ sahasā brahman prayoktavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:21251: 07,166.046c na hy etad astram anyatra vadhāc chatror nivartate
GE07mbh_07_u:21252: 07,166.047a na caitac chakyate jñātuṃ ko na vadhyed iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:21253: 07,166.047c avadhyam api hanyād dhi tasmān naitat prayojayet
GE07mbh_07_u:21254: 07,166.048a vadhaḥ saṃkhye dravaś caiva śastrāṇāṃ ca visarjanam
GE07mbh_07_u:21255: 07,166.048c prayācanaṃ ca śatrūṇāṃ gamanaṃ śaraṇasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:21257: 07,166.049c sarvathā pīḍito hi syād avadhyān pīḍayan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:21258: 07,166.050a taj jagrāha pitā mahyam abravīc caiva sa prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21261: 07,166.051a evam uktvā sa bhagavān divam ācakrame prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21262: 07,166.051c etan nārāyaṇād astraṃ tat prāptaṃ mama bandhunā
GE07mbh_07_u:21263: 07,166.051d*1364_01 tatprasādān mayā prāptaṃ mahāstram idam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:21266: 07,166.053a yathā yathāham iccheyaṃ tathā bhūtvā śarā mama
GE07mbh_07_u:21268: 07,166.053d*1365_01 iccheyaṃ yadi dūrasthān nihaniṣyanti me śarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21275: 07,166.056c pāñcālāpasadaś cādya na me jīvan vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:21276: 07,166.056d*1366_01 evam uktvā tato drauṇiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau sa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:21278: 07,166.056d*1366_03 tasya śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā tava sainyāni māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:21282: 07,166.058a bherīś cābhyahanan hṛṣṭā ḍiṇḍimāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21284: 07,166.058e sa śabdas tumulaḥ khaṃ dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca vyanādayat
GE07mbh_07_u:21288: 07,166.060c prāduścakāra tad divyam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:21290: 07,167.001a prādurbhūte tatas tasminn astre nārāyaṇe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:21292: 07,167.002a cacāla pṛthivī cāpi cukṣubhe ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21293: 07,167.002c pratisrotaḥ pravṛttāś ca gantuṃ tatra samudragāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21299: 07,167.005c kathaṃ kathābhavat tīvrā dṛṣṭvā tad vyākulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:21300: 07,167.006a vyathitāḥ sarvarājānas tadā hy āsan vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21301: 07,167.006c tad dṛṣṭvā ghorarūpaṃ tu drauṇer astraṃ bhayāvaham
GE07mbh_07_u:21302: 07,167.006d*1367_01 petur ākāśagās tatra vimanaskā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:21303: 07,167.006d*1367_02 rodasī ca viyac caiva sarvaṃ jvālāsamāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:21308: 07,167.008c ko mantraḥ pāṇḍaveṣv āsīt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:21310: 07,167.009a prāg eva vidrutān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21311: 07,167.009c punaś ca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvārjunam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:21315: 07,167.011c ātmatrāṇe matiṃ kṛtvā prādravan kuravo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:21316: 07,167.012a ke cid bhrāntai rathais tūrṇaṃ nihatapārṣṇiyantṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21319: 07,167.013c bhītāḥ pādair hayān ke cit tvarayantaḥ svayaṃ rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21320: 07,167.013e yugacakrākṣabhagnaiś ca drutāḥ ke cid bhayāturāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21321: 07,167.013f*1368_01 rathān viśīrṇān utsṛjya padbhiḥ ke cic ca vidrutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21324: 07,167.014c śarārtair vidrutair nāgair hṛtāḥ ke cid diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:21326: 07,167.015c saṃchinnā nemiṣu gatā mṛditāś ca hayadvipaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21329: 07,167.017a putrān pitṝn sakhīn bhrātṝn samāropya dṛḍhakṣatān
GE07mbh_07_u:21330: 07,167.017c jalena kledayanty anye vimucya kavacāny api
GE07mbh_07_u:21332: 07,167.017d*1370_02 avasthitaṃ punar dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya tad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:21334: 07,167.018a avasthāṃ tādṛśīṃ prāpya hate droṇe drutaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:21335: 07,167.018b*1371_01 evam etad drutaṃ bhagnaṃ droṇe yudhi nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:21337: 07,167.018c punarāvartitaṃ kena yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_07_u:21338: 07,167.019a hayānāṃ heṣatāṃ śabdaḥ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca bṛṃhatām
GE07mbh_07_u:21340: 07,167.020a ete śabdā bhṛśaṃ tīvrāḥ pravṛttāḥ kurusāgare
GE07mbh_07_u:21341: 07,167.020c muhur muhur udīryantaḥ kampayanti hi māmakān
GE07mbh_07_u:21342: 07,167.021a ya eṣa tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21343: 07,167.021c sendrān apy eṣa lokāṃs trīn bhañjyād iti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:21345: 07,167.022c droṇe hate kauravārthaṃ vyaktam abhyeti vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21347: 07,167.023c dhanaṃjaya guruṃ śrutvā tatra nādaṃ subhīṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:21348: 07,167.024a ka eṣa kauravān dīrṇān avasthāpya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21352: 07,167.025c dhamanti kauravāḥ śaṅkhān yasya vīryam upāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21353: 07,167.026a yatra te saṃśayo rājan nyastaśastre gurau hate
GE07mbh_07_u:21354: 07,167.026c dhārtarāṣṭrān avasthāpya ka eṣa nadatīti ha
GE07mbh_07_u:21359: 07,167.028a yasmiñ jāte dadau droṇo gavāṃ daśaśataṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:21360: 07,167.028b*1373_01 sa eṣa nardati drauṇir gharmānte jalado yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:21363: 07,167.029c heṣatā kampitā bhūmir lokāś ca sakalās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21364: 07,167.030a tac chrutvāntarhitaṃ bhūtaṃ nāma cāsyākarot tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:21368: 07,167.032a guruṃ me yatra pāñcālyaḥ keśapakṣe parāmṛśat
GE07mbh_07_u:21369: 07,167.032c tan na jātu kṣamed drauṇir jānan pauruṣam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21370: 07,167.032d*1374_01 sa hi tenaiva naḥ sarvān kṣapayed iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21372: 07,167.033c dharmajñena satā nāma so 'dharmaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21374: 07,167.033d*1375_02 rāme vālivadhād yadvad evaṃ droṇe nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:21376: 07,167.034c nāyaṃ vakṣyati mithyeti pratyayaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvayi
GE07mbh_07_u:21378: 07,167.035c ācārya ukto bhavatā hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
GE07mbh_07_u:21380: 07,167.036c āsīt sa vihvalo rājan yathā dṛṣṭas tvayā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21381: 07,167.037a sa tu śokena cāviṣṭo vimukhaḥ putravatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21382: 07,167.037c śāśvataṃ dharmam utsṛjya guruḥ śiṣyeṇa ghātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21384: 07,167.038c rakṣatv idānīṃ sāmātyo yadi śaknoṣi pārṣatam
GE07mbh_07_u:21386: 07,167.039c sarve vayaṃ paritrātuṃ na śakṣyāmo 'dya pārṣatam
GE07mbh_07_u:21388: 07,167.040c so 'dya keśagrahaṃ śrutvā pitur dhakṣyati no raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:21390: 07,167.041c avakīrya svadharmaṃ hi śiṣyeṇa nihato guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21391: 07,167.042a yadā gataṃ vayo bhūyaḥ śiṣṭam alpataraṃ ca naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21393: 07,167.043a piteva nityaṃ sauhārdāt piteva sa hi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21395: 07,167.044a dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa bhīṣmāya droṇāya ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:21396: 07,167.044c visṛṣṭā pṛthivī sarvā saha putraiś ca tatparaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21397: 07,167.045a sa prāpya tādṛśīṃ vṛttiṃ satkṛtaḥ satataṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21398: 07,167.045c avṛṇīta sadā putrān mām evābhyadhikaṃ guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21400: 07,167.046c na tv enaṃ yudhyamānaṃ vai hanyād api śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21402: 07,167.047c kṛto hy anāryair asmābhī rājyārthe laghubuddhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21403: 07,167.047d*1376_01 aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sudāruṇaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:21405: 07,167.048a putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn dārāñ jīvitaṃ caiva vāsaviḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21406: 07,167.048c tyajet sarvaṃ mama premṇā jānāty etad dhi me guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21408: 07,167.049c tasmād avākśirā rājan prāpto 'smi narakaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:21409: 07,167.050a brāhmaṇaṃ vṛddham ācāryaṃ nyastaśastraṃ yathā munim
GE07mbh_07_u:21410: 07,167.050c ghātayitvādya rājyārthe mṛtaṃ śreyo na jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:21412: 07,168.001a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā nocus tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21413: 07,168.001c apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi mahārāja dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:21418: 07,168.004a kṣatāt trātā kṣatāj jīvan kṣāntas triṣv api sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:21419: 07,168.004c kṣatriyaḥ kṣitim āpnoti kṣipraṃ dharmaṃ yaśaḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_07_u:21420: 07,168.005a sa bhavān kṣatriyaguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ kulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21421: 07,168.005c avipaścid yathā vākyaṃ vyāharan nādya śobhase
GE07mbh_07_u:21425: 07,168.006c na cātivartase dharmaṃ velām iva mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21426: 07,168.007a na pūjayet tvā ko 'nvadya yat trayodaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_07_u:21429: 07,168.007d*1378_02 tvayā vinā yadi mahīṃ dharmaputrāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_07_u:21430: 07,168.007d*1378_03 na dadyāṃ pañcame prāpte divase nāsmi kṣatriyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21431: 07,168.008a diṣṭyā tāta manas te 'dya svadharmam anuvartate
GE07mbh_07_u:21432: 07,168.008c ānṛśaṃsye ca te diṣṭyā buddhiḥ satatam acyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:21433: 07,168.009a yat tu dharmapravṛttasya hṛtaṃ rājyam adharmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21434: 07,168.009c draupadī ca parāmṛṣṭā sabhām ānīya śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21435: 07,168.009d*1379_01 kathaṃ vṛddheṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhārmikeṣu mahatsu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:21436: 07,168.009d*1379_02 draupadī prāpnuyāt kleśaṃ veśyā yoṣeva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:21437: 07,168.009d*1379_03 kim u teṣāṃ bilvaphalaṃ mukhe hy āsīn mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:21438: 07,168.009d*1379_04 utāho badhirā hy āsan mūkā vāpi dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:21439: 07,168.009d*1379_05 andhā vasaṃs tadā te tu yaiś ca noktaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21440: 07,168.009d*1379_06 atha tatra bhaved dharmo na caivātrāsty anāryakam
GE07mbh_07_u:21442: 07,168.009d*1379_08 putraiḥ śiṣyaiś ca yat sārdhaṃ saṃnaddhā yoddhum āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:21444: 07,168.010c anarhamāṇās taṃ bhāvaṃ trayodaśa samāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21446: 07,168.010d*1380_02 tathā tan marṣayitvā tu yathā te utpathasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21449: 07,168.012a tam adharmam apākraṣṭum ārabdhaḥ sahitas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:21451: 07,168.013a tvayā tu kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ yuddhāyābhyāgatā vayam
GE07mbh_07_u:21452: 07,168.013c ghaṭāmaś ca yathāśakti tvaṃ tu no 'dya jugupsase
GE07mbh_07_u:21453: 07,168.014a svadharmaṃ necchase jñātuṃ mithyā vacanam eva te
GE07mbh_07_u:21455: 07,168.015a vapan vraṇe kṣāram iva kṣatānāṃ śatrukarśana
GE07mbh_07_u:21457: 07,168.016a adharmam etad vipulaṃ dhārmikaḥ san na budhyase
GE07mbh_07_u:21458: 07,168.016c yat tvam ātmānam asmāṃś ca praśaṃsyān na praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_07_u:21460: 07,168.016e yaḥ kalāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ tvatto nārhate taṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_07_u:21461: 07,168.017a svayam evātmano vaktuṃ na yuktaṃ guṇasaṃstavam
GE07mbh_07_u:21462: 07,168.017b*1382_01 mama nāgāyutaṃ pārtha balaṃ bāhvor vidhīyate
GE07mbh_07_u:21463: 07,168.017b*1382_02 prapātayeyaṃ ca śaraiḥ sendrān devān samāgatān
GE07mbh_07_u:21465: 07,168.017c dārayeyaṃ mahīṃ krodhād vikireyaṃ ca parvatān
GE07mbh_07_u:21466: 07,168.018a āvidhya ca gadāṃ gurvīṃ bhīmāṃ kāñcanamālinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:21468: 07,168.019a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ jānan bhrātaraṃ māṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:21470: 07,168.020a atha vā tiṣṭha bībhatso saha sarvair nararṣabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21471: 07,168.020c aham enaṃ gadāpāṇir jeṣyāmy eko mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:21476: 07,168.023a ṣaṣṭham adhyayanaṃ nāma teṣāṃ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21477: 07,168.023c hato droṇo mayā yat tat kiṃ māṃ pārtha vigarhase
GE07mbh_07_u:21481: 07,168.025c māyayaiva nihanyād yo na yuktaṃ pārtha tatra kim
GE07mbh_07_u:21482: 07,168.026a tasmiṃs tathā mayā śaste yadi drauṇāyanī ruṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:21483: 07,168.026c kurute bhairavaṃ nādaṃ tatra kiṃ mama hīyate
GE07mbh_07_u:21484: 07,168.027a na cādbhutam idaṃ manye yad drauṇiḥ śuddhagarjayā
GE07mbh_07_u:21486: 07,168.028a yac ca māṃ dhārmiko bhūtvā bravīṣi gurughātinam
GE07mbh_07_u:21488: 07,168.029a yasya kāryam akāryaṃ vā yudhyataḥ syāt samaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:21489: 07,168.029c taṃ kathaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāḥ kṣatriyaṃ vā dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:21490: 07,168.030a yo hy anastravido hanyād brahmāstraiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21491: 07,168.030c sarvopāyair na sa kathaṃ vadhyaḥ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_07_u:21492: 07,168.030d*1383_01 viśeṣāt pitṛhantā me na sa vadhyaḥ kathaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:21493: 07,168.030d*1383_02 yo 'yaṃ pāpaḥ sudurmedhā bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
GE07mbh_07_u:21494: 07,168.030d*1383_03 tasya viprabruvavadhe kathaṃ pāpaṃ bhaven mama
GE07mbh_07_u:21497: 07,168.032a nṛśaṃsaḥ sa mayākramya ratha eva nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21501: 07,168.034a yo 'sau mamaiva nānyasya bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
GE07mbh_07_u:21503: 07,168.035a tac ca me kṛntate marma yan na tasya śiro mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:21506: 07,168.036c kṣatriyasya hy ayaṃ dharmo hanyād dhanyeta vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21507: 07,168.037a sa śatrur nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā dharmeṇa pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:21508: 07,168.037c yathā tvayā hataḥ śūro bhagadattaḥ pituḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_07_u:21509: 07,168.038a pitāmahaṃ raṇe hatvā manyase dharmam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21510: 07,168.038c mayā śatrau hate kasmāt pāpe dharmaṃ na manyase
GE07mbh_07_u:21511: 07,168.038d*1384_01 saṃbandhāvanataṃ pārtha na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase
GE07mbh_07_u:21513: 07,168.038d*1384_03 kṣamāmi te sarvam eva vāgvyatikramam arjuna
GE07mbh_07_u:21516: 07,168.038d*1384_06 tathā jānāty ayaṃ loko na yūyaṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:21518: 07,168.039b*1385_01 na kṣatriya iti prāhur yo na hanti raṇājire

GE07mbh_07_u:22580: 07,173.010a īśānaṃ varadaṃ pārtha dṛṣṭavān asi śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22581: 07,173.010c taṃ gaccha śaraṇaṃ devaṃ sarvādiṃ bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22598: 07,173.012a tasya te pārṣadā divyā rūpair nānāvidhaiḥ vibhoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22601: 07,173.013c ānanair vikṛtaiḥ pādaiḥ pārtha veṣaiś ca vaikṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22603: 07,173.014c sa śivas tāta tejasvī prasādād yāti te 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22604: 07,173.014e tasmin ghore tadā pārtha saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:22606: 07,173.015c kas tāṃ senāṃ tadā pārtha manasāpi pradharṣayet
GE07mbh_07_u:22608: 07,173.016a sthātum utsahate kaś cin na tasminn agrataḥ sthite
GE07mbh_07_u:22609: 07,173.016c na hi bhūtaṃ samaṃ tena triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22610: 07,173.017a gandhenāpi hi saṃgrāme tasya kruddhasya śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22611: 07,173.017c visaṃjñā hatabhūyiṣṭhā vepanti ca patanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22612: 07,173.018a tasmai namas tu kurvanto devās tiṣṭhanti vai divi
GE07mbh_07_u:22613: 07,173.018c ye cānye mānavā loke ye ca svargajito narāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22614: 07,173.019a ye bhaktā varadaṃ devaṃ śivaṃ rudram umāpatim
GE07mbh_07_u:22616: 07,173.019b*1447_01 saṃgrāmeṣu jayaṃ prāpya pālayanti mahīm imām
GE07mbh_07_u:22617: 07,173.019c iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:22618: 07,173.020a namaskuruṣva kaunteya tasmai śāntāya vai sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22627: 07,173.024b*1448_01 namo vṛkṣāya senānye madhyamāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22632: 07,173.026a vṛkṣāṇāṃ pataye caiva apāṃ ca pataye tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:22641: 07,173.029e prajānāṃ patim avyagraṃ bhūtānāṃ patim avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:22652: 07,173.034a namas tasmai sureśāya yasya vaiśravaṇaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_07_u:22660: 07,173.037c namo 'stu tripuraghnāya bhagaghnāya ca vai namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22662: 07,173.038b*1453_01 mātṝṇāṃ pataye caiva gaṇānāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22663: 07,173.038c apāṃ ca pataye nityaṃ yajñānāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22668: 07,173.041a na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22669: 07,173.041c sukham edhanti kupite tasminn api guhāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22671: 07,173.042a vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22672: 07,173.042c dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22673: 07,173.043a te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ lebhire sma surās tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22674: 07,173.043c vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
GE07mbh_07_u:22676: 07,173.044c babhūvur vaśagāḥ pārtha nipetuś ca surāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22677: 07,173.045a āpaś cukṣubhire sarvāś cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_07_u:22678: 07,173.045c parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta diśo nāgāś ca mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22679: 07,173.046a andhāś ca tamasā lokā na prakāśanta saṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22680: 07,173.046c jaghnivān saha sūryeṇa sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ prabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22681: 07,173.047a cukruśur bhayabhītāś ca śāntiṃ cakrus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22685: 07,173.049a tato niścakramur devā vepamānā natāḥ sma tam
GE07mbh_07_u:22686: 07,173.049c punaś ca saṃdadhe dīptaṃ devānāṃ niśitaṃ śaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22688: 07,173.049d*1455_02 taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu surāḥ sarve praṇipatya maheśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22689: 07,173.050a rudrasya yajñabhāgaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ te nv akalpayan
GE07mbh_07_u:22690: 07,173.050c bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedire
GE07mbh_07_u:22691: 07,173.051a tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22692: 07,173.051c yattāś cāpi surā āsan yattāś cādyāpi taṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:22693: 07,173.052a asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divi
GE07mbh_07_u:22694: 07,173.052c āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:22696: 07,173.053c sauvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy āsīd vidyunmālina eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22697: 07,173.054a na śaktas tāni maghavān bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair api
GE07mbh_07_u:22698: 07,173.054c atha sarve 'marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇam arditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22699: 07,173.055a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22701: 07,173.055b*1456_02 pīḍayanty adhikaṃ lokaṃ yasmāt te varadarpitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22702: 07,173.055b*1456_03 tvad ṛte devadeveśa nānyaḥ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:22703: 07,173.055b*1456_04 hantuṃ daityān mahādeva tvaṃ hantā ca suradviṣām
GE07mbh_07_u:22706: 07,173.056a sa tathoktas tathety uktvā devānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_07_u:22707: 07,173.056b*1457_01 śalyam agniṃ ca vai kṛtvā puṅkhe somam apāṃ patim
GE07mbh_07_u:22708: 07,173.056b*1457_02 sa kṛtvā dhanur oṃkāraṃ sāvitrīṃ jyāṃ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22709: 07,173.056b*1457_03 hayāṃś ca caturo vedān sarvavedamayaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:22712: 07,173.056b@025_0002 pṛthvīṃ sasāgaravanāṃ rathaṃ kṛtvā tu śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22713: 07,173.056b@025_0003 akṣaṃ kṛtvā tu nāgendraṃ śeṣaṃ nāgaṃ trilocanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22714: 07,173.056b@025_0004 cakraṃ kṛtvā tu candrārkau devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_07_u:22715: 07,173.056b@025_0005 aṇī kṛtvailapatraṃ ca puṣpadantaṃ ca tryambakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22716: 07,173.056b@025_0006 yūpaṃ kṛtvā ca malayam avanāhaṃ ca takṣakam
GE07mbh_07_u:22717: 07,173.056b@025_0007 yoktrāṅgāni ca catvāri kṛtvā śarvaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:22720: 07,173.056b@025_0010 gāyatrīṃ pragrahaṃ kṛtvā sāvitrīṃ ca maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22721: 07,173.056b@025_0011 kṛtvoṃkāraṃ pratodaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ caiva sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:22722: 07,173.056b@025_0012 gāṇḍīvaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā guṇaṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
GE07mbh_07_u:22723: 07,173.056b@025_0013 viṣṇuṃ śarottamaṃ kṛtvā śalyam agniṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22724: 07,173.056b@025_0014 vāyuṃ kṛtvātha vājābhyāṃ puṅkhe vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE07mbh_07_u:22725: 07,173.056b@025_0015 vidyut kṛtvātha niśrāṇaṃ meruṃ kṛtvātha vai dhvajam
GE07mbh_07_u:22726: 07,173.056b@025_0016 āruhya sa rathaṃ divyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22729: 07,173.056b@025_0019 stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ pārtha ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22730: 07,173.056b@025_0020 sthānaṃ māheśvaraṃ kṛtvā divyam apratimaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22732: 07,173.057a yadā trīṇi sametāni antarikṣe purāṇi vai
GE07mbh_07_u:22733: 07,173.057c triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22734: 07,173.058a purāṇi na ca taṃ śekur dānavāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:22736: 07,173.058d*1458_01 purāṇi dagdhavantaṃ taṃ devī yātā pravīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:22737: 07,173.058d*1459_01 mumoca bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ purāṇy ādiśya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:22739: 07,173.058d*1459_03 bhasmībhūtā durātmāno bhinnāś ca tripure purā
GE07mbh_07_u:22741: 07,173.058d*1459_05 ṛṣibhiḥ saṃstutaś caiva parāṃ mudam upāgamat
GE07mbh_07_u:22745: 07,173.059a bālam aṅkagataṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22746: 07,173.059c umā jijñāsamānā vai ko 'yam ity abravīt surān
GE07mbh_07_u:22751: 07,173.060b*1462_03 jagāma śaraṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ brahmāṇaṃ prabhum avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:22752: 07,173.060b*1462_04 te taṃ praṇamya śirasā procuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22753: 07,173.060b*1462_05 kim apy aṅkagataṃ brahman pārvatyā bhūtam adbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:22754: 07,173.060b*1462_06 bālarūpadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāsmābhis tac ca lakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:22755: 07,173.060b*1462_07 tasmāt tvāṃ praṣṭum icchāmo nirjitā yena vai vayam
GE07mbh_07_u:22757: 07,173.060b*1462_09 teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22758: 07,173.060b*1462_10 dhyātvā sa śaṃbhuṃ bhagavān bālaṃ cāmitatejasam
GE07mbh_07_u:22759: 07,173.060b*1462_11 uvāca bhagavān brahmā śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:22760: 07,173.060b*1462_12 carācarasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ sa bhagavān haraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22761: 07,173.060b*1462_13 tasmāt parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti maheśvarāt
GE07mbh_07_u:22762: 07,173.060b*1462_14 yo dṛṣṭo hy umayā sārdhaṃ yuṣmābhir amitadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22763: 07,173.060b*1462_15 sa pārvatyāḥ kṛte devaḥ kṛtavān bālarūpatām
GE07mbh_07_u:22764: 07,173.060b*1462_16 te mayā sahitā yūyaṃ prapadyadhvaṃ tam eva hi
GE07mbh_07_u:22765: 07,173.060c sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22766: 07,173.060d*1463_01 evam uktā gatā devā yatra devo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22767: 07,173.060d*1464_01 athānyena svarūpeṇa brahmā dṛṣṭvā tam avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:22768: 07,173.061a na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22770: 07,173.062a athābhyetya tato brahmā dṛṣṭvā ca sa maheśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22771: 07,173.062c ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande taṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22773: 07,173.062d*1465_01 tvaṃ yajño bhuvanasyāsya tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:22774: 07,173.062d*1465_02 tvaṃ bhavas tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ dhāma paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_07_u:22775: 07,173.062d*1465_03 tvayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_07_u:22777: 07,173.062d*1465_05 prasādaṃ kuru śakrasya tvayā krodhārditasya vai
GE07mbh_07_u:22779: 07,173.062d*1465_06 padmayoner vacaḥ śrutvā tataḥ prīto maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22781: 07,173.063a tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22782: 07,173.063c abhavac ca punar bāhur yathāprakṛti vajriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22785: 07,173.065a sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so 'gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvavit
GE07mbh_07_u:22786: 07,173.065c sa cendraś caiva vāyuś ca so 'śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22787: 07,173.066a sa bhavaḥ sa ca parjanyo mahādevaḥ sa cānaghaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22788: 07,173.066c sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22789: 07,173.067a sa kālaḥ so 'ntako mṛtyuḥ sa yamo rātryahāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22790: 07,173.067c māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22791: 07,173.068a sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca viśvātmā viśvakarmakṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:22792: 07,173.068c sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ ca dhārayaty avapur vapuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22793: 07,173.069a sarvair devaiḥ stuto devaḥ saikadhā bahudhā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22795: 07,173.069d*1466_01 dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22796: 07,173.069d*1466_02 ghorā cānyā śivā cānyā te tanū bahudhā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22797: 07,173.069d*1466_03 ghorā tu yā tanus tasya so 'gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22798: 07,173.069d*1466_04 somārdhaṃ punar evāsya āpo jyotīṃṣi candramāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22800: 07,173.069d*1466_06 yad atra paramaṃ guhyaṃ sa vai devo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22801: 07,173.070a īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22802: 07,173.070c na hi sarve mayā śakyā vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22806: 07,173.072a āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_07_u:22807: 07,173.072c sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa caivākṣipate punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22808: 07,173.073a sendrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22809: 07,173.073c sa caiva vyāhṛte loke manuṣyāṇāṃ śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:22810: 07,173.074a aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22811: 07,173.074c maheśvaraś ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22812: 07,173.075a bahubhir bahudhā rūpair viśvaṃ vyāpnoti vai jagat
GE07mbh_07_u:22813: 07,173.075c asya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre tad atiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_07_u:22815: 07,173.076a eṣa caiva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22816: 07,173.076c yajanty enaṃ janās tatra vīrasthāna itīśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:22817: 07,173.077a asya dīptāni rūpāṇi ghorāṇi ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22818: 07,173.077c loke yāny asya kurvanti manuṣyāḥ pravadanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22820: 07,173.078c nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:22823: 07,173.080a sa kāmānāṃ prabhur devo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22824: 07,173.080c sa vibhuḥ sa prabhur devo viśvaṃ vyāpnuvate mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:22825: 07,173.081a jyeṣṭhaṃ bhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā munayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:22826: 07,173.081c prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād asyānalo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:22827: 07,173.082a sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22828: 07,173.082c teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22829: 07,173.083a nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:22830: 07,173.083c mahayanti ca lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22831: 07,173.084a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:22832: 07,173.084c liṅgam asyārcayanti sma tac cāpy ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:22833: 07,173.084d*1469_01 urdhvaliṅgas tataś cokto bhagavān brāhmaṇaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22834: 07,173.085a pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22835: 07,173.085c sukhī prītaś ca bhavati prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22837: 07,173.086c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22839: 07,173.087c krodhād yaś cāviśal lokāṃs tasmāc charva iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22840: 07,173.088a dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭis tena ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22841: 07,173.088c viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22842: 07,173.089a tisro devīr yadā caiva bhajate bhuvaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22843: 07,173.089c dyām apaḥ pṛthivīṃ caiva tryambakaś ca tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22845: 07,173.090c śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eśa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22847: 07,173.091c yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22848: 07,173.092a dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattisthitaś ca yat
GE07mbh_07_u:22849: 07,173.092c sthitaliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22850: 07,173.092d*1470_01 sūryācandramasor loke prakāśanty aṃśavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:22851: 07,173.092d*1470_02 te keśāḥ saṃjñitās tasya vyomakeśas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22852: 07,173.092d*1470_03 kapiḥ śreṣṭha iti prokto dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22853: 07,173.092d*1470_04 sa devadevo bhagavān kīrtyate vai vṛṣākapiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22854: 07,173.092d*1470_05 brahmāṇam indraṃ varuṇaṃ yamaṃ dhanadam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:22855: 07,173.092d*1470_06 nigṛhya harate yasmāt tasmād dhara iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22857: 07,173.092d*1470_08 lalāṭe netram asṛjat tena tryakṣaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22858: 07,173.092d*1470_09 bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22860: 07,173.093a viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu samaś ca prāṇinām iha
GE07mbh_07_u:22862: 07,173.094a pūjayed vigrahaṃ yas tu liṅgaṃ vāpi samarcayet
GE07mbh_07_u:22863: 07,173.094c liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute
GE07mbh_07_u:22864: 07,173.095a ūrubhyām ardham āgneyaṃ somārdhaṃ ca śivā tanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22865: 07,173.095c ātmano 'rdhaṃ ca tasyāgniḥ somo 'rdhaṃ punar ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22866: 07,173.096a taijasī mahatī dīptā devebhyaś ca śivā tanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22867: 07,173.096c bhāsvatī mānuṣeṣv asya tanur ghorāgnir ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22868: 07,173.097a brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tayā
GE07mbh_07_u:22869: 07,173.097c yāsya ghoratarā mūrtiḥ sarvān atti tayeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22870: 07,173.098a yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:22872: 07,173.099a eṣa devo mahādevo yo 'sau pārtha tavāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22873: 07,173.099c saṃgrāme śātravān nighnaṃs tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_07_u:22875: 07,173.099d*1472_01 kṛṣṇena darśite svapne yas te śailendramūrdhani
GE07mbh_07_u:22876: 07,173.100a eṣa vai bhagavān devaḥ saṃgrāme yāti te 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22877: 07,173.100c yena dattāni te 'strāṇi yais tvayā dānavā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22878: 07,173.101a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃjñitam
GE07mbh_07_u:22885: 07,173.103a caturvidham idaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22886: 07,173.103c vijitya sarvāñ śatrūn sa rudraloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_07_u:22887: 07,173.104a caritaṃ mahātmano divyaṃ sāṃgrāmikam idaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_07_u:22888: 07,173.104c paṭhan vai śatarudrīyaṃ śṛṇvaṃś ca satatotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22889: 07,173.104d*1474_01 yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā yaś cāpi parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_07_u:22890: 07,173.104d*1474_02 divā vā yadi vā rātrau brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati
GE07mbh_07_u:22891: 07,173.105a bhakto viśveśvaraṃ devaṃ mānuṣeṣu tu yaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:22892: 07,173.105c varān sa kāmāṃl labhate prasanne tryambake naraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22893: 07,173.106a gaccha yudhyasva kaunteya na tavāsti parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22894: 07,173.106c yasya mantrī ca goptā ca pārśvatas te janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22901: 07,173.107d*1475_03 adhīte yat phalaṃ vede tad asminn api parvaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:22903: 07,173.107d*1476_01 ya idaṃ paṭhate parva śṛṇuyād vāpi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22904: 07,173.107d*1476_02 sa mucyate mahāpāpaiḥ kṛtair ghoraiś ca karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22907: 07,173.107d*1477_03 sadā śubhaṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyāt tathā naraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:22913: 07,173.107d*1479_01 etad ākhyāya vai sūto rājñaḥ sarvaṃ tu saṃjayaḥ
